NK051(zhi)004:1: // ma ny+dzu sh+r+ai m+aa y+aam dz+aa la na bri t+ti
NK051(zhi)004:2: n+aa ma a r+tha pra sa ka k+aa ra na
NK051(zhi)004:3: d+ai ba n+aa ma bi ha ra ti sma //
NK051(zhi)004:5: // 'jam dpal sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i 'grel pa mtshan don
NK051(zhi)004:6: gsal bar byed pa'i sgron me zhes bya ba bzhugs
NK051(zhi)004:8: n+aa ma sam g+ai ti brit+ti n+aa ma ar+tha pra sa ka k+aa ra na d+ai pa n+aa ma /
NK051(zhi)004:10: mtshan yang dag pa'i brjod pa'i 'grel pa mtshan don gsal bar byed pa'i sgron me zhes bya ba /
NK051(zhi)004:11: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK051(zhi)004:12: zab cing rgya che'i sku mnga' ba'i //
NK051(zhi)004:14: skal ldan rnal 'byor gang zhig gis //
NK051(zhi)004:15: rje btsun mtshan brjod rtogs bya'i phyir //
NK051(zhi)004:16: bshad pa'i rgyud dang gdams ngag la //
NK051(zhi)004:17: brten te 'bad pas bshad par bya //
NK051(zhi)004:18: bshad tshul lnga yi sgo phye la //
NK051(zhi)004:19: ji snyed rigs rnams drug bsdus te //
NK051(zhi)004:20: phan yon bcas pa bshad pa yin //
NK051(zhi)004:21: de la 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i mtshan ji
NK051(zhi)004:22: ltar yin pa rtogs par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pa
NK051(zhi)004:23: dbang po rab 'bring gsum du 'gyur te /
NK051(zhi)004:24: rab la bka' rgyud mdo'i bdag nyid can 'di'i mtshan bshad par bya /
NK051(zhi)004:25: 'bring la gzhung dbu zhabs kyi dbye ba bstan par bya /
NK051(zhi)004:26: tha ma la yi ge 'bru re re nas bstan par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)004:27: de la dris lan gyi tshul du bshad pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:28: mtha' sdud gsum gyi tshul du bshad pa ni don gnas skabs su sbyar bar bya'o //
NK051(zhi)004:29: de la dbang po rab mgo smos pas go ba
NK051(zhi)004:30: rnams kyi don du rgyud kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa
NK051(zhi)004:31: ni / 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'dis bstan te /
NK051(zhi)004:32: de la 'phags pa ni gnyis te /
NK051(zhi)004:33: brjod bya don gyi sgo nas 'phags pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:34: rjod byed tshig gi sgo nas 'phags pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:36: ji ltar bsnams na rab dgu la //
NK051(zhi)004:37: myangs na zhim pa'i sman bzhin du //
NK051(zhi)004:38: chos kyang de bzhin gnyis su gnas //
NK051(zhi)004:39: don dang yi ger shes par bya //
NK051(zhi)004:41: de la brjod bya don gyi sgo nas 'phags pa ni /
NK051(zhi)004:42: rje btsun nyid la 'khor ba'i mtha' dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' gnyis las 'phags te /
NK051(zhi)004:43: mtha' gnyis la zhen pa'i sgrib pa med pa yin te /
NK051(zhi)004:45: sgrib pa kun las nges par grol //
NK051(zhi)004:46: mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid la gnas //
NK051(zhi)004:48: rjod byed tshig gi sgo nas 'phags pa ni thabs kyi theg pa 'di nyid yin te /
NK051(zhi)004:52: thabs myur ba dang bzhis 'phags te /
NK051(zhi)004:54: don gcig na yang bye brag ni //
NK051(zhi)004:55: thabs mang ba dang mkhas pa dang //
NK051(zhi)004:56: de bzhin sla dang myur ba yis //
NK051(zhi)004:57: sngags kyi bstan pa khyad par 'phags //
NK051(zhi)004:59: de la thabs mang ba ni gdul bya rnams kyi
NK051(zhi)004:60: blo la ji ltar mos pa las ma zlog par
NK051(zhi)004:61: grol ba'i thabs mtha' yas par ston pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:63: nges 'byung kun gyi lam la gnas //
NK051(zhi)004:65: nyon mongs ma spangs kyang grol ba'i thabs shes pas thabs mkhas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:67: mkhas pa chen po thabs che ba //
NK051(zhi)004:69: sgo gsum dka' thub kyis ma gzir bar 'dod pa'i
NK051(zhi)004:70: longs spyod la gnas bzhin du grol ba'i thabs ston
NK051(zhi)004:73: longs spyod rdzogs sku kun gyi rgyal //
NK051(zhi)004:75: thabs kyi theg pa'i rigs can gyis thams cad gnyis med du rtogs pas /
NK051(zhi)004:76: tshe 'di nyid la byang chub 'grub pas thabs myur ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:77: de la 'jam dpal ni dbye na rnam pa lnga ste /
NK051(zhi)004:79: sgom pa lam gyi 'jam dpal dang /
NK051(zhi)004:81: gdul bya las dag pa la snang ba'i 'jam dpal dang /
NK051(zhi)004:82: rnam pa'i bdag nyid du snang ba'i 'jam dpal lo //
NK051(zhi)004:83: de la rang bzhin rgyu'i 'jam dpal ni 'khor 'das
NK051(zhi)004:84: kyi chos thams cad la chos nyid de bzhin nyid
NK051(zhi)004:88: phra zhig zag med sa bon bral //
NK051(zhi)004:90: de la mtshan ma'i rnam par rtog pa'i zug rngu bral ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:91: rtogs na kun gyi dpal du gyur pas de skad ces bya'o //
NK051(zhi)004:92: sgom pa lam gyi 'jam dpal ni bskyed rim dang rdzogs rim la sogs te /
NK051(zhi)004:93: lam gyi chos su gyur pa rnams yin te /
NK051(zhi)004:95: nges 'byung kun gyi lam la gnas //
NK051(zhi)004:97: de nyid kyi gnas skabs nas rtog pa'i zug rngu rnams ni spangs la /
NK051(zhi)004:98: shas gcig ni spong ba la zhugs pas 'jam la /
NK051(zhi)004:99: de las bdag dang gzhan gyi don 'byung bas dpal lo //
NK051(zhi)004:100: mthar thug 'bras bu'i 'jam dpal ni sku gsum ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid la bya ste /
NK051(zhi)004:102: mchog gi dang po sku gsum 'chang //
NK051(zhi)004:104: de la sku gsum ni thun mong gi dbang du byas na /
NK051(zhi)004:105: chos sku skye med nam mkha' lta bu la longs
NK051(zhi)004:106: spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rnam par snang mdzad sprin lta
NK051(zhi)004:107: bu 'byung ba der las sprul sku sh+aakya thub pa
NK051(zhi)004:108: char lta bu sa 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:109: khyad par gyi dbang du byas na /
NK051(zhi)004:110: rig pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku /
NK051(zhi)004:111: rig pa sna tshogs su 'char ba sprul pa'i sku /
NK051(zhi)004:112: ji ltar snang yang don skye med las ma 'das pa chos kyi sku'o //
NK051(zhi)004:113: de la ye shes lnga ni chos nyid skye 'gag med pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes /
NK051(zhi)004:114: de nyid gsal la rtog pa med pa me long lta bu'i ye shes /
NK051(zhi)004:115: de gnyis su dbyer med cing blang dor med pas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes /
NK051(zhi)004:116: chos spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid ma 'dres par gsal ba ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes /
NK051(zhi)004:117: bdag dang gzhan gyi don rtsol ba med par grub pas ni bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so //
NK051(zhi)004:119: khyab bdag ye shes lnga yi bdag /
NK051(zhi)004:121: gdul bya las dag pa la snang ba'i 'jam dpal
NK051(zhi)004:122: ni rnal 'byor pa'i ting nge 'dzin goms pa'i mthus
NK051(zhi)004:124: rnam pa'i bdag nyid du snang ba'i 'jam dpal ni
NK051(zhi)004:125: sku'i gzugs brnyan du gyur pa ras bal la ri
NK051(zhi)004:127: zangs lcags la 'bur du btod pa de rnams so //
NK051(zhi)004:128: gyi zhes pa ni 'brel ba'i yi ge ste /
NK051(zhi)004:129: ji skad du smos pa'i yon tan rnams dang /
NK051(zhi)004:130: yon tan can rje btsun 'jam dpal du 'brel bar ston te /
NK051(zhi)004:131: brgya byin gyi ba khra mo zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
NK051(zhi)004:132: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa zhes pa /
NK051(zhi)004:133: mtshan ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i yon tan gyi chos rnams yin la /
NK051(zhi)004:134: yon tan de dag dang rje btsun nyid dang ldan la /
NK051(zhi)004:135: ldan pa kho na ltar brjod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:136: tshul ji ltar brjod na gnyis te /
NK051(zhi)004:137: zab pa don gyi sgo nas brjod pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:138: rgya che ba tshig gi sgo nas brjod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:139: don gyi sgo nas brjod pa ni don gnyis su med pa'i ye shes su gsal ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:140: tshig gi sgo nas brjod pa la gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)004:141: mtshan nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul du brjod pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:142: gsang sngags kyi tshul du brjod pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:143: yon tan gyi tshul du brjod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:144: de la mtshan nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul du
NK051(zhi)004:145: brjod pa ni rang gi sems kyi mtshan nyid gnyis
NK051(zhi)004:146: su med pa'i ye shes su ngo shes par byas
NK051(zhi)004:147: la mtshan brjod par bya ste /
NK051(zhi)004:148: brjod pa'i sgra de dag byung yang skye 'gag med pa'i ngang las byung la /
NK051(zhi)004:149: thim yang de nyid du thim ste /
NK051(zhi)004:150: mdor na chos kyi rang sgrar shes par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)004:152: gnyis med gnyis su med par ston //
NK051(zhi)004:153: yang dag mtha' la rnam par gnas //
NK051(zhi)004:155: mtshan sngags kyi tshul du brjod pa ni bdag nyid
NK051(zhi)004:156: rje btsun 'jam dpal du bsgoms te mtshan brjod pas
NK051(zhi)004:157: thugs ka'i mum las 'od zer 'phros pas 'phags pa
NK051(zhi)004:158: mchod pa dang / sems can gyi don byas slar rang gi thugs kar thim /
NK051(zhi)004:159: yang snga ma ltar spro zhing bsdus te /
NK051(zhi)004:160: mtshan klag pa ma thon gyi bar du ci rigs su bya ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:162: gsang sngags tshul chen bdag nyid can //
NK051(zhi)004:164: mtshan yon tan gyi tshul du brjod pa ni rje btsun 'jam dpal nyid la 'khor sangs rgyas dang /
NK051(zhi)004:166: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dpag tu med pas bskor ba /
NK051(zhi)004:167: mdun gyi nam mkha' la spyan drangs la mtshan brjod par bya ste /
NK051(zhi)004:168: 'di yang khyod kyi yon tan yin zhes dmigs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:170: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mtsho //
NK051(zhi)004:172: de dag kyang bsdu na don zab pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:173: tshig rgya che ba gnyis te /
NK051(zhi)004:175: zab cing rgya che'i sgra sgrogs pa //
NK051(zhi)004:177: da ni bar chad nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir phyag 'tshal ba bstan pa ni /
NK051(zhi)004:178: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK051(zhi)004:180: phyag na rdo rjes sh+aakya thub pa la zhus nas /
NK051(zhi)004:181: glegs bam du sdud pa'i dus su /
NK051(zhi)004:182: klad du yi dam lha la phyag 'tshal ba yin te /
NK051(zhi)004:183: 'o na phyag na rdo rje la yang bar chad 'byung ngam zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:185: rjes 'jug gi don du dgongs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:186: de la yang 'jam dpal ni gong du bshad zin to //
NK051(zhi)004:187: sku dus gsum du bgres rgud mi mnga' bas gzhon nu ste /
NK051(zhi)004:188: rtag tu da ltar 'byung ba lta bu'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:189: la ni dgar ba'i yi ge ste 'jam dpal nyid la'o //
NK051(zhi)004:191: zab pa don rtogs pa'i phyag dang /
NK051(zhi)004:192: rgya che lus ngag yid gsum gus pa'i tshus gyis phyag btsal ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:193: de la dbang po 'bring gi don du dbu zhabs kyi dbye ba bstan pa ni /
NK051(zhi)004:194: bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas le'u bcu
NK051(zhi)004:195: bzhir ston pa las dang por zhus pa'i le'u bstan
NK051(zhi)004:196: pa'i phyir / de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
NK051(zhi)004:197: zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
NK051(zhi)004:198: de nas zhes bya ba ni mtshams sbyor ba'i tshig yin te /
NK051(zhi)004:199: gong du rtsa ba'i rgyud le'u khri drug stong pa
NK051(zhi)004:200: bshad pa'i rjes su mtshan yang dag par brjod pa
NK051(zhi)004:201: man ngag gi snying po glur blangs pa'i le'u 'di
NK051(zhi)004:202: zhus zhes pa'o // dpal ni rtogs pa bdag gi dpal /
NK051(zhi)004:203: thugs rje gzhan gyi dpal gnyis dang /
NK051(zhi)004:204: phyag na rdo rje nyid la ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:206: nang na zab pa don gyi rdo rje ye shes lnga dbyer mi phyed par 'chang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:208: mi phyed rdo rje zhes brjod de //
NK051(zhi)004:209: sems dpa' srid gsum gcig pu'o //
NK051(zhi)004:211: don de lta bu dang ldan pa'i rtags su rgya
NK051(zhi)004:212: che ba lcags kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams
NK051(zhi)004:213: pa'o // des mdzad pa'i phrin las ci mdzad ce na /
NK051(zhi)004:214: gdul dka' 'dul ba rnams kyi mchog /
NK051(zhi)004:215: dpa' bo 'jig rten gsum las rgyal //
NK051(zhi)004:217: tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug la sogs te /
NK051(zhi)004:218: gdul dka' ba rnams 'dul ba la /
NK051(zhi)004:219: sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus nas ri rab kyi rtse
NK051(zhi)004:220: mor phyag na rdo rje la dbang bskur bas mchog
NK051(zhi)004:221: ces bya'o // rang 'jigs pa dang bral zhing gzhan gyi dpung 'joms pas dpa' la /
NK051(zhi)004:222: sa 'og gi bdag po ma h+aa de ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:223: sa steng gi bdag po khyab 'jug /
NK051(zhi)004:224: sa bla'i bdag po tshangs pa dang gsum ni phyi
NK051(zhi)004:225: rol pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi lha gsum yin la
NK051(zhi)004:226: / de gsum btul bas 'jig rten gsum las rgyal ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:227: de yang nang du nyon mongs pa gsum btul ba'i rtags so //
NK051(zhi)004:228: de'i rigs dang rtags gang zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:229: rdo rje dbang phyug gsang ba'i rgyal //
NK051(zhi)004:231: rdo rje'i rigs yin pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:232: gsang sngags kyi sdud pa po rdo rje theg pa'i
NK051(zhi)004:233: mnga' bdag tu gyur pas kyang rdo rje dbang phyug
NK051(zhi)004:234: go // gsang ba'i dam tshig dang ldan zhing /
NK051(zhi)004:235: nang gi nyon mongs pa dang phyi'i gdug pa can rnams las rgyal bas rgyal zhes bya'o //
NK051(zhi)004:236: de'i zhal ras ci 'dra zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:238: pad+ma rgyas pa'i zhal mnga' ba //
NK051(zhi)004:240: pad+ma 'dam nas skyes kyang 'dam gyi skyon gyis ma gos pa dang 'dra bar /
NK051(zhi)004:241: phyag na rdo rje nyid shin tu khro khro 'dra
NK051(zhi)004:242: yang nang na nyon mongs pa med pas dkar ba'o
NK051(zhi)004:243: // spyan kun tu zlum pas rgyas 'dra'i spyan no //
NK051(zhi)004:244: de'i phyag mtshan ci 'dra zhe na //
NK051(zhi)004:245: rang gi lag gis rdo rje mchog /
NK051(zhi)004:246: yang dang yang du gsor byed pa //
NK051(zhi)004:248: lag gi rdo rje de don gyi rtags su byung bas mchog go //
NK051(zhi)004:249: yang dang yang du gsor byed pa ni /
NK051(zhi)004:250: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi 'khor lo yang nas
NK051(zhi)004:251: yang du skor cig par zhu ba 'bul ba'i brda
NK051(zhi)004:252: yang yin / thugs rje rgyun mi chad pas 'gro ba 'dren pa'i brda yang yin /
NK051(zhi)004:253: gdug pa can rgyun mi chad par 'dul ba'i brda yang yin /
NK051(zhi)004:254: nang na ye shes rgyun mi chad par mnga' ba'i brda yang yin /
NK051(zhi)004:255: de yi grogs gang dang lhan cig tu zhus she na /
NK051(zhi)004:256: 'khor lag na rdo rje khro tshogs lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu zhus pa'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)004:257: khro gnyer rim par ldan la sogs //
NK051(zhi)004:258: lag na rdo rje mtha' yas pa //
NK051(zhi)004:260: khro gnyer ni mche ba gtsigs pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:263: 'bri gu ta gyen du 'greng ba la sogs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:264: khro tshogs de dag la yang yod tan dang mthu mtha' yas pa dag dang ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:265: de dag gis phrin las ci mdzad ce na /
NK051(zhi)004:266: dpa' bo gdul dka' 'dul ba po //
NK051(zhi)004:269: ci'i phyir gdul dka' zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:270: drag po btsan thabs kyis 'dul dgos pa'i phyir ro //
NK051(zhi)004:272: 'jigs su rung dang dpa' byad can //
NK051(zhi)004:274: khro bo'i cha byad dang ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:275: de dag gi phyag mtshan ci zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:276: rdo rje rtse mo rab 'phro ba //
NK051(zhi)004:277: rang gi lag gis gsor byed pa //
NK051(zhi)004:279: rdo rje'i rtse mo las rdo rje phra mo byung nas gdug pa can 'dul ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:280: de dag kyang gtso bo'i rjes mthun du spyod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:281: de dag gi bsam pa'i khyad par ci zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:282: snying rje che dang shes rab dang //
NK051(zhi)004:283: thabs kyis 'gro don byed pa'i mchog /
NK051(zhi)004:284: ces pa la sogs pa smos te /
NK051(zhi)004:285: 'gro ba rnams la rnying rje chen po dang ldan pa ni rgya che ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:286: shes rab kyi chos rnams par 'byor pa ni zab pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:287: thabs de lta bus gzhan mchog go //
NK051(zhi)004:288: yon tan gyi khyad par ji lta bus she na //
NK051(zhi)004:289: dga' mgu rangs pa'i bsam pa can //
NK051(zhi)004:290: zhes pa 'gro ba'i don byed pa la dga' /
NK051(zhi)004:291: ston pa mthong ba na mgu /
NK051(zhi)004:292: chos bshad pas rjes su yi rang ba'i bsam pa yod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:293: gzugs ci dang ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi phrin las byed ce na /
NK051(zhi)004:294: khro bo'i lus kyi gzugs ldan pa //
NK051(zhi)004:295: sangs rgyas phyin las byed pa'i mgon //
NK051(zhi)004:296: lus btud rnams dang lhan cig tu //
NK051(zhi)004:298: rgyan dang rang bzhin khro bor gnas shing mdzad pa
NK051(zhi)004:299: bcu gnyis sam phrin las rnam pa bzhi'i sgo nas
NK051(zhi)004:301: khro bo de rnams kyis kyang bag med dum yin te /
NK051(zhi)004:302: shin tu gus pa'i tshul gyis lus btud nas zhus pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:303: tshul lam thabs ji ltar zhus she na /
NK051(zhi)004:304: de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das //
NK051(zhi)004:305: rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas //
NK051(zhi)004:306: thal mo sbyar bar byas nas ni //
NK051(zhi)004:309: de bzhin nyid du gshig pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:310: 'gro ba'i don la gshegs shing bdud bzhi bcom /
NK051(zhi)004:311: legs pa'i yon tan drug dang ldan pa che ba'i yon tan thams cad rdzogs pa /
NK051(zhi)004:312: ma rig pa'i sgrib pa sangs shing ye shes rgyas pa ste /
NK051(zhi)004:314: ma rig gnyid ni sangs phyir dang //
NK051(zhi)004:315: shes bya la yang blo rgyas phyir //
NK051(zhi)004:316: sangs rgyas pad+mo ltar sangs rgyas //
NK051(zhi)004:318: de dag gis thal mo sbyar ba'i bar du rdo rje bcug nas /
NK051(zhi)004:319: mdun du tsog tsog par 'dug nas zhus pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:320: dgos ched ci'i don du zhus she na /
NK051(zhi)004:321: khyab bdag bdag la sman pa dang //
NK051(zhi)004:322: bdag don bdag la thugs brtse'i phyir //
NK051(zhi)004:323: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba mngon rdzogs pa'i //
NK051(zhi)004:324: byang chub ci nas bdag thob mdzod //
NK051(zhi)004:326: brtan g.yo kun la khyab pas na khyab bdag ces ston pa la bos nas /
NK051(zhi)004:327: 'khor bdag cag rnams la sman pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:328: bdag la thugs brtse bar mdzad pas thabs dang shes
NK051(zhi)004:329: rab khyad par can zung du 'brel bas sgyu 'phrul
NK051(zhi)004:330: d+r+wa ba ste / de'i sgo nas mngon par rdzogs
NK051(zhi)004:331: par byang chub bdag gis thob par mdzod cig ces
NK051(zhi)004:332: d+r+wa ba ste / pa ste / rang don gzhan don dang 'brel ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:333: 'o na bdag gi don zhus pa de yin na /
NK051(zhi)004:334: gzhan gyi don du zhus pa gang yin zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:335: nyon mongs pas ni sems dkrugs shing //
NK051(zhi)004:336: mi shes 'dam du bying ba yi //
NK051(zhi)004:337: sems can kun la sman pa dang //
NK051(zhi)004:338: bla med 'bras bu thob bya'i phyir //
NK051(zhi)004:340: zhe sdang la sogs pa nyon mongs pas byang chub sems chu rnyogs pa lta bur dkrugs shing /
NK051(zhi)004:341: de kho na nyid mi shes te /
NK051(zhi)004:342: glang po che 'dam du chud pa ltar sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtshor chud pa'i sems can kun la /
NK051(zhi)004:343: de las bzlog nas tshe 'dir sman par bya ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:344: tshe phyi ma la bla na med pa'i byang chub
NK051(zhi)004:345: kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir yang bshad
NK051(zhi)004:347: ston pa gang la zhus she na /
NK051(zhi)004:348: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das //
NK051(zhi)004:349: 'gro ba'i bla ma ston pa po //
NK051(zhi)004:351: rang dang gzhan gyi don thams cad rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus zhes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:352: des 'gro ba rnams la chos ston pa mdzad pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:353: ston pa des don mi mkhyen pa mi srid dam zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:354: dam tshig chen po de nyid mkhyen //
NK051(zhi)004:356: don rtogs pa las mi 'da' bas dam tshig chen po ste /
NK051(zhi)004:357: de nyid ji lta ba mkhyen pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:358: des gdul bya'i dbang po dang bsam pa mkhyen nam zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:359: dbang po bsam pa mkhyen mchog gis //
NK051(zhi)004:361: dbang po'i bye brag gang la gang mos mkhyen pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:362: 'o na chos gang zhu zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:363: bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes sku //
NK051(zhi)004:364: gtsug tor chen po'i tshig gi bdag /
NK051(zhi)004:365: ye shes sku ste rang byung ba //
NK051(zhi)004:366: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' yi //
NK051(zhi)004:367: ming ni yang dag brjod pa'i mchog /
NK051(zhi)004:369: bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes sku ni /
NK051(zhi)004:370: me long ltar thams cad gsal zhing 'char bas me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
NK051(zhi)004:371: gtsug tor chen po ni chos thams cad mnyam pa
NK051(zhi)004:372: nyid kun gyi spyi bo'i gtsug tu bkur ba'i 'os
NK051(zhi)004:373: yin pas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
NK051(zhi)004:374: tshig gi bdag po ni chos spyi dang rang gi
NK051(zhi)004:375: mtshan nyid ma 'dres par mkhyen pa'i sgo nas chos
NK051(zhi)004:377: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
NK051(zhi)004:378: ye shes sku ni 'gro ba'i bya ba grub pa'i byed pa'i sku ste /
NK051(zhi)004:379: de yang ye shes las grub pa'i sku yin pas bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so //
NK051(zhi)004:380: rang byung ba ni skye ba med pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so //
NK051(zhi)004:381: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' ni /
NK051(zhi)004:382: rtsa ba byang chub kyi sems te /
NK051(zhi)004:383: ye shes chen pos mnyam pa nyid la sems shing thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don la sems pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:384: de'i rtags gzugs skur byung ba la yang de skad ces bya'o //
NK051(zhi)004:385: tshig dang don gyi sgo nas de'i ming yang dag
NK051(zhi)004:386: par brjod pa ni gzhan bas don che bas na
NK051(zhi)004:387: mchog go // mdor na ye shes lnga byang chub
NK051(zhi)004:388: sems dang drug ro gcig pa'i chos gcig zhus pa'o
NK051(zhi)004:389: mchog go // // 'o na ming las don ma zhus sam zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:390: don zab don ni rgya che zhing //
NK051(zhi)004:391: don chen mtshungs med rab zhi ba //
NK051(zhi)004:392: thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba //
NK051(zhi)004:394: ci'i phyir na don zab ce na /
NK051(zhi)004:395: don chen po gsang sngags kyi don chos nyid mnyam pa nyid yin pas kyang zab /
NK051(zhi)004:396: chos gang dang yang mtshungs pa med pas kyang zab /
NK051(zhi)004:397: spros pas mtshan ma rab tu zhi bas kyang zab /
NK051(zhi)004:398: dge ba gsum gyi rgyu dang ldan pas kyang zab /
NK051(zhi)004:399: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pas kyang zab /
NK051(zhi)004:400: rdo rje theg pa'i glu yis pas kyang zab /
NK051(zhi)004:401: de ltar brjod bya zab pas rjod byed kyang zab bo //
NK051(zhi)004:402: rgya che ba ni rnam sprul sna tshogs su snang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:403: gang dang yang mi mnyam pas mtshungs pa med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:404: spros pa'i mtha' thams cad rab tu zhi ba /
NK051(zhi)004:405: thog mar dge ba thos pa'i shes rab /
NK051(zhi)004:406: bar du dge ba bsam pa'i shes rab /
NK051(zhi)004:407: tha mar dge ba bsgom pa'i shes rab bo //
NK051(zhi)004:409: nyon mongs pa rtsad nas 'byin pas dge ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:411: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs //
NK051(zhi)004:413: da ltar byung ba rdzogs sangs rgyas //
NK051(zhi)004:414: yang dang yang du gsungs pa gang //
NK051(zhi)004:416: rgyal ba sh+aakya thub pas ri bya rkang can du
NK051(zhi)004:417: phyag na rdo rje la 'di gsungs pa'i dus su
NK051(zhi)004:418: / de'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten khams pad+mo can zhes bya ba na /
NK051(zhi)004:419: de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo mchog ces bya bas kyang
NK051(zhi)004:420: 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams las 'di gsungs
NK051(zhi)004:421: so // de bzhin du phyogs lnga por yang gsungs so //
NK051(zhi)004:422: chos nyid kyi mkha' rnam par dag pa nas kyang
NK051(zhi)004:423: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang gis 'khor gyi de bzhin
NK051(zhi)004:425: dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyis kyang 'og min du
NK051(zhi)004:426: 'khor byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'di gsungs so
NK051(zhi)004:427: // ri rab kyi rtser sprul sku 'khor los sgyur
NK051(zhi)004:428: ba lta bus kyang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha
NK051(zhi)004:430: dga' ldan gyi gnas su yang lha rnams la rgyal ba byams pas 'di gsungs so //
NK051(zhi)004:431: der yang ma zad de rde'u dang shing bu dang
NK051(zhi)004:432: nam mkha' la sogs pa la yang 'di'i sgra grags
NK051(zhi)004:434: sems dpa' mchog gi bstan pa ni //
NK051(zhi)004:435: dbang 'byor ba dang rtogs pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:436: kha dang gzugs ni thams cad dang //
NK051(zhi)004:437: nam mkha' las kyang grags par 'gyur //
NK051(zhi)004:439: de nyid rtsa ba'i rgyud khri drug stong par yang lan gcig bshad /
NK051(zhi)004:440: phyis dga' ba spyod pa 'dir yang lan gcig bshad de /
NK051(zhi)004:441: sh+aakya thub pas lan gnyis bshad pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:442: sgya 'phrul d+r+wa ba glur blangs pa'i don gang yin na /
NK051(zhi)004:443: rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba las //
NK051(zhi)004:445: dpag med rnams kyis dga' bzhin du //
NK051(zhi)004:446: glur blangs gang lags bshad du bshad du gsol //
NK051(zhi)004:447: zhes pa rtsa ba'i rgyud sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba la
NK051(zhi)004:448: sogs par rdo rje 'chang gis kyang don dpag tu
NK051(zhi)004:449: med pa rdo rje'i glu gsungs nas 'khor rnams dga'
NK051(zhi)004:450: ba skyed pa de bzhin du /
NK051(zhi)004:451: bdag cag la yang bshad du gsol zhes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:452: zhus pa'i don de gzung bar khas blangs pa ni /
NK051(zhi)004:453: mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas kun gyi //
NK051(zhi)004:456: bdag gi bsam la brtan pos gzung //
NK051(zhi)004:458: sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i gsang sngags rnams 'dzin par
NK051(zhi)004:459: gyur pa'i phyir nges par byang chub ma thob kyi
NK051(zhi)004:460: bar du bdag gi bsam pa la the tshom med
NK051(zhi)004:461: cing brjod pa med pa gzung ngo zhes khas blangs
NK051(zhi)004:462: pa'o // gzhan don du bshad par khas blangs pa ni /
NK051(zhi)004:463: nyon mongs ma lus bsal ba dang //
NK051(zhi)004:464: mi shes ma lus spang ba'i phyir //
NK051(zhi)004:465: bsam pa'i khyad par ji bzhin du //
NK051(zhi)004:466: sems can rnams la bshad par 'tshal //
NK051(zhi)004:469: sems can gyi nyon mongs pa ma lus bsal ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:470: de'i rgyu mi shes pa dang ma rig pa spang ba'i phyir bshad do //
NK051(zhi)004:471: de yang bsam pa ji ltar mos pa'i khyad par
NK051(zhi)004:472: shes par byas nas bshad kyi thun mong du ma
NK051(zhi)004:473: yin no // lus ngag yid gsum gus pa'i tshul gyis zhus pa ni /
NK051(zhi)004:474: gsang dbang lag na rdo rje yis //
NK051(zhi)004:475: de bzhin gshegs la de skad du //
NK051(zhi)004:476: gsol nas thal mo sbyar byas te //
NK051(zhi)004:477: lus btud nas ni spyan sngar 'dug /
NK051(zhi)004:478: ces pa ni phyag na rdo rje'i sh+aakya thub pa la thal mo sbyar /
NK051(zhi)004:479: lus gus pa'i tshul gyis btud /
NK051(zhi)004:480: gdan pad+ma las 'phags nas gsol ba btab pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:481: da ni lan gsungs pa'i le'u bstan pa'i phyir //
NK051(zhi)004:482: de nas bcom ldan sh+aakya thub //
NK051(zhi)004:483: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog /
NK051(zhi)004:484: ces pa la sogs pa smos te /
NK051(zhi)004:485: sdud pa pos ston pa zhus ma thag pa'i rjes de nas zhes bya bar mtshams sbyar ro //
NK051(zhi)004:489: 'chi bdag gi bdud dang bzhi bcom la /
NK051(zhi)004:490: dpal dang grags dang ye shes dang //
NK051(zhi)004:491: dbang phyug dang ni gzugs bzang dang //
NK051(zhi)004:492: brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan la /
NK051(zhi)004:493: rgyal po sh+aakya'i rigs su skyes pas kyang sh+aakya /
NK051(zhi)004:494: lus ngag yid gsum mi dge ba'i las la bsrung
NK051(zhi)004:495: mi dgos par rang bzhin gyis thub pas thub pa
NK051(zhi)004:496: zhes bya'o // bdag dang gzhan gyi don thams cad rdzogs shing /
NK051(zhi)004:497: sgrib pa thams cad sangs shing ye shes rgyas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:498: mi dang lha rkang gnyis su gnas pa'i gtso bor gyur bas mchog go //
NK051(zhi)004:499: yang na sku mchog tu gyur pas mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:500: gsung mchog tu gyur pas tshangs pa'i dbyangs lta bu /
NK051(zhi)004:501: thugs mchog tu gyur pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang /
NK051(zhi)004:502: yon tan mchog tu gyur pas yid bzhin gyi nor
NK051(zhi)004:503: bu rin po che ltar zad pa med pa dang
NK051(zhi)004:504: / phrin las mchog tu gyur pas 'gro don la thogs pa med pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:505: de ltar mchog rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:506: des tshul ji ltar bshad ce na /
NK051(zhi)004:507: nyid kyi zhal nas ljags bzang ba //
NK051(zhi)004:508: ring zhing yangs pa brkyang mdzad de //
NK051(zhi)004:509: zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
NK051(zhi)004:510: sh+aakya thub pa de nyid kyi ljags de ni dam
NK051(zhi)004:511: pa'i chos 'byung ba'i gnas yin pas bzang ba dang
NK051(zhi)004:512: / ljags kyis mi dge ba'i chos mi gsung bas bzang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:513: de'i mtshan nyid ni ring zhing zhal gyi nang du yangs pa'i ljags brkyang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:514: de las ci mdzad ce na /
NK051(zhi)004:515: 'jig rte gsum po snang mdzad cing //
NK051(zhi)004:516: bdud bzhi'i dgra rnams 'dul mdzad pa //
NK051(zhi)004:517: sems can rnams kyi ngan song gsum //
NK051(zhi)004:518: sbyong bar byed pa'i 'dzum bstan nas //
NK051(zhi)004:520: spyir de bzhin gshegs pa la rang bzhin gyi 'od kyang yod de /
NK051(zhi)004:521: de yang lha rnams nga rgyal bskyungs pa'i phyir 'od kyis mog mog por byas pa lta bu dang /
NK051(zhi)004:522: de bas kyang khyad par du ljags kyi rtse mo las 'od 'phros te /
NK051(zhi)004:523: dang por ri bya rkang can gsal bar byas /
NK051(zhi)004:526: gzugs med pa'i khams gsal bar byas /
NK051(zhi)004:527: 'od zer gyis bdud rnam pa bzhi yang btul /
NK051(zhi)004:528: 'od zer las khro tshogs spros te /
NK051(zhi)004:529: khyad par du rgyud bshad pa la bar du gcod pa'i lha'i bu'i bdud btul /
NK051(zhi)004:530: 'od zer sems can la phog pas long bas gzugs mthong /
NK051(zhi)004:533: dran pa nyams pa rnams dran pa gsal nas /
NK051(zhi)004:535: ngan song gsum la phog pas sdug bsngal dang bral /
NK051(zhi)004:537: de nas 'khor rnams la 'dzum pa mdzad pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:539: ljags las 'od zer bkye ba ni chos 'byung ba'i snga ltas gsum yin te /
NK051(zhi)004:540: me 'byung ba'i snga ltas su du ba lta ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:541: gsung gang gis gsungs she na /
NK051(zhi)004:542: tshangs pa'i gsung ni snyan pa yis //
NK051(zhi)004:543: 'jig rten gsum po kun bkang nas //
NK051(zhi)004:545: dper na tshangs pa gsung sgrogs kyi gsung ni snyan pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:553: zag pa med pa'i bde ba rgyud la skye ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:554: shin tu thag ring yang rung /
NK051(zhi)004:555: drung na 'dug pa ltar thos pa la sogs pa
NK051(zhi)004:556: gsung gi yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan
NK051(zhi)004:558: 'jig rten gsum du gsungs kyang sems can rnams skad rigs mi mthun pas go'am zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:559: las 'phro can gyis go bar 'gyur ro //
NK051(zhi)004:561: lag na rdo rje stobs po che //
NK051(zhi)004:562: gsang dbang la ni slar gsungs pa //
NK051(zhi)004:564: phyag na rdo rje ni sangs rgyas stong rtsa gcig gi tha chung yin pas /
NK051(zhi)004:565: sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pas dbang bskur ba yin te /
NK051(zhi)004:567: nga ni khro bo gos sngon can //
NK051(zhi)004:568: sangs rgyas thams cad 'a dus pa'i sku //
NK051(zhi)004:571: lag na rdo rje stobs po che //
NK051(zhi)004:573: 'o na 'di byin gyis brlabs pa'i bka' yin nam snyam pa la ma yin te /
NK051(zhi)004:574: dngos su gsungs pa'i bka' yin pas /
NK051(zhi)004:575: gsang dbang la ni slar gsungs pa //
NK051(zhi)004:577: gsang ba'i dbang thob pas kyang gsang dbang /
NK051(zhi)004:578: sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba la dbang bskur bas kyang gsang dbang /
NK051(zhi)004:579: gsang sngags kyi sdud pa po yin pas kyang gsang dbang /
NK051(zhi)004:580: sngags kyi theg pa la mnga' mdzad pa'i phyir gsang dbang ngo //
NK051(zhi)004:581: ston pas gong du glur blangs pa de phyag na rdo rje la yang slar gsungs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:582: dgos pa ci'i don du gsungs she na /
NK051(zhi)004:583: snying rje che dang ldan gyur pas //
NK051(zhi)004:584: 'gro la phan pa'i don du khyod //
NK051(zhi)004:585: ces pa la sogs pa smos te /
NK051(zhi)004:586: snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod 'gro ba
NK051(zhi)004:587: la 'di dang phyi mar phan pa'i don du khyod
NK051(zhi)004:588: nga la 'dri ba la 'di bshad do zhes pa'o
NK051(zhi)004:589: // gang gi mtshan nas brjod na don che zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:590: ye shes lus can 'jam dpal gyi //
NK051(zhi)004:591: ming brjod pas ni don che ba //
NK051(zhi)004:592: dag par byed cing sdig sel ba //
NK051(zhi)004:594: ye shes drug ro gcig pa'i lus can 'jam dpal nyid kyi ming nas brjod na don che ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:595: ci'i phyir don che zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:596: bklags pa tsam gyis rang gi rgyud la yod pa'i
NK051(zhi)004:597: sgrib pa thams cad dag par byed cing 'phral gyi
NK051(zhi)004:598: sdig pa thams cad sel bar byed pas don che
NK051(zhi)004:599: ba'o // 'khor la nyon cig par bskul ba'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)004:600: nga las nyan par brtson pa ni //
NK051(zhi)004:601: legs so dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
NK051(zhi)004:602: lag na rdo rje khyod legs so //
NK051(zhi)004:603: gsang ba'i bdag po de phyir ngas //
NK051(zhi)004:604: khyod la legs par bstan par bya //
NK051(zhi)004:605: khyod ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon //
NK051(zhi)004:607: sh+aakya thub pa nga la khyod nyan pa ni legs so //
NK051(zhi)004:609: 'jam dpal gyi don dri ba'i phyir ro //
NK051(zhi)004:610: gsang ba'i bdag po zhes sdud pa po la bos nas /
NK051(zhi)004:611: ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams la phan par byed pa de'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)004:612: khyod la mtshan yang dag par brjod pa rigs drug
NK051(zhi)004:613: gi bdag nyid can legs par bstan par bya yis
NK051(zhi)004:614: / khyod rtse gcig pa'i yid kyi nyon cig ces bskul ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:615: 'o na phyag na rdo rje yang bskul dgos sam zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:616: de dgos pa ma yin te /
NK051(zhi)004:617: phyag na rdo rjes mtshon nas phyi rabs kyi rnal
NK051(zhi)004:618: 'byor pa rnams la snod kyis ma zin pa dang
NK051(zhi)004:620: 'dres pa dang gsum spongs la nyon cig par gdams pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:621: de ltar gsungs pas 'khor rjes su yi rang ba ni /
NK051(zhi)004:622: bcom ldan de ni legs zhes gsol //
NK051(zhi)004:624: bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la 'jam dpal gyi chos
NK051(zhi)004:625: gnang ba de ni legs so zhes pa'i don to
NK051(zhi)004:626: // da ni rigs la gzigs pa'i le'u bstan pa'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)004:627: de nas bcom ldan sh+aakya thub //
NK051(zhi)004:628: ces pa la sogs pa smos te /
NK051(zhi)004:629: nyan par nges ma thag pa de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs zhes sbyar ro //
NK051(zhi)004:630: gsang sngags rigs chen thams cad dang //
NK051(zhi)004:631: zhes pa 'dis ni rigs bsdus pa la gzigs pa bstan te /
NK051(zhi)004:632: gsang sngags 'di man+t+ra zhes pa'i sgras skyob pa la 'jug ste /
NK051(zhi)004:633: mdor na thabs dang shes rab khyad par can la bya'o //
NK051(zhi)004:634: rigs las byung bas na rigs so //
NK051(zhi)004:636: rigs thams cad kyi bdag por gyur cing /
NK051(zhi)004:637: rigs thams cad 'dus pas na rigs chen no //
NK051(zhi)004:638: bya ba dang spyod pa dang rnal 'byor gyi theg
NK051(zhi)004:639: pa rnam pa rnams bskyed pa'i gnas su gyur pas
NK051(zhi)004:641: 'di'i dgos pa ni nyon mongs pa lnga cha mnyam du 'dul ba'i gnyen po ste /
NK051(zhi)004:643: gsang sngags rigs sngags 'chang ba'i rigs //
NK051(zhi)004:644: zhes pa 'dis ni las kyi rigs la gzigs pa bstan te /
NK051(zhi)004:645: gsang sngags ni pho ste thabs so //
NK051(zhi)004:646: rig sngags ni mo ste shes rab bo //
NK051(zhi)004:647: byed las ni gsang sngags kyis ni log par rtogs pa sel lo //
NK051(zhi)004:648: rig sngags kyis ni ma rig pa sel lo //
NK051(zhi)004:650: 'da' bar bya ba ma yin la //
NK051(zhi)004:651: dbye bar dka' ba gsang ba nyid //
NK051(zhi)004:652: gsang ste bsgrub phyir sngags pa ni //
NK051(zhi)004:653: gsang sngags zhes bya'i nges par brjod //
NK051(zhi)004:655: ngag gi rigs mchog bsgrub pa dang //
NK051(zhi)004:656: dngos grub 'dod pa yod pa ste //
NK051(zhi)004:657: de phyir rig sngags zhes bya'o //
NK051(zhi)004:660: 'di'i dgos pa ni gdul bya phrag dog dang le lo shas che ba rnams 'dul ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:661: rigs gsum la ni rnam par gzigs //
NK051(zhi)004:662: zhes pa 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la gzigs pa bstan te /
NK051(zhi)004:663: rigs gsum ni sku gsung thugs so //
NK051(zhi)004:664: rigs de gsum rnam snang la 'dus pas de skad ces bya'o //
NK051(zhi)004:665: 'di'i dgos pa ni gti mug shas che ba rnams 'dul bar byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:667: zhes pa 'dis ni pad+ma'i rigs la gzigs pa bstan te /
NK051(zhi)004:668: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa gnyis mkhyen te /
NK051(zhi)004:669: de yang gnyis su snang la gnyis su ma zhen pa'i tshul du mkhyen no //
NK051(zhi)004:670: des na 'jig rten las 'das pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:671: 'jig rten pa gnyis ka'i rigs so //
NK051(zhi)004:672: 'di'i dgos pa ni 'dod chags shas che ba rnams 'dul bar byed do //
NK051(zhi)004:673: 'jig rten snang byed rigs chen dang //
NK051(zhi)004:674: zhes pa 'dis ni rdo rje'i rigs la gzigs pa bstan te /
NK051(zhi)004:675: 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad snang la rang bzhin
NK051(zhi)004:676: med par me long gi gzugs brnyan ltar rtogs pas
NK051(zhi)004:678: thams cad kyi thugs kyi ngo bor gyur pas rigs chen no //
NK051(zhi)004:679: 'di'i dgos pa ni zhe sdang shas che ba rnams 'dul bar byed do //
NK051(zhi)004:680: phyag rgya chen po'i rigs mchog dang //
NK051(zhi)004:681: zhes pa 'dis ni rtsa ba byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i rigs bstan te /
NK051(zhi)004:682: phyag rgya la spyir du ma yod kyang 'dir rgyas 'degs pa'i phyir phyag rgya ste /
NK051(zhi)004:683: chos thams cad skye ba med pas rgyas 'debs pa'i mchog go //
NK051(zhi)004:684: 'di'i dgos pa ni spros pa'i mtshan ma thams cad 'joms par byed do //
NK051(zhi)004:685: rigs chen gtsug tor cher gzigs nas //
NK051(zhi)004:686: zhes pa 'dis ni rin po che'i rigs la gzigs pa bstan te /
NK051(zhi)004:687: rin chen 'byung ldan ni sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i
NK051(zhi)004:688: yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i rigs yin pas rigs
NK051(zhi)004:689: chen no // gtsug tor ni yon tan gyis mtho bar byas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:690: de yang ming gi rnam grangs ni gzigs zhes bya /
NK051(zhi)004:691: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug ces bya'o //
NK051(zhi)004:692: de yang tshul ji ltar gzigs na ye shes kyi
NK051(zhi)004:693: spyan gyis zab pa stong pa nyid ji lta ba'i
NK051(zhi)004:695: thugs rje'i spyan gyis rgya che ba ji snyed pa la gzigs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:697: spang bya nyon mongs pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:698: de spong ba'i gnyen po lha'i rigs dang /
NK051(zhi)004:699: lha'i rtog pa zlog par byed pa ye shes la gzigs pa rnams su yang sbyar ro //
NK051(zhi)004:700: da ni sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba man ngag gi le'u bstan pa'i phyir thams cad la bstod pa /
NK051(zhi)004:701: tshig gi bdag po tshigs su bcad //
NK051(zhi)004:703: tshig gi bdag po ni bcom ldan 'das nyid do //
NK051(zhi)004:704: tshigs su bcad pa ni rigs drug gi bdag nyid
NK051(zhi)004:705: tshig bar bdun pa nyid du tshigs su bcad de
NK051(zhi)004:706: ston pa gsung gi mnga' bdag yin pas bdag po
NK051(zhi)004:707: zhes kyang bya / rigs la gzigs pa thugs la rtogs nas /
NK051(zhi)004:708: tshig gi bdag pos tshigs su bcad //
NK051(zhi)004:710: gsang sngags rgyal po drug ldan zhing //
NK051(zhi)004:712: badz+ra t+aik+sh+na la sogs pa ye shes sems dpa' drug gi sngags drug go //
NK051(zhi)004:713: brjod bya'i gtso bo ji lta bu zhig gsungs she na /
NK051(zhi)004:714: gnyis su med par 'byung ba dang //
NK051(zhi)004:715: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK051(zhi)004:716: gzung 'dzin gnyis su med par ye shes kyi sku'i bdag nyid du sangs rgyas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:717: mi skye chos can 'di gsungs pa //
NK051(zhi)004:719: rig pa rang gsal ba de yang skye med kyi
NK051(zhi)004:720: rang bzhin du gnas pa ste 'bras bu'i mchog go
NK051(zhi)004:721: // blo brod pa bskyed pa'i phyir 'bras bu'i sa bstan pa ni /
NK051(zhi)004:722: a +aa i +ai u +au e ee o oo
NK051(zhi)004:723: am ah de yang sangs rgyas kyi sa bcu gnyis
NK051(zhi)004:724: la mtho dman dang rim pa yod pa ma yin
NK051(zhi)004:725: te / ye shes gcig la yon tan gyi bye brag bcu gnyis su bstan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:726: de yang sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis
NK051(zhi)004:727: ma rig pa bcom nas shes bya gsal bar snang
NK051(zhi)004:728: ba dang / nyon mongs pa ma spangs par ye shes su gsal ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:729: mtha' dang dbus med pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:730: mi 'gyur zhing dbyer mi phyed pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:731: sems can gyi dgos 'dod thams cad 'byung ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:732: 'gro ba'i don mdzad kyang skyon gyis ma gos pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:733: rtsol ba med par gzhan don 'grub pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:734: yang dag par dpes mtshon pa dang bral ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:735: phyogs 'dra tsam gyis mtshon du btub pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:736: rig pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:737: shes bya ji lta ba dang ji snyed pa thams cad mkhyen pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:738: so so rang rig pa gnyis su mkhyen pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:739: de rnams su sangs rgyas kyi yon tan ji snyed
NK051(zhi)004:740: cig gsungs pa thams cad 'dus pa shes par bya'o
NK051(zhi)004:741: // de yang 'di skad du rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las /
NK051(zhi)004:742: kun tu 'od kyi sa chen po //
NK051(zhi)004:744: bdud rtsi 'od ni gnyis pa ste //
NK051(zhi)004:746: nam mkha' 'od ni gsum pa ste //
NK051(zhi)004:747: nam mkha' ji bzhin rab tu gnas //
NK051(zhi)004:748: rdo rje'i 'od ni bzhi pa ste //
NK051(zhi)004:749: sa de nyid ni yid dga' ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:750: lnga pa rin chen 'od ces pa //
NK051(zhi)004:751: dbang bskur ba la rab tu gnas //
NK051(zhi)004:753: pad+ma bzhin du rab tu phyees //
NK051(zhi)004:754: bdun pa las kyi 'od ces bya //
NK051(zhi)004:755: sangs rgyas phrin las byed par 'dod //
NK051(zhi)004:756: brgyad pa dpe med ces pa ste //
NK051(zhi)004:757: don la dpe dang mnyam pa min //
NK051(zhi)004:758: dpe don zhes pa dgu pa yin //
NK051(zhi)004:759: thams cad dpe ni so sor 'bigs //
NK051(zhi)004:760: bcu pa shes rab 'od ces pa //
NK051(zhi)004:761: sangs rgyas sa ni bla na med //
NK051(zhi)004:762: bcu gcig thams cad mkhyen pa nyid //
NK051(zhi)004:763: sa chen rab tu 'od gsal ba //
NK051(zhi)004:764: bcu gnyis so sor rang rig pa //
NK051(zhi)004:765: sangs rgyas ye shes rab tu rdzogs //
NK051(zhi)004:767: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs kyi bdag nyid du 'jam dpal nyid bstan pa'i phyir //
NK051(zhi)004:768: s+thi to h+r+ai di ni zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
NK051(zhi)004:769: s+thi to h+r+ai di ni thugs kar gnas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:770: dz+ny+aa na m+aur+t+ti ni ye shes kyi sku'o //
NK051(zhi)004:771: ra ham bud+d+ho ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas so //
NK051(zhi)004:772: bud+d+ha n+aam ni bdag nyid sangs rgyas yin no //
NK051(zhi)004:773: t+r+yad+h+wa bar+t+ti n+aam ni dus gsum du bzhugs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:774: mtha' bsdus pas ni dus gsum du bzhugs pa'i sangs
NK051(zhi)004:775: rgyas kyi ye shes kyi sku'i bdag nyid thugs ka
NK051(zhi)004:776: la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas yin zhes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:777: de la shes rab kyi 'khor lo bsgom pa bstan pa ni /
NK051(zhi)004:778: badz+ra t+aik+sh+na ni rdo rje rnon po'o //
NK051(zhi)004:779: duhkha ts+tshe da ni sdug bsngal gcod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:780: pra dz+ny+aa dz+ny+aa na m+aurta ye ni ye shes kyi gtsug tor ro //
NK051(zhi)004:781: dz+ny+aa na k+aa ya ni ye shes kyi sku can no //
NK051(zhi)004:782: w+aa g+ai shwa ra ni ngag gi dbang phyug go //
NK051(zhi)004:783: a ra pa tsa n+aa ya te na mahni skye
NK051(zhi)004:784: ba med pa'i shes rab chags pa med pa'i spyod
NK051(zhi)004:785: yul zhes pa'o // de dag ni pad+ma dang /
NK051(zhi)004:790: byang sems rdo rje'i rigs te /
NK051(zhi)004:791: go rim bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
NK051(zhi)004:792: bsgom zhing sngags bzlas pa'i tshe na ni bdag nyid
NK051(zhi)004:793: rje btsun du bsgoms pa'i thugs kar 'khor lo rtsibs
NK051(zhi)004:794: drug mu khyud dang ldan pa la sngags drug po
NK051(zhi)004:795: 'di bkod pa spro bsdu bya zhing bzlas pa bya'o
NK051(zhi)004:796: // mtshan brjod 'dod pa'i dus su ni //
NK051(zhi)004:797: 'di rnams ming gi gtso bo rnams kyi sgo nas bstod pa yin par shes par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)004:798: da ni rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi sgo nas
NK051(zhi)004:799: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i le'u bstan pa ni
NK051(zhi)004:801: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
NK051(zhi)004:802: da ni de'i mtshan rgyas par bshad pa ni 'di ltar yin zhes bya'o //
NK051(zhi)004:803: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i rgyu ni /
NK051(zhi)004:804: chos skye ba med pa bsgoms pa las 'byung bas /
NK051(zhi)004:805: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas a las byung //
NK051(zhi)004:807: 'o na yi ge a gcig pu las byung ba ci yin zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:808: a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog /
NK051(zhi)004:810: ci'i phyir mchog yin zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:811: chos kyi don chen po ston pa'i yi ge yin pas /
NK051(zhi)004:812: don chen yi ge dam pa yin //
NK051(zhi)004:814: de yang ci'i phyir na don chen skye ba med pa'i don ston pas /
NK051(zhi)004:815: khong nas 'byung ba skye ba med //
NK051(zhi)004:817: yi ge gzhan ni so lce mchu dang ya rkan la sogs pa rnams la rag lus la /
NK051(zhi)004:818: a ni de rnams la rag ma lus te /
NK051(zhi)004:819: khong nas rang byung du 'byung bas yi ge rnasama kyi nang na dam pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:820: de nyid la brjod du med par gnas pas /
NK051(zhi)004:821: tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa ste //
NK051(zhi)004:823: brjod pa'i sgra thams cad kyi rgyu'i gtso bor gyur te ngag thams cad la 'jug par byed pas /
NK051(zhi)004:824: brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog /
NK051(zhi)004:825: tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed //
NK051(zhi)004:826: ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
NK051(zhi)004:827: 'o na nyon mongs pa ji ltar spang zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:828: mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che //
NK051(zhi)004:829: sems can thams cad dga' bar byed //
NK051(zhi)004:830: ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
NK051(zhi)004:831: mchod pa ni lha mnyes par byed pa'i phyir na mchod pa ste /
NK051(zhi)004:832: 'dir nyon mongs pa ma spangs par ye shes su
NK051(zhi)004:833: grub pa dgongs pa mthun te rang gis ngang gi
NK051(zhi)004:834: mchod pa'o // de nas kun la sbyar ro //
NK051(zhi)004:835: chen po'i sgra ni dper na dug sel ba'i sngags
NK051(zhi)004:836: la dug sngags zer ba ltar mi mthun pa'i phyogs
NK051(zhi)004:838: 'dod chags ni nyon mongs mnyam pa nyid la ngang gis chags pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:839: des log pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar byed cing zag med kyi dga' ba skyed par byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:840: mchod pa chen po zhe sdang che //
NK051(zhi)004:841: nyon mongs kun gyi dgra che ba //
NK051(zhi)004:842: zhes pa rnam par rtog pa 'joms pa'i zhe sdang mnga' la /
NK051(zhi)004:843: zhe sdang rang kha ma 'joms pas dgra che ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:844: mchod pa chen po gti mug che //
NK051(zhi)004:845: gti mug blo ste gti mug sel //
NK051(zhi)004:846: zhes pa chos tha dad du byed pa med pa'i
NK051(zhi)004:847: don gyi gti mug dang ldan pas des gti mug
NK051(zhi)004:849: mchod pa chen po khro ba che //
NK051(zhi)004:850: khro ba chen po dgra che ba //
NK051(zhi)004:852: nyon mongs pa skyer mi ster bas khro ba che la /
NK051(zhi)004:853: des khong khro rang kha ma 'joms pas dgra che ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:854: mchod pa chen po chags pa che //
NK051(zhi)004:855: chags pa thams cad sel bar byed //
NK051(zhi)004:856: ces pa don zag med kyi bde ba la chags la /
NK051(zhi)004:857: ser sna'i chags zhen rang kha ma sel bar byed do //
NK051(zhi)004:858: de la gong ma gong ma ni 'joms byed /
NK051(zhi)004:860: de dag la man ngag tu sbyar na rnam pa bzhi ste /
NK051(zhi)004:861: nyon mongs pa de dag la zhen po'i gdul bya
NK051(zhi)004:862: la de dag ma spangs pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i
NK051(zhi)004:863: spyod pa'i thabs kyis grol bar byed pas spyod mthun
NK051(zhi)004:865: nyon mongs pa ye shes lngar gnas gyur pas gnas gyur ye shes kyi mchod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:866: nyon mongs pa lnga las grol bas rigs lnga'i sku
NK051(zhi)004:867: phyag rgya chen po thob pas grol thar phyag rgya'i
NK051(zhi)004:868: mchod pa'o // nyon mongs pa la brtags na ngo
NK051(zhi)004:869: bo grub pa med de chos nyid du gnas pa
NK051(zhi)004:870: rang bzhin dag pa'i mchod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:871: 'dod pa chen po bde ba che //
NK051(zhi)004:872: dga' ba chen po mgu ba che //
NK051(zhi)004:873: zhes sems can thar par 'dod pa'i blo yod pa
NK051(zhi)004:874: la thar pa'i bde ba skyed par byed cing chos
NK051(zhi)004:876: don rtogs pas mgu bar byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:877: gzugs che lus kyang che ba ste /
NK051(zhi)004:878: kha dog che zhing lus bong che //
NK051(zhi)004:879: ming yang che zhing rgya che ba //
NK051(zhi)004:880: dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa yin //
NK051(zhi)004:881: zhes snang la rang bzhin med pa'i gzugs dang /
NK051(zhi)004:882: gdos po can gyi lus lta bur yang sprul te /
NK051(zhi)004:883: de yang ye shes las sgrub pa yin pas che zhes bya'o //
NK051(zhi)004:884: nang na ye shes gsal ba'i rtags su sku gzi mdangs dang ldan pas kha dog che ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:885: gzhan zil gyis gnon pas lus bong che ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:886: grags pa chen po yod pas mi che ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:887: bsod nams kyi tshogs rgyas par rgya che ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:888: 'dir zab pa dang rgya che ba gnyis su med pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:889: no pi ka mtha' dag 'byung bas dkyil 'khor chen po'o //
NK051(zhi)004:890: kun la khyab pa dang gang yang bkag pa med pas yangs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:891: de la ye shes kyi khyad par ni /
NK051(zhi)004:892: shes rab mtshon chen 'chang ba ste //
NK051(zhi)004:893: nyon mongs lcags kyu che ba'i mchog /
NK051(zhi)004:894: grags chen snyan grags chen po ste //
NK051(zhi)004:895: snang ba chen po gsal ba che //
NK051(zhi)004:897: shes rab kyi mtshon gyis nyon mongs pa 'joms pa ste /
NK051(zhi)004:898: dper na nyon mongs pa glang po che smyon pa la ye shes lcags kyus 'dul ba lta bu'o //
NK051(zhi)004:899: de yang khams gsum du grags pa khyad par can yod pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:900: nang du ye shes gsal ba'i rtags su phyir 'od zer gsal bas bskor ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:901: de la sprul pa'i tshul ji ltar 'byung zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:903: sgyu 'phrul chen po don grub pa //
NK051(zhi)004:904: sgyu 'phrul chen po dga' bas dga' //
NK051(zhi)004:907: 'gro ba la tshogs gnyis rdzogs par byed pa'i thabs la mkhas pa ste /
NK051(zhi)004:908: sgyu ma lta bu'i sprul pas 'gro ba'i don mdzad
NK051(zhi)004:909: pa'i thabs kyis gang la gang 'dod pa'i don 'grub
NK051(zhi)004:912: sems ni sgyu ma'i rnam pa ste //
NK051(zhi)004:913: byang chub kyang ni sgyu ma 'dra //
NK051(zhi)004:914: dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'gas //
NK051(zhi)004:915: gyo mo la ni sngags bzlas te //
NK051(zhi)004:916: sbyor ba goms pas bsnun na ni //
NK051(zhi)004:917: rkang bzhi pa la sogs pa'i gzugs //
NK051(zhi)004:918: zhen pa'i sems la snang bar 'gyur //
NK051(zhi)004:920: thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don la dga' ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:921: shes rab kyis gnyis med kyi don la dga' ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:922: med pa 'phrul zhing yod pa bsgyur ba dang 'dra ste /
NK051(zhi)004:923: don zab mo ma rtogs pa rnams mig 'phrul bstan nas dngos 'dzin zlog par byed do //
NK051(zhi)004:924: des thun mong gi lam ji lta bu ston zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:925: sbyin bdag chen po gtso bo ste //
NK051(zhi)004:926: tshul khrims chen po 'chang ba'i mchog /
NK051(zhi)004:927: bzod chen 'chang ba brtan pa po //
NK051(zhi)004:928: brtson 'grus chen po brtul ba yin //
NK051(zhi)004:929: bsam gtan chen po'i ting 'dzin gnas //
NK051(zhi)004:930: shes rab chen po lus 'chang ba //
NK051(zhi)004:931: stobs po che la thabs che ba //
NK051(zhi)004:932: smon lam ye shes rgya mtsho ste //
NK051(zhi)004:934: 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa gtong bas sbyin pa'i gtso bo'o //
NK051(zhi)004:935: nyes byas mi 'byung bas tshul khrims chen po'o //
NK051(zhi)004:936: mtshan mas mi 'khrugs pas bzod pa brtan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:937: rtog pas ma gos pas brtson 'grus brtul ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:938: g.yeng ba'i dgra med pas bsam gtan chen po'o //
NK051(zhi)004:939: gnyis med rtogs pas shes rab chen po'o //
NK051(zhi)004:940: bdud kyi dpung 'joms pas stobs che ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:941: bdag dang gzhan grol bar byed pa'i thabs sna tshogs mnga' bas thabs che bar 'gyur ro //
NK051(zhi)004:942: bdag dang gzhan grol bar byed pa'i smon lam mnga' bas dang /
NK051(zhi)004:943: ji lta ba dang ji snyed pa mkhyen pa'i ye shes mnga' ba ste /
NK051(zhi)004:945: snang la zhen pa med pa rgya mtsho dang 'dra'o //
NK051(zhi)004:946: de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang rje btsun ldan la /
NK051(zhi)004:947: gzhan la yang ston par mdzad do //
NK051(zhi)004:948: byams chen rang bzhin dpag tu med //
NK051(zhi)004:949: snying rje chen po blo yi mchog /
NK051(zhi)004:950: ces pa 'gro ba la bu gcig pa'i ma bzhin du byams la /
NK051(zhi)004:951: de nyid la ma zhen pa'i byams pa chen po'o //
NK051(zhi)004:952: ris su ma chad pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:953: res 'jog med pas dpag tu med do //
NK051(zhi)004:954: 'gro ba la snying rje rgyun mi 'chad pas che ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:955: de nyid la'ang ma zhen pas blo'i mchog go //
NK051(zhi)004:956: 'o na tshad med pa bzhi yod pa la dga'
NK051(zhi)004:957: ba dang btang snyoms ma smos pa ci yin zhe
NK051(zhi)004:958: na / de ni chos zlas dbye ba ste shugs la bstan to //
NK051(zhi)004:959: thabs shes rab kyi khyad par ci zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:960: shes rab chen po blo chen ldan //
NK051(zhi)004:961: mkhas pa chen po thabs che ba //
NK051(zhi)004:963: chos rab tu rnam par phye nas gnyis med rtogs pa'i shes rab chen po mnga' ba ste /
NK051(zhi)004:964: des 'gro ba'i don byed pa'i blo gros dang ldan
NK051(zhi)004:965: pa'i sgo nas thabs kyi bya ba la mkhas te
NK051(zhi)004:966: / gdul bya'i bsam pa dang sbyar nas gang la ji ltar 'dul ba'i thabs sna tshogs ston pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:967: thabs dang shes rab ni khyab che ste /
NK051(zhi)004:968: lam dang 'bras bus bsdus pa yongs la gnas so //
NK051(zhi)004:969: 'o na rdzu 'phrul gyi sgo ji lta bus don mdzad ce na /
NK051(zhi)004:970: rdzu 'phrul chen po'i stobs dang ldan //
NK051(zhi)004:971: shugs chen mgyogs pa chen po ste //
NK051(zhi)004:972: rdzu 'phrul chen po cher grags pa //
NK051(zhi)004:973: stobs chen pha rol gnon pa po //
NK051(zhi)004:977: gcig du mar byed pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:978: du ma gcig tu byed pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:979: stong gsum phyag rgyar shong ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:980: phyag rgya stong gsum du sprul pa la sogs pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:983: 'gro ba'i don byed pa la yid ltar mgyogs pa'i shugs dang ldan zhing /
NK051(zhi)004:987: byang chub sems pa rnams la cher grags so //
NK051(zhi)004:988: ye shes kyi stobs kyis bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon pa ste che ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:989: de'i nus mthu dngos gang zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:990: srid pa'i ri bo chen po 'joms //
NK051(zhi)004:991: mkhregs shing rdo rje chen po 'chang //
NK051(zhi)004:992: drag po chen po drag tshul che //
NK051(zhi)004:995: yang nas yang du 'gro ba drug tu skye bas srid pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:996: de ri bo ltar gzhom dka' bas /
NK051(zhi)004:997: gnyis med rtogs pas 'joms par byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:998: de'i mtshan nyid mi 'gyur bas mkhregs la /
NK051(zhi)004:999: stong pa nyid rdo rje ltar dbyer mi phyed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1001: mi phyed mi chod mi shigs pas //
NK051(zhi)004:1002: stong pa nyid la rdo rjer bshad //
NK051(zhi)004:1004: de yang don gyi sgo nas bag chags thams cad
NK051(zhi)004:1005: 'joms pas drag po che la rtags kyi sgo nas
NK051(zhi)004:1006: gdug pa can thams cad 'dul bar byed pa'i drag
NK051(zhi)004:1010: ma h+aa de ba la sogs pa 'jigs chen rnams rje btsun gyis 'jigs par byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1011: khyad par gyi lam gyi tshul gang zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:1012: mgon po rigs mchog chen po ste //
NK051(zhi)004:1013: bla ma gsang sngags che ba'i mchog /
NK051(zhi)004:1014: theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas //
NK051(zhi)004:1015: theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog /
NK051(zhi)004:1017: gdul bya'i mgon skyabs mdzad pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi
NK051(zhi)004:1018: lha'i rigs la mchog tu gyur cing 'gro ba la
NK051(zhi)004:1019: dam pa'i chos nye bar ston pas bla ma /
NK051(zhi)004:1020: thabs dang shes rab khyad par can ston pas gsang sngags che ba'i mchog go //
NK051(zhi)004:1022: don gcig na yang ma rmongs dang //
NK051(zhi)004:1023: thabs mang dka' ba med pa dang //
NK051(zhi)004:1024: dbang po rnon po'i dbang byas pas //
NK051(zhi)004:1025: sa dang pha rol phyin pa bas //
NK051(zhi)004:1026: sngags kyi bstan pa khyad par 'phags //
NK051(zhi)004:1028: de yang theg pa chen po ni shes rab dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1029: snying rjes khyad par du byas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1030: skal pa can de la gzud pa'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)004:1031: rang nyid kyang de la gnas pa'i tshul ston no //
NK051(zhi)004:1032: theg pa chen po 'di'i tshul pha rol tu phyin pa las mchog tu gyur to //
NK051(zhi)004:1033: gang gis na 'khor 'das dbyer med du ston pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1034: da ni chos kyi dbyings kyi sgo nas 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i mtshan bstan pa'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)004:1035: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che //
NK051(zhi)004:1036: thub pa chen po thub chen ldan //
NK051(zhi)004:1037: gsang sngags tshul chen las byung ba //
NK051(zhi)004:1038: gsang sngags tshul chen bdag nyid can //
NK051(zhi)004:1040: sgrib pa sangs shing ye shes rgyas pas gdul bya la rnam pa sna tshogs su snang zhing /
NK051(zhi)004:1042: sku gsung thugs mi dge ba'i las la bsrung mi
NK051(zhi)004:1043: dgos par thub la de yang dus rtag tu mnyam
NK051(zhi)004:1044: pa la bzhag pas thub chen ldan no //
NK051(zhi)004:1045: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mthu ston pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1046: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i srog bskul bas na sngags so //
NK051(zhi)004:1047: de nyid rtogs dka' ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1048: gzhan la bstan pa ma yin pas gsang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1050: de las sangs rgyas 'byung ba ste //
NK051(zhi)004:1051: de ni khyad par gyi lam mo //
NK051(zhi)004:1052: rje btsun nyid gsang sngags kyi ngo bo nyid du bzhugs pas na bdag nyid can no //
NK051(zhi)004:1053: thun mong gi lam gang zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:1054: pha rol phyin bcu thob pa ste //
NK051(zhi)004:1055: pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas //
NK051(zhi)004:1056: pha rol phyin bcu dag pa ste //
NK051(zhi)004:1057: pha rol phyin pa bcu yi tshul //
NK051(zhi)004:1059: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu la dbang thob cing /
NK051(zhi)004:1060: gzhan de la gzud pa'i phyir rang yang de la gnas pa'i tshul ston pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1061: de rnams la ma zhen pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1062: de dag gi gzhung tshul la mkhas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1063: mgon po sa bcu'i dbang phyug ste //
NK051(zhi)004:1064: sa bcu la ni gnas pa po //
NK051(zhi)004:1065: zhes pas ni yon tan 'phel ba'i rten byed pas
NK051(zhi)004:1066: shes rab dang ting nge 'dzin la sa zhes bya
NK051(zhi)004:1067: ste / de yang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems thob pas sa dang po rab tu dga' ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1068: tshul khrims 'chal ba'i dri ma dang bral bas gnyis pa dri ma med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1069: mchog tu gsal ba'i shes rab thob pas gsum pa 'od byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1070: byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos kyi 'od 'phro bas bzhi pa 'od 'phro ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1071: bsam gtan dang 'gro don mdzad pa gnyis 'dzom pas
NK051(zhi)004:1072: rang gi rgyud sbyang bar dka' ba sbyong bar mdzad
NK051(zhi)004:1073: pas lnga pa sbyang dka' ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1074: mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du gyur pas drug pa mngon du gyur pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1075: mtshan ma las ring du song bas na bdun pa ring du song ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1076: ting nge 'dzin de la mtshan ma gang gis kyang
NK051(zhi)004:1077: mi g.yo bar gnas pas brgyad pa mi g.yo ba'o
NK051(zhi)004:1078: // gdul bya rnams la chos ston pa'i blo gros
NK051(zhi)004:1079: chen po dang ldan pas dgu pa legs pa'i blo
NK051(zhi)004:1080: // gros so // chos kyi char gyis gdul bya'i
NK051(zhi)004:1081: chos kyi lo tog smin par byed pa'i yon tan
NK051(zhi)004:1082: gyi sprin chen po dang ldan pas bcu pa chos
NK051(zhi)004:1084: sa bcu la dbang bsgyur zhing gzhan la 'chad pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1085: gzhan de la gzud bar bya ba'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)004:1086: de la gnas pa'i tshul bstan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1087: der yang ma zad de che ba'i yon tan du mar snang ba'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)004:1088: shes bcu rnam dag bdag nyid can //
NK051(zhi)004:1089: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
NK051(zhi)004:1090: shes pa bcu ni chos shes pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1091: rjes su 'gro ba shes pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1092: pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1099: mi skye ba shes pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1100: shes pa bcu po de rang bzhin med par shes pas rnam dag go //
NK051(zhi)004:1101: de rnams gzhan la ston pas /
NK051(zhi)004:1102: shes bcu rnam dag 'chang ba po //
NK051(zhi)004:1104: rnam pa bcu po don bcu'i don //
NK051(zhi)004:1105: zhes pa rnam pa bcu ni 'khor ba'i chos phung po lnga dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1106: nyon mongs pa lnga ste bcu'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1107: 'khor ba'i chos thams cad bsdus na der 'dus so //
NK051(zhi)004:1108: de dag rnam par dag pas don bcu ste /
NK051(zhi)004:1109: rigs lnga ye shes lnga ste bcu'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1110: de bcu ni don du gnyer bar bya ba'i 'os yin pas don zhes bya'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1111: thub dbang stobs bcu khyab pas bdag /
NK051(zhi)004:1112: ces pa thub pa ni rgyal ba rnams so //
NK051(zhi)004:1113: de rnams kyi gtso bor gyur pas thub dbang ngo //
NK051(zhi)004:1114: stobs bcu ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1115: las dang 'bras bu mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1116: khams rnams ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1117: lam sna tshogs pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1118: pha rol gyi mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1119: dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1120: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1121: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1122: skye ba dang 'chi 'pho ba mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1123: zag bcas dang zag med mkhyen pa'i stobs so //
NK051(zhi)004:1124: de yang thugs rje chen pos kun la khyab pa'i bdag nyid du bzhugs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1125: thugs rjes khyab pa tsam ma yin te /
NK051(zhi)004:1126: gdul bya ma lus pa'i don ji ltar 'tshams par mdzad pas /
NK051(zhi)004:1127: kun gyi don ni ma lus byed //
NK051(zhi)004:1128: ces pa smos pa yin no //
NK051(zhi)004:1129: rnam ba cu dbang ldan che ba po //
NK051(zhi)004:1130: zhes pa rje btsun nyid dbang bcu'i yon tan dang ldan te /
NK051(zhi)004:1141: de ltar na mtshan ma can gyi skyon du mi 'gyur ram zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:1142: thog ma med pa spros med bdag /
NK051(zhi)004:1143: de bzhin nyid bdag dag pas bdag /
NK051(zhi)004:1145: chos nyid la thog mtha' med pa la brtags pa'i
NK051(zhi)004:1146: mtha' thams cad dang bral bas spros pa med pa'o
NK051(zhi)004:1147: // 'gyur ba med pas de bzhin nyid do //
NK051(zhi)004:1148: gzung 'dzin gyi dri ma med pas dag pa'i bdag go //
NK051(zhi)004:1149: de ltar na gzhan gyi don la ji ltar 'jug ce na /
NK051(zhi)004:1150: bden par smra zhing tshig mi 'gyur //
NK051(zhi)004:1151: ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed //
NK051(zhi)004:1152: gnyis med gnyis su med par ston //
NK051(zhi)004:1153: gzhan mi bslu bar don dang mthun par smra bas bden par smra la /
NK051(zhi)004:1154: gzhan don byed par dam bcas pa kho na bzhin du mdzad pas tshig mi 'gyur ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1155: chos thams cad sgyu ma'am rmi lam lta bu yin
NK051(zhi)004:1156: no zhes smra ba kho na bzhin du rang yang
NK051(zhi)004:1158: rjes su mthu na pas gzhan mos pa bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
NK051(zhi)004:1159: des mi mthun pa'i phyogs zil gyis gnon par bstan pa ni /
NK051(zhi)004:1160: yang dag mtha' la rnam par gnas //
NK051(zhi)004:1161: bdag med seng ge'i sgra dang ldan //
NK051(zhi)004:1162: mu stegs ri dwags ngan 'jigs byed //
NK051(zhi)004:1163: kun tu 'gro ba'i don yod stobs //
NK051(zhi)004:1164: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid ltar mgyogs //
NK051(zhi)004:1166: yang dag pa'i mtha' gnyis med la gnas nas /
NK051(zhi)004:1167: bdag dang bdag gir mngon par zhen pa med pa'i
NK051(zhi)004:1168: chos kyi sgra 'jigs pa med par sgrogs par byed
NK051(zhi)004:1169: pa / seng ge'i sgra lta bus lta ba log
NK051(zhi)004:1170: pa bdag tu rtog cing nang pa la smod pa'i
NK051(zhi)004:1171: ri dwags lta bu ngan pa 'jigs shing skrag par
NK051(zhi)004:1172: byed cing 'gro ba kun gyi don skyes bu'i stobs
NK051(zhi)004:1173: ltar ji ltar yang snang nas mdzad do //
NK051(zhi)004:1174: de yang 'gro ba'i don la de ka bzhin du gshegs te /
NK051(zhi)004:1175: myur bar mdzad pa'i dpe ni yid lta bu'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1176: de la sku'i yon tan ji ltar snang na /
NK051(zhi)004:1177: rgyal ba rnam rgyal dgra las rgyal //
NK051(zhi)004:1178: 'khor los sgyur ba stobs po che //
NK051(zhi)004:1179: tshogs kyi slob dpon tshogs kyi mchog /
NK051(zhi)004:1180: tshogs rje tshogs bdag dbang dang ldan //
NK051(zhi)004:1181: mthu chen gces par 'dzin pa ste //
NK051(zhi)004:1182: tshul chen gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog /
NK051(zhi)004:1184: yon tan gyi bgo skal gyis ma pham pas rgyal ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1185: rnam par rtog pa las rgyal ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1186: dgra bdud bzhi las rgyal ba ste /
NK051(zhi)004:1187: 'jig rten pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ltar
NK051(zhi)004:1188: sprul nas 'gro ba'i don mdzad pas kyang 'khor los
NK051(zhi)004:1189: sgyur ba'o // chos kyi 'khor lo skor bas 'gro
NK051(zhi)004:1190: ba rnams kyi kha lo sgyur bas kyang 'khor los
NK051(zhi)004:1191: sgyur ba'o // sgyur ba'o // dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo mdzad pas kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1192: gzhan gyi dpung 'joms pas kyang stobs che ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1193: de yang nyan thos kyi tshogs kyi slob dpon mdzad cing /
NK051(zhi)004:1194: rang rgyal ba 'dren pas na tshogs kyi mchog go //
NK051(zhi)004:1195: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi rje bo mdzad cing /
NK051(zhi)004:1196: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs kyi bdag po mdzad /
NK051(zhi)004:1197: de rnams la dbang bsgyur ba'i mthu dang ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1198: der yang ma zad de gzung 'dzin 'joms pa'i mthu
NK051(zhi)004:1199: chen po mnga' bas shin tu gces pa'i chos ni
NK051(zhi)004:1200: gnyis med yin pas de 'chang bas 'dzin pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1201: des na lam bgrod du med pas /
NK051(zhi)004:1202: gzhan gyi bkri mi dgos pa ste /
NK051(zhi)004:1203: des na gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1204: de la gsung gi yon tan ji lta bu 'byung zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:1205: tshig rje tshig bdag smra mkhas pa //
NK051(zhi)004:1206: tshig la dbang ba tshig mtha' yas //
NK051(zhi)004:1207: tshig bden bden par smra ba ste //
NK051(zhi)004:1208: bden pa bzhi ni ston pa po //
NK051(zhi)004:1210: 'dis ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bstan te /
NK051(zhi)004:1211: tshig rje ni don so so yang dag par rig pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1212: tshig bdag ni nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1213: smra ba mkhas pa ni chos so so yang dag par rig pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1214: tshig la dbang ba ni spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1215: sgra skad sna tshogs kyis don mdzad pas tshig mtha' yas so //
NK051(zhi)004:1216: mi bslu ba'i chos gsungs pas tshig bden la /
NK051(zhi)004:1217: de yang kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis su phye nas smra ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1222: de ltar bden pa bzhi phye nas kyang /
NK051(zhi)004:1224: nges par 'byung ba'i chos su ji ltar gnang zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:1225: phyir mi ldog pa phyir mi 'ong //
NK051(zhi)004:1226: 'dren pa rang rgyal bse ru'i tshul //
NK051(zhi)004:1228: 'byung ba chen po rgyu gcig po //
NK051(zhi)004:1229: dge slong dgra bcom zag pa zad //
NK051(zhi)004:1230: 'dod chags bral bas dbang po thul //
NK051(zhi)004:1231: bde ba rnyed pas 'jigs med thob //
NK051(zhi)004:1233: spyir bzod pa thob nas ngan song du mi ldog /
NK051(zhi)004:1234: sa dang po thob nas 'khor bar mi ldog /
NK051(zhi)004:1235: sa brgyad pa non nas theg dman du mi ldog ste /
NK051(zhi)004:1236: de phyin chad rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog ste /
NK051(zhi)004:1238: 'gro ba'i don du sprul pa ni ma gtogs so //
NK051(zhi)004:1239: de la 'dren pa rang rgyal ni ne tso ltar tshogs na spyod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1240: bse ru ni bse ru ltar gcig pur gnas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1241: rje btsun der yang sprul lo //
NK051(zhi)004:1242: der yang ma zad de theg pa sna tshogs kyi sgo nas gang la gang gis 'dul ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1243: khams gsum las nges par 'byung ba'i lam sna tshogs ston par mdzad cing /
NK051(zhi)004:1244: 'byung ba chen po lngar snang nas kyang don mdzad de /
NK051(zhi)004:1245: de dag gi rgyu ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
NK051(zhi)004:1246: de yang dge ba lam du slong zhing /
NK051(zhi)004:1247: nyon mongs pa'i dgra 'joms pas srid par skye ba'i zag pa zad do //
NK051(zhi)004:1248: 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa dang bral bas spyod yul gyis mi gos te /
NK051(zhi)004:1249: mig la sogs yul lnga la mi chags par shar bas /
NK051(zhi)004:1250: 'khor ba'i g.yangs sas 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro //
NK051(zhi)004:1251: de 'chang ba po'i tshul ci 'dra zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:1252: bsil bar gyur pas rnyog pa med //
NK051(zhi)004:1253: rig pa dang ni rkang par ldan //
NK051(zhi)004:1254: bde gshegs 'jig rten rig pa'i mchog /
NK051(zhi)004:1256: bden pa gnyis kyi tshul la gnas //
NK051(zhi)004:1257: 'khor ba'i pha rol mthar son pa //
NK051(zhi)004:1258: bya ba byas pa skam sar gnas //
NK051(zhi)004:1261: bsil ba chu lta bu'i chos nyid kyis nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba sel zhing /
NK051(zhi)004:1262: glo bur gyi rnam par rtog pa dri ma chu'i rnyog ma lta bu dang bral te /
NK051(zhi)004:1263: mig dang 'dra ba'i lta ba rig pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1264: rkang pa dang 'dra bar spyod pa zung 'brel du
NK051(zhi)004:1265: ldan pas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dang bral bas bde
NK051(zhi)004:1266: bar gshegs pa la sems can gyi las 'phro dang
NK051(zhi)004:1267: / mos pa dang snod du rung mi rung dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1268: 'dul ba'i dus la bab ma bab mkhyen pas nyan thos dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1269: rang rgyal las khyad par du 'phags pas 'jig rten rig pa'i mchog go //
NK051(zhi)004:1270: mngon sum du snang ba 'di sgyu ma lta bur
NK051(zhi)004:1271: mkhyen pas phyi yul la bdag gir mi 'dzin la
NK051(zhi)004:1272: / nang sems la ngar mi 'dzin te /
NK051(zhi)004:1273: rang don dang gzhan don gyi dbang gis bden pa gnyis kyi tshul la gnas par byed do //
NK051(zhi)004:1274: 'o na 'khor bar mi 'gyur ram zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:1275: 'khor ba'i pha rol mthar son te /
NK051(zhi)004:1276: bya ba byas nas stobs dang ldan pa 'dam nas
NK051(zhi)004:1277: thon pa ltar 'khor ba'i 'dam nas thon te byang
NK051(zhi)004:1278: chub kyi skam sa la gnas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1279: de'i rgyu ni gnyis su med par rtogs pa'i ye shes 'ba' zhig la gzugs sku gnyis 'byung ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1280: des bstan pa'i chos gang zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:1281: shes rab mtshon chas rnam 'joms pa /
NK051(zhi)004:1282: dam chos chos rgyal gsal bar ldan //
NK051(zhi)004:1283: 'jig rten snang bar byed pa'i mchog /
NK051(zhi)004:1284: ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
NK051(zhi)004:1285: shes rab mtshon cha lta bus nyon mongs pa 'joms pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1286: dam pa'i chos rgyal po lta bu thugs la gsal
NK051(zhi)004:1287: bar ldan par 'jig rten pa la ye shes snang
NK051(zhi)004:1288: bar byed pa'o // don phra mo tsam ma yin te thar pa la sbyor ba'i mchog go //
NK051(zhi)004:1289: des gzhan don 'byung ba'i tshul ni /
NK051(zhi)004:1290: chos kyi dbang phyug chos kyi rgyal //
NK051(zhi)004:1291: legs pa'i lam ni ston pa po //
NK051(zhi)004:1292: don 'grub bsam pa grub pa ste //
NK051(zhi)004:1294: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong la rje
NK051(zhi)004:1295: btsun nyid dbang bsgyur bas chos kyi dbang phyug go
NK051(zhi)004:1296: // de gdul bya rnams nyon mongs pa las rgyal
NK051(zhi)004:1297: bar byas nas phyin ci ma log par legs pa'i
NK051(zhi)004:1298: lam ji ltar 'tshams par bstan te /
NK051(zhi)004:1299: sems can gyi don dang bsam pa grub par byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1300: 'o na rje btsun nyid rtog bcas su mi 'gyur ram zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:1301: kun tu rtog pa thams cad spangs //
NK051(zhi)004:1302: rnam par mi rtog dbyings mi zad //
NK051(zhi)004:1303: chos dbyings dam pa zad mi shes //
NK051(zhi)004:1305: gzhan don mdzad kyang rtog pa me de /
NK051(zhi)004:1306: yang dag pa'i ye shes dang log rtog 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
NK051(zhi)004:1307: rnam par mi rtog kyang dbyings las yon tan zad pa med par 'byung ste /
NK051(zhi)004:1308: yon tan gyi 'byung khungs chos kyi dbyings la zad mi shes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1309: des tshogs ji ltar rdzogs she na /
NK051(zhi)004:1310: bsod nams ldan pa bsod nams tshogs //
NK051(zhi)004:1311: ye shes ye shes khyad par che //
NK051(zhi)004:1312: ye shes ldan pa yod med shes //
NK051(zhi)004:1313: tshogs gnyis tshogs ni bsags pa po //
NK051(zhi)004:1315: rje btsun nyid ye nas bsod nams kyi tshogs dang ldan la /
NK051(zhi)004:1316: gzhan de la gzhug pa'i phyir nyid kyang tshogs sogs pa'i tshul ston pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1317: ye shes kyi tshogs dang yang ldan te /
NK051(zhi)004:1318: de yang nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba'i ye shes las kyang /
NK051(zhi)004:1319: byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes khyad par che ste /
NK051(zhi)004:1320: de las kyang khyad par du gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas /
NK051(zhi)004:1321: yod pa zhes bya ba ji snyed pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1322: med pa zhes bya ba ji lta ba shes pa ste /
NK051(zhi)004:1323: de ltar tshogs gnyis rdzogs pas ni tshogs bsags pa las 'byung bar bstan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1324: tshogs bsags pa las sangs rgyas kyi sku ji ltar 'byung zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:1325: rtag pa kun rgyal rnal 'byor can //
NK051(zhi)004:1326: bsam gtan bsam bya blo ldan mchog /
NK051(zhi)004:1327: so so rang rig mi g.yo ba //
NK051(zhi)004:1328: mchog gi dang po sku gsum 'chang //
NK051(zhi)004:1329: zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
NK051(zhi)004:1330: don dam chos kyi sku mi 'gyur ba de rnam rtog gi dgra las rgyal zhing /
NK051(zhi)004:1331: thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel bas rnal 'byor te /
NK051(zhi)004:1333: thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pa //
NK051(zhi)004:1334: rnal 'byor zhes su brjod pa yin //
NK051(zhi)004:1336: rnam par mi rtog pa'i snying po la rnam par rtog pa mi g.yo bas bsam gtan /
NK051(zhi)004:1337: de sangs rgyas don du gnyer ba rnams kyis bsam par bya ba'i 'os yin pas bsam par bya /
NK051(zhi)004:1338: gnyis med rtogs pas blo dang ldan pa'i mchog go //
NK051(zhi)004:1340: chos spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid ma 'dres par so so rang gis rig pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1341: de la ma zhen pa ni mi g.yo ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1342: de lta bu ni sku thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa ste /
NK051(zhi)004:1343: sku'i bye brag gzhan 'byung ba'i dngos po la de thob dgos pas dang po //
NK051(zhi)004:1344: de'i yon tan gyi khyad par sku gsum du snang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1345: de yang sku dang ye shes kyi bye brag 'byung zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:1346: sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can //
NK051(zhi)004:1347: khyab bdag ye shes lnga yi bdag /
NK051(zhi)004:1348: sangs rgyas mnga' bdag cod pan can //
NK051(zhi)004:1349: spyan lnga chags pa med pa 'chang //
NK051(zhi)004:1350: sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa po //
NK051(zhi)004:1351: sangs rgyas sras po dam pa'i mchog /
NK051(zhi)004:1353: sku lnga ni chos kyi sku dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1354: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1356: rdo rje'i lta bu'i sku dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1357: mngon par byang chub pa'i sku'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1358: khyab bdag ni chos kyi dbyings kyis snod bcud kun la khyab pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1359: ye shes lnga ni klad du bshad zin to //
NK051(zhi)004:1360: sangs rgya lnga ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa lnga'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1361: ye shes lnga las sangs rgyas lngas brgyan pa cod pan can zhes bya'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1362: spyan lnga ni sha'i spyan dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1367: de rnams la thogs chags med pas mnga' ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1368: byang chub kyi sems de kho na nyid rtogs nas
NK051(zhi)004:1369: sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa'i yum du 'gyur zhing
NK051(zhi)004:1370: / sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi sras so //
NK051(zhi)004:1371: 'o na nyan thos rnams sras dam pa min pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:1373: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po la sras stong yod kyang /
NK051(zhi)004:1374: mtshan dang ldan pa gcig sras kyi dam par 'dzin pa de bzhin du /
NK051(zhi)004:1375: nyan thos dang rang rgyal shes rab dang snying rje
NK051(zhi)004:1376: chung bas sangs rgyas kyi rig 'dzin cing mdzad pa
NK051(zhi)004:1377: sgrub mi nus pas sras kyi dam pa ma yin
NK051(zhi)004:1378: no // byang chub sem dpa' ni snying rje dang
NK051(zhi)004:1379: shes rab che bas sangs rgyas kyi rigs 'dzin cing
NK051(zhi)004:1380: mdzad pa sgrub pas sras po dam pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1381: gnas skabs su byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs su rje
NK051(zhi)004:1382: btsun nyid bzhugs nas 'gro ba'i don mdzad pas de
NK051(zhi)004:1383: skad ces bya'o // de'i mdzad pa ci zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:1384: shes pas srid 'byung skye gnas med //
NK051(zhi)004:1385: chos las byung ba srid pa sel //
NK051(zhi)004:1386: gcig pu sra mkhregs rdo rje'i bdag /
NK051(zhi)004:1387: skyes ma thag tu 'gro ba'i bdag /
NK051(zhi)004:1389: de kho na shes pas srid pa las 'byung ste /
NK051(zhi)004:1390: 'khor bar skye ba'i gnas med do //
NK051(zhi)004:1391: chos kyi sku rtogs pa las ye shes 'byung ba ste /
NK051(zhi)004:1392: des srid pa'i rgyu las dang nyon mongs pa sel lo //
NK051(zhi)004:1393: gang gis sel na ye shes drug ro gcig pa /
NK051(zhi)004:1396: dus nam sel na skyes ma thag tu'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1397: ye shes lnga'i tshul gyis gzhan gyis ma rig pa ji lta sel na /
NK051(zhi)004:1398: nam mkha' las byung rang byung ba //
NK051(zhi)004:1399: shes rab ye shes me bo che //
NK051(zhi)004:1400: 'od chen rnam par snang bar byed //
NK051(zhi)004:1401: ye shes skar ma lam me ba //
NK051(zhi)004:1402: 'gro ba'i mar me ye shes sgron //
NK051(zhi)004:1404: chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' dang 'dra ba las yon
NK051(zhi)004:1405: tan 'gag pa med pa 'byung bas chos kyi dbyings
NK051(zhi)004:1407: de'i don shes rab dam pa rtogs te /
NK051(zhi)004:1408: gsal la rtog pa med pa'i ye shes kyi mes mtshan ma 'joms te /
NK051(zhi)004:1409: me yis r+ts+wa sbur bsreg pa lta bu ni me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
NK051(zhi)004:1410: chos thams cad mnyam par rtogs pa'i ye shes kyi
NK051(zhi)004:1411: 'od chen po 'bar bas gdul bya la che ba'i
NK051(zhi)004:1412: yon tan sna tshogs snang bar byed pas mnyam pa
NK051(zhi)004:1414: so sor rtog pa'i ye shees sprin med pa'i nam
NK051(zhi)004:1415: mkha' la skar ma'i tshogs ma 'dres par gsal ba
NK051(zhi)004:1416: ltar chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid ma 'dres par
NK051(zhi)004:1417: rtogs pas so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
NK051(zhi)004:1418: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes mar me lta bus 'gro ba'i ma rig pa'i mun pa sel zhing /
NK051(zhi)004:1419: 'dod pa'i don yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pas bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so //
NK051(zhi)004:1420: khyad par gsang sngags kyi sgo nas bstan pa'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)004:1421: gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal ba //
NK051(zhi)004:1422: sngags mchog mnga' bdag rig sngags rgyal //
NK051(zhi)004:1423: gsang sngags rgyal po don chen byed //
NK051(zhi)004:1424: gtsug tor chen po rmad byung gtsug /
NK051(zhi)004:1426: gzhan zil gyis gnon pa'i gzi brjid kyi phung po chen po mnga' zhing /
NK051(zhi)004:1427: nang na ye shes lnga gsal ba'i rtags su phyi rol du 'od kha dog lnga gsal ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1428: sngags kyi mchog tu gyur pa gsang sngags rig sngags yin la de'i mnga' bdag go //
NK051(zhi)004:1429: rig sngags kyi rgyal po ni shes rab dang ye shes yin la /
NK051(zhi)004:1430: gsang sngags kyi rgyal po ni thabs dang shes rab khyad par can yin pas /
NK051(zhi)004:1431: skal ba dang skal bar ldan pa la de gnyis kyi sgo nas don byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1432: de ni rmad du byung ba'i chos yin pas gtsug
NK051(zhi)004:1433: tor ltar kun gyi spyi gtsug tu bkur bar 'os
NK051(zhi)004:1434: pa'o // de tsam du ma zad de 'phrul pa sna tshogs su 'byung ba ni /
NK051(zhi)004:1435: nam mkha'i bdag po sna tshogs ston //
NK051(zhi)004:1436: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku yi mchog /
NK051(zhi)004:1437: 'gro kun dga' ba'i mig dang ldan //
NK051(zhi)004:1438: sna tshogs gzugs can skyed pa po //
NK051(zhi)004:1440: zab pa rang gi don nam mkha' lta bu las
NK051(zhi)004:1441: rgya che ba gzhan gyi don sna tshogs ston pa'o
NK051(zhi)004:1442: // sku'i mchog tu gyur pa ni drug po ro gcig pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1443: des 'gro ba'i don la gzigs te ji ltar dga'
NK051(zhi)004:1444: ba'i gzugs sna tshogs su sprul nas don mdzad pa'o
NK051(zhi)004:1445: // mdor na byang chub kyi sems sna tshogs su sprul nas don mdzad pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1446: mdor na byang chub kyi sems gzugs sna tshogs su shar bar ston to //
NK051(zhi)004:1447: de nyid don dang ldan pas gzhan gyis bkur ba'i 'os su gyur pa'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)004:1448: drang srong che dgus mchod cing brjod //
NK051(zhi)004:1450: dam tshig chen po gsang sngags 'dzin //
NK051(zhi)004:1451: gtso bo dkon mchog gsum 'dzin pa //
NK051(zhi)004:1453: drang srong ni spyir rig pa sgrub pa rnams la bya /
NK051(zhi)004:1454: drang srong chen po ni bcom ldan 'das te rang yang drang po'i lam du zhugs pa la /
NK051(zhi)004:1455: gzhan yang drang po'i lam du srong ba'i phyir ro //
NK051(zhi)004:1456: des kyang rje btsun nyid la mchod pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1457: yon tan brjod cing bstod pa'i gnas su gyur pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1459: sku de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang /
