NK051(zhi)004:1461: thugs rdo rje'i rigs dang gsum 'chang zhing thabs dang shes rab khyad par can 'chang bas na /
NK051(zhi)004:1464: dam tshig chen po gsang sngags kyi sgo nas gdul bya rjes su 'dzin to //
NK051(zhi)004:1465: rtsa ba byang chub kyi sems te chos thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur bas gtso bo'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1466: des dkon mchog gsum gyi tshul 'dzin cing /
NK051(zhi)004:1467: gzhan yang 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad do //
NK051(zhi)004:1468: de yang rgya che ba'i dkon mchog ni spyi dang mthun /
NK051(zhi)004:1469: zab pa'i dbang du byas nas byang chub kyi sems gnyis su med pas sangs rgyas dkon mchog /
NK051(zhi)004:1470: de'i don rtogs pa ni chos dkon mchog /
NK051(zhi)004:1471: rjes su sgrub pa ni dge 'dun dkon mchog go //
NK051(zhi)004:1472: chos kyi sgo mo ji snyed pa yang theg pa gsum du 'dus te /
NK051(zhi)004:1473: gdul bya rjes su gzung ba'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)004:1474: theg pa mchog gsum ston pa po //
NK051(zhi)004:1475: don yod zhags pa rnam par rgyal //
NK051(zhi)004:1476: 'dzin pa chen po rdo rje zhags //
NK051(zhi)004:1477: rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che //
NK051(zhi)004:1481: theg pa chen po gsum gang zag gi blo dang
NK051(zhi)004:1482: sbyar nas gang mos pa la ston par byed do
NK051(zhi)004:1483: // des 'gro ba'i don yod par mdzad do //
NK051(zhi)004:1484: 'khor ba las rgyal bar byed do //
NK051(zhi)004:1485: thugs rje'i zhags pas gdul bya rjes su 'dzin pas de yang rgyu ci las 'byung na /
NK051(zhi)004:1486: chos kyi sku rdo rje lta bu rtogs pa las 'byung ngo //
NK051(zhi)004:1488: stong nyid chos skur rtogs pa'i rtags //
NK051(zhi)004:1489: byams dang snying rje rab tu 'phel //
NK051(zhi)004:1491: thugs rjes gdul bya rjes su 'dzin pas lcags kyu dang 'dra /
NK051(zhi)004:1492: nyon mongs pa rnams 'ching bas zhags pa dang 'dra /
NK051(zhi)004:1493: de nyid la yang ma zhen pas che zhes bya'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1494: da ni me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi sgo
NK051(zhi)004:1495: nas 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i mtshan bstan pa'i
NK051(zhi)004:1496: phyir / rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed //
NK051(zhi)004:1497: ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
NK051(zhi)004:1498: 'dir khro bo gshin rje gshed kyi ming bstan te /
NK051(zhi)004:1499: de yang rdo rje'i rigs yin pas rdo rje'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1500: shin tu 'jigs par byed pa'i cha byad du bstan nas /
NK051(zhi)004:1501: ma h+aa de ba la sogs pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1502: las kyi gshin rje rnams zhi bas mi 'dul ba
NK051(zhi)004:1503: de dag 'jigs shing skrag par byed pas 'dul ba'o
NK051(zhi)004:1504: // khro ba'i rgyal po gdong drug 'jigs //
NK051(zhi)004:1505: mig drug lag drug stobs dang ldan //
NK051(zhi)004:1506: keng rus mche ba gtsigs pa po //
NK051(zhi)004:1507: zhes pa 'dis yon tan rtags kyi phyag rgya bstan te /
NK051(zhi)004:1508: khro bo ni gsod pa dang skrod pa la sogs pa drag po'i cha byad du ston te /
NK051(zhi)004:1510: gsod dang skrod dang drag por ston //
NK051(zhi)004:1511: 'di ni khro bo'i don du brjod //
NK051(zhi)004:1513: de'i nang du me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis
NK051(zhi)004:1514: nyon mongs pa zhe sdang la sogs pa bcom pa'i
NK051(zhi)004:1515: rtags so // de ni khro bo rnams kyi nang na gtso bor gyur pas rgyal po'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1516: de yang rigs drug dang ldan pa'i rtags su gdong drug go //
NK051(zhi)004:1517: ye shes drug dang ldan pa'i rtags su mig drug go //
NK051(zhi)004:1518: pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i rtags su lag pa drug go //
NK051(zhi)004:1519: gdug pa 'joms par byed pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1520: mi mgo skam rlon gyis brgyan pas keng rus so //
NK051(zhi)004:1521: nges par 'byed pa'i shes rab rnon pos nyon mongs pa 'joms shing /
NK051(zhi)004:1522: gdug pa can 'dul ba'i rtags su mche ba gtsigs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1523: ha la ha la gdong brgya pa //
NK051(zhi)004:1524: zhes pa 'dis 'jigs byed chen po'i rgyan bstan te /
NK051(zhi)004:1526: dug bzhi dang ldan pa'i sbrul gyis lus dang yan lag brgyan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1527: gshin rje gshed po bgegs kyi rgyal //
NK051(zhi)004:1528: rdo rje shugs can 'jigs byed pa //
NK051(zhi)004:1529: zhes pa 'dis ni sku'i phrin las bstan te /
NK051(zhi)004:1530: 'di las kyi gshin rje rnams 'dul ba'i gshed du gyur pa ste /
NK051(zhi)004:1531: bgegs kyi rgyal po bi na ya ka dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1532: tshogs bdag glang sna la sogs pa rnams 'dul bar byed pas rgyal po'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1533: rdo rje ltar phrin las thogs pa med par mdzad
NK051(zhi)004:1534: pa'i shugs chen po dang ldan pa'i sgo nas gdug
NK051(zhi)004:1535: ba can rnams 'jigs shing skrag par mdzad pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1536: rdo rje'i grags pa'i khyad par ji tsam zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:1537: rdo rje grags pa rdo rje'i snying //
NK051(zhi)004:1539: chos thams cad rdo rje ltar dbyer mi phyed cing /
NK051(zhi)004:1540: 'jig rten gsum du grags pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1541: dbyer mi phyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste /
NK051(zhi)004:1542: chos thams cad kyi 'phro bar gyur pa'i gzhir gyur pas kyang snying po /
NK051(zhi)004:1543: rdo rje lta bu thugs kyi rigs yin pas kyang rdo rje'i snying /
NK051(zhi)004:1544: rtags khro bo rnams kyi thugs kar bzhag pas kyang rdo rje'i snying ngo //
NK051(zhi)004:1545: sku de'i yon tan bstan pa ni /
NK051(zhi)004:1546: sgyu 'phrul rdo rje gsus po che //
NK051(zhi)004:1548: sgyu ma lta bu'i sprul pa sna tshogs su sprul zhing /
NK051(zhi)004:1549: rdo rje lta bu'i sku de yang nang du che
NK051(zhi)004:1550: ba'i yon tan thams cad kyis gang ba'i rtags su
NK051(zhi)004:1553: rdo rje las skyes rdo rje'i bdag /
NK051(zhi)004:1555: de'i rgyu ni chos sku rdo rje lta bu rtogs pa las skyes te /
NK051(zhi)004:1556: rigs thams cad kyi gtso bor gyur pas bdag po'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1558: rdo rje snying po mkha' 'dra ba //
NK051(zhi)004:1562: cho 'phrul mi 'gag pa'i phyir nam mkha'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1563: 'o na mtshan ma can du mi 'gyur ram zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:1564: mi g.yo ral pa gcig gis bsgyings //
NK051(zhi)004:1565: glang chen ko rlon gos su gyon //
NK051(zhi)004:1566: zhes pa 'dis yon tan gyi rgyan brgyan te mtshan ma'i rnam par rtog pas mi g.yo zhing /
NK051(zhi)004:1567: gnyis su med par rtogs pa'i rtags ral pa'i thor tshugs gcig tu bcings pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1568: theg pa mchog dang ldan pa'i rtags su glang po che'i ko rlon gos su gyon pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1569: khro bo'i gsung ji lta bu zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:1570: grags chen h+aa h+aa zhes sgrogs pa //
NK051(zhi)004:1571: h+ai h+ai zhes sgrogs 'jigs par byed //
NK051(zhi)004:1572: gad mo chen mo gad rgyangs can //
NK051(zhi)004:1573: rdo rje gad mo cher sgrogs pa //
NK051(zhi)004:1575: 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa la dgyes pas h+aa h+aa zhes pa'i sgra sgrogs shing /
NK051(zhi)004:1576: h+ai h+ai zhes pa'i sgras ma rungs pa rnams 'jigs
NK051(zhi)004:1577: shing brgyal bar byed pa'i gad mo che bar sgrogs
NK051(zhi)004:1578: te / rdo rje dang 'dra bar gzhan gyis bar
NK051(zhi)004:1579: du mi chod par shin tu rgya che ba ste
NK051(zhi)004:1580: te / / 'jig rten gsum na thos par sgrogs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1581: 'o na thugs kyi rang bzhin ji lta bu lags she na /
NK051(zhi)004:1582: rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
NK051(zhi)004:1583: rdo rje rgyal po bde ba che //
NK051(zhi)004:1584: rdo rje drag po dga' ba che //
NK051(zhi)004:1585: rdo rje h+aum ste h+aum zhes sgrogs //
NK051(zhi)004:1587: rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa'i thugs ye shes chen po /
NK051(zhi)004:1588: chos kyi dbyings la sems dpa' dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1589: thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don la sems pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1590: de'i gong na gzhan med pas rgyal po'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1591: zag pa med pa'i bde ba chen po mnga' zhing /
NK051(zhi)004:1592: gdug pa can 'joms pa'i thugs mnga' bas drag po'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1593: des sems can rnams kyi dga' ba chen po skyed par mdzad do //
NK051(zhi)004:1594: rdo rje lta bu thugs su chud pa'i sgo nas /
NK051(zhi)004:1595: h+aum h+aum zhes pa'i sgra bsgrags nas /
NK051(zhi)004:1596: gdug pa can tshar gcod par mdzad do //
NK051(zhi)004:1597: khro bo des las ci mdzad ce na /
NK051(zhi)004:1598: mtshon du rdo rje mda' thogs pa //
NK051(zhi)004:1599: rdo rje ral gri ma lus gcod //
NK051(zhi)004:1600: rdo rje kun 'chang rdo rje can //
NK051(zhi)004:1601: rdo rje gcig pu g.yul sel ba //
NK051(zhi)004:1603: phyag mtshan rdo rje ltar nyon mongs pa 'bigs pa'i thabs shes rab kyi mda' gzhu dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1604: rnam par rtog pa gcod par byed pa'i shes rab kyi ral gri thogs pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1605: dug lnga choms pa'i rtags rdo rje 'chang ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1606: rdo rje ltar gzhan 'joms par byed pa'i mthu dang ldan pas rdo rje can zhes bya'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1607: de yang rdo rje lta bu gnyis su med pa'i
NK051(zhi)004:1608: ye shes kyi bdud bzhi dang gdug pa can 'joms
NK051(zhi)004:1609: shing g.yul ngo bzlog par byed do //
NK051(zhi)004:1610: rgyan gyi sgo nas khyad par gyi yon tan bstan pa ni /
NK051(zhi)004:1611: rdo rje 'bar ba mig mi bzad //
NK051(zhi)004:1612: skra yang rdo rjee 'bar ba ste //
NK051(zhi)004:1614: mig brgya pa ste rdo rje'i mig /
NK051(zhi)004:1615: lus ni rdo rje'i ba spu can //
NK051(zhi)004:1616: rdo rje'i spu ni gcig pu'i lus //
NK051(zhi)004:1617: sen mo skyes pa rdo rje'i rtse //
NK051(zhi)004:1618: rdo rje snying po pags pa mkhregs //
NK051(zhi)004:1619: rdo rje phreng thogs dpal dang ldan //
NK051(zhi)004:1620: rdo rje rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste //
NK051(zhi)004:1622: rdo rje 'bar ba lta bu'i drag po'i spyan shin
NK051(zhi)004:1623: tu mi bzad par 'jigs pa mnga' zhing dbu skra
NK051(zhi)004:1625: gzhan gyi rgyud la yang sku gsung thugs rdo rje
NK051(zhi)004:1626: lta bu'i ye shes 'bebs par mdzad la mig brgya
NK051(zhi)004:1627: pa zhes pa ni mtshon pa tsam ste /
NK051(zhi)004:1628: thams cad du ma 'gags pa shes rab kyi spyan dbyer mi phyed pa dang ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1629: lus la rdo rje'i ba spu dngos su 'khyil ba mnga' zhing /
NK051(zhi)004:1630: rdo rje'i spu de gnyis su med pa'i lus la brgyan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1631: gdug pa can 'dul ba'i rtags dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1632: rigs lnga ye shes lnga dbyer mi phyed pa'i rtags su sor mo'i rtse mor rdo rje skyes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1633: thams cad gnyis med du bsdus pa'i rtags su /
NK051(zhi)004:1634: rdo rje'i pags pa sra la 'thas pa mnga' ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1635: rdo rje'i phreng ba thogs nas gzhan don mdzad pas dpal dang ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1636: che ba'i yon tan phreng ba brgyus pa ltar rgyun mi 'chad pa dang ldan pa'i rtags so //
NK051(zhi)004:1637: de ltar khyad par gyi rgyan rdo rjes brgyan pa'i
NK051(zhi)004:1638: sgo nas che ba'i yon tan rnams bstan pa yin
NK051(zhi)004:1639: te / thugs rdo rje'i rigs yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK051(zhi)004:1640: 'o na gsung gi sgo nas 'gro ba 'dren pa'i yon tan gang zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:1641: gad rgyangs h+aa h+aa nges par sgrogs //
NK051(zhi)004:1642: yi ge drug pa rdo rje'i sgra //
NK051(zhi)004:1643: 'jam dbyangs chen po sgra che ba //
NK051(zhi)004:1644: 'jig rten gsum na sgra gcig pa //
NK051(zhi)004:1645: nam mkha'i mtha' la sgra sgrogs pa //
NK051(zhi)004:1646: sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyis mchog /
NK051(zhi)004:1648: 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa la dgyes pa'i sgra h+aa h+aa zhes sgrogs shing /
NK051(zhi)004:1649: yi ge drug pa ni rgyas par yi ge drug pa'i sngags /
NK051(zhi)004:1650: de las bsdu na w+aa g+ai shwa r+ai'i 'bru drug pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1651: de gnyis ni gsang sngags rdo rje'i theg pa'i sgra'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1652: las 'phro can rnams la snyan cing yid du 'ong bas 'jam dbyangs so //
NK051(zhi)004:1653: don chen po ston pa'i sgra yin pas che bas so //
NK051(zhi)004:1654: de gang du sgrogs na 'jig rten gsum du'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1655: gnyis med ston pa'i sgra yin pas gcig go //
NK051(zhi)004:1656: yang ji snyed cig bsgrags kyang 'gro ba 'dren par gcig pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1657: sgra de la 'gran zla med pas kyang sgra gcig pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1658: de ji tsam du sgrogs she na /
NK051(zhi)004:1659: nam mkha' khyab par sgrogs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1660: sgra rnams kyi nang na chos kyi sgra 'di mchog
NK051(zhi)004:1661: tu gyur pa ste don chen po la sbyor ba'i
NK051(zhi)004:1662: phyir ro // so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi
NK051(zhi)004:1663: sgo nas 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i mtshan bstan
NK051(zhi)004:1664: phyir ro // pa'i phyir / yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid //
NK051(zhi)004:1665: yang dag mtha' ste yi ge med //
NK051(zhi)004:1666: ces pa la sogs pa smos te /
NK051(zhi)004:1667: de la gsung gi rgyu ni yang dag pa bdag med de bzhin nyid do //
NK051(zhi)004:1669: stong nyid smra ba'i khyu mchog ste //
NK051(zhi)004:1670: zab cing rgya che'i sgra sgrogs pa //
NK051(zhi)004:1671: chos kyi dung ste sgra chen ldan //
NK051(zhi)004:1672: chos kyi gan+di sgra bo che //
NK051(zhi)004:1673: mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa po //
NK051(zhi)004:1674: phyogs bcu chos kyi rnga bo che //
NK051(zhi)004:1676: chos thams cad stong pa nyid du smra ba ni
NK051(zhi)004:1677: smra ba thams cad kyi gtso bo yin pas khyu
NK051(zhi)004:1679: glang po che'i phru gu pha ma shi nas seng
NK051(zhi)004:1680: ges nu ma bsnun nas gsos pa la khyu mchog
NK051(zhi)004:1681: zer te / des khyus 'gro zil gyis gnon te de dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
NK051(zhi)004:1683: zab pa dang rgya che ba'i chos kyi sgra sgrogs pa'i phyir ro //
NK051(zhi)004:1685: chos kyi dung lta bu'i sgra chen pos bdud btul nas /
NK051(zhi)004:1686: chos kyi gan+di lta bu'i sgra chen pos 'khor bsdus nas /
NK051(zhi)004:1687: mtha' gnyis la mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos ston pa ste /
NK051(zhi)004:1689: shes pas srid la mi gnas dang //
NK051(zhi)004:1690: snying rjes zhi la mi gnas shing //
NK051(zhi)004:1692: rgya ji tsam che zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:1693: phyogs bcu thams cad khyab par byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1695: chos kyi sgra chen po rnga bo che dang 'dra ba sgrogs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1696: de la kun 'byung ba'i gzhi gang zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:1697: gzugs med gzugs bzang dam pa ste //
NK051(zhi)004:1698: sna tshogs gzugs can yid las skyes //
NK051(zhi)004:1699: gzugs rnams thams cad snang ba'i dpal //
NK051(zhi)004:1700: gzugs brnyan ma lus 'chang ba po //
NK051(zhi)004:1702: chos sku la ngo bo nyid ma grub pas gzugs med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1703: de'i byin gyis rlabs las longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa /
NK051(zhi)004:1705: sprul sku sna tshogs gzugs can de yid ye shes su grol ba las skyes zhes pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1706: yang sprul sku sna tshogs gzugs can gyi yid la ji ltar 'dod pa ltar skyes zhes bshad do //
NK051(zhi)004:1707: rje btsun de nyid nyan thos dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1711: khyab 'jug la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan ma lus par snang nas don mdzad pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1712: sku de'i che ba ji lta bu zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:1713: tshugs pa med cing che bar grags /
NK051(zhi)004:1714: khams gsum dbang phyug chen po ste //
NK051(zhi)004:1715: 'phags lam shin tu mtho la gnas //
NK051(zhi)004:1716: dar ba chen po chos kyi tog /
NK051(zhi)004:1718: tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i dbang gis gnyen po gang gis kyang mi tshugs te /
NK051(zhi)004:1719: bdud dang mu stegs la sogs pa gang gis kyang
NK051(zhi)004:1720: zil gyis mi non pas na che bar grags so
NK051(zhi)004:1721: // de yang 'phags pa'i lam las mtho bar gyur
NK051(zhi)004:1722: pas gnyis su med pa'i ye shes la gnas pa'o
NK051(zhi)004:1723: // // chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong mkhyen pa'i dar ba chen po'i chos so //
NK051(zhi)004:1724: gnyis su med pa ni rab rtse mo'i tog ces bya'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1725: de gdul bya la ji ltar mos par snang ba ni //
NK051(zhi)004:1726: 'jig rten gsum na gzhon lus gcig /
NK051(zhi)004:1727: gnas brtan rgan po skye dgu'i bdag /
NK051(zhi)004:1728: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba //
NK051(zhi)004:1729: sdug gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes //
NK051(zhi)004:1731: byang chub sems dpas 'dul ba rnams la bgres rgud
NK051(zhi)004:1732: mi mnga' ste rtag tu byis pa lo brgyad lon
NK051(zhi)004:1733: pa lta bu gzhan gyi yid 'phrog par byed pa
NK051(zhi)004:1735: nyan thos kyis 'dul ba rnams la gnas brtan rab 'byor lta bur sprul /
NK051(zhi)004:1736: rang rgyal bas 'dul ba rnams la rang rgyal rgan po rdzu 'phrul cher ston pa lta bur sprul /
NK051(zhi)004:1737: sna tshogs kyis 'dul ba la skye dgu'i bdag por sprul nas don mdzad de /
NK051(zhi)004:1738: de la skye ba dgu ni nyan thos dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1740: theg pa chen po dang gsum /
NK051(zhi)004:1741: de'i khar 'gro ba rigs drug gi gnas su sprul
NK051(zhi)004:1742: sku thub pa drug gis don mdzad pa dang dgu
NK051(zhi)004:1743: la bya'o // de la mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis ni thun mong du bstan to //
NK051(zhi)004:1744: phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa nyid dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1745: zhabs rus sbal bzhin du gnas pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1746: phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo 'brel ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1747: phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1749: phyag gi sor mo ring ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1751: sku che zhing drang ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1753: sku'i spu gyen du 'khyil ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1754: byin pa ri dwags e na ya lta bu dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1755: phyag ring zhing mdzes pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1756: 'doms kyi lba ba sbubs su nus pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1757: sku mdog gser lta bu dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1759: spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1760: zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1761: ro stod seng ge 'dra ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1764: ro bro ba'i mchog mkhyen pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1765: shing nya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1766: dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1768: gsung tshangs pa'i dbyangs lta bu dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1773: tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1774: spyan mthon mthing du gnas pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1775: spyan rdzi ba'i rdzi ma lta bu'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1776: khyad par gyi dbang du byas nas /
NK051(zhi)004:1777: dpal rnam par snang mdzad la rgyu'i sems dpa' bcu drug /
NK051(zhi)004:1778: 'bras bu'i sems dpa' bcu drug gis brgyan pa la bshad do //
NK051(zhi)004:1779: de ltar 'jig rten gsum na shin tu sdug cing yid du 'ong la /
NK051(zhi)004:1780: blta bas chog mi shes pa 'dun pa skye ba'i gnas su gyur pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1781: des 'jig rten pa ji ltar skyob ce na /
NK051(zhi)004:1782: 'jig rten shes legs slob dpon te //
NK051(zhi)004:1784: mgon skyob 'jig rten yid gcug pa //
NK051(zhi)004:1785: skyabs dang skyob pa bla na med //
NK051(zhi)004:1787: 'jig rten pa'i sman dang bzo la sogs pa yang rje btsun nyid kyis bslab pa yin la /
NK051(zhi)004:1788: log pa'i lam las zlog cing dam pa'i lam ston pa'i slob dpon yang mdzad do //
NK051(zhi)004:1789: tha snyad kyi rig pa dag ldan pas gzhan gyis
NK051(zhi)004:1790: brtsad kyang 'jigs pa dang bag tsha ba med par
NK051(zhi)004:1792: ji ltar yid dang mthun par sngar yang skyabs mdzad la /
NK051(zhi)004:1793: phyis kyang skyob ste bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par byed do //
NK051(zhi)004:1794: 'o na thugs kyi mkhyen tshad ci mnga' zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:1795: nam mkha'i mtha' la longs spyod pa //
NK051(zhi)004:1796: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mtsho //
NK051(zhi)004:1798: chos kyi sku nam mkha'i mtha' lta bu la longs
NK051(zhi)004:1799: spyod cing rtogs pas shes bya ji lta ba dang
NK051(zhi)004:1800: ji snyed pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes che
NK051(zhi)004:1801: ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho lta bu mnga' ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1802: de'i byed pa'i las gang zhe na //
NK051(zhi)004:1803: ma rig sgo lnga'i sbubs 'byed pa //
NK051(zhi)004:1804: srid pa'i d+r+wa ba 'joms pa po //
NK051(zhi)004:1805: nyon mongs ma lus zhi byed pa //
NK051(zhi)004:1806: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin //
NK051(zhi)004:1808: gnyis su med pa'i don rtogs pas ma rig sgo
NK051(zhi)004:1809: lnga'i shun lpags 'dra ba sbubs phye nas srid pa'i
NK051(zhi)004:1810: d+r+wa ba las dang nyon mongs pa dang 'brel ba
NK051(zhi)004:1811: rnams bcom ste / nyon mongs pa rtsa ba lnga'am dug dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1812: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa nyi shu po dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1813: kun nas nyon mongs pa ste brgyad dang gsum lta
NK051(zhi)004:1814: bu zhi nas 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin
NK051(zhi)004:1815: pa'o // de rtogs pa'i phan yon ni /
NK051(zhi)004:1816: ye shes dbang bskur cod pan can //
NK051(zhi)004:1817: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan du thogs //
NK051(zhi)004:1818: sdug bsngal gsum gyi sdug bsngal zhi //
NK051(zhi)004:1819: gsum sel mtha' yas grol gsum thob //
NK051(zhi)004:1820: sgrib pa kun las nges par grol //
NK051(zhi)004:1821: mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid du gnas //
NK051(zhi)004:1822: nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das //
NK051(zhi)004:1824: gnyis su med pa'i don rtogs pas nyon mongs pa lnga ma spangs rang sar grol te /
NK051(zhi)004:1825: ye shes lngar snang ba ste /
NK051(zhi)004:1826: bum pa la sogs pa'i dbang la ltos pa ma yin te /
NK051(zhi)004:1827: ye shes gcig rdzogs kyi dbang zhes bya'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1828: gzhi rig pa gcig la snang tshul ye shes kyis
NK051(zhi)004:1829: brgyan pa de shin tu mdzes pa'i phyir cod pan
NK051(zhi)004:1831: sems kyis chos la dbang thob na //
NK051(zhi)004:1832: rdzas tshig mtshan ma'i dbang rnams kun //
NK051(zhi)004:1833: ma bskur kyang ni thob par 'gyur //
NK051(zhi)004:1835: ye shes lnga'i gzugs brnyan sangs rgyas lngar shar te /
NK051(zhi)004:1836: gsal zhing mdzes pa'i phyir rgyan zhes bya'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1838: de ltar rtogs pas sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1840: 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal dang gsum zhi la /
NK051(zhi)004:1841: nyon mongs pa rnams kyang dug gsum du 'dus te /
NK051(zhi)004:1843: de gsum bsal nas 'gro ba mtha' yas pa'i don byas nas /
NK051(zhi)004:1846: byang chub sems dpa' dang gsum thob par byed do //
NK051(zhi)004:1847: khyad par du sku gsum la bya'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1848: de yang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1849: shes bya'i sgrib pa kun las grol nas /
NK051(zhi)004:1850: nam mkha' lta bu'i mnyam pa nyid la gnas te /
NK051(zhi)004:1851: de phan chad nyon mongs pa'i dri ma las 'das pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1852: de ltar rtogs pa'i ngo bo ci zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:1853: dus gsum dus med rtogs pa po //
NK051(zhi)004:1854: sems can kun gyi gtso bo che //
NK051(zhi)004:1855: yon tan thod can rnams kyi thod //
NK051(zhi)004:1856: lus kun las ni rnam grol ba //
NK051(zhi)004:1857: nam mkha'i lam la rab gnas pa //
NK051(zhi)004:1859: mnyam pa nyid la dus gsum du dbyer med de /
NK051(zhi)004:1861: 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid gang ma 'ongs de bzhin nyid //
NK051(zhi)004:1862: da lta de bzhin nyid 'di thams cad bye brag med //
NK051(zhi)004:1864: de ltar rtogs pa ni sems can kun las ches khyad par 'phags pa'i gtso bo che ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1866: 'jig rten pa bas nyan thos yon tan che la /
NK051(zhi)004:1867: de las kyang rang rgyal ba /
NK051(zhi)004:1868: de las kyang byang chub sems dpa' /
NK051(zhi)004:1869: de bas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan che ba rnams zhes bya'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1870: thod ni yon tan gyis mdzes par brgyan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1871: de las kyang thod ltar mdzes shing rab tu gyur pa ni rje btsun nyid do //
NK051(zhi)004:1872: de ltar 'gro ba'i lus kun tu skye ba grol
NK051(zhi)004:1873: nas nam mkha' lta bu'i ye shes la gnas so
NK051(zhi)004:1874: // 'o na 'gro ba'i don ji ltar mdzad na /
NK051(zhi)004:1875: yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang //
NK051(zhi)004:1876: khyab bdag rin chen kun gyi bdag /
NK051(zhi)004:1877: dpag bsam shing chen rgyas pa ste //
NK051(zhi)004:1878: bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog /
NK051(zhi)004:1879: byed pa sems can kun don byed //
NK051(zhi)004:1880: phan 'dod sems can mnyes gshin pa //
NK051(zhi)004:1882: gzhan don 'byung ba'i dpe yid bzhin nor bu la yang chos brgyad de /
NK051(zhi)004:1883: sems can gyi don dgos 'dod 'byung ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1884: de yang gsol ba ma btab na mi 'byung ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1888: zad mi shes par 'byung ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1889: rtog pa med par 'byung ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1890: phyis lan la re ba med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1891: de dang 'dra ba'i yon tan rin po che lta bu des kun la khyab pa'i bdag nyid do //
NK051(zhi)004:1892: yang dpag bsam shing dang 'dra ste /
NK051(zhi)004:1893: de la yang chos bcu ste /
NK051(zhi)004:1894: snga ma brgyad kyi khar bsil ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1895: 'gro ba ngal sos pa'i gnas su gyur pa lta bu dang bcu'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1896: yang bum pa bzang po bsgrub pa dang 'dra ste /
NK051(zhi)004:1900: ma bsgrubs na mi 'byung ba dang bcu'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1902: bum pa bzang po dang ni dpag bsam shing //
NK051(zhi)004:1903: yid bzhin nor rnams sems dang mi ldan pas //
NK051(zhi)004:1904: sems can rnams kyi don ni 'byung 'gyur na //
NK051(zhi)004:1905: thugs rje cher mnga' rgyal ba smos ci dgos //
NK051(zhi)004:1907: de ltar bu gcig pa'i ma ltar phan 'dogs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1908: des gdul bya'i bsam pa ji ltar mkhyen ce na /
NK051(zhi)004:1909: bzang ngan shes shing dus shes la //
NK051(zhi)004:1910: khyab bdag dam shes dam tshig ldan //
NK051(zhi)004:1911: dus shes sems can dbang don shes //
NK051(zhi)004:1912: rnam grol gsum la mkhas pa po //
NK051(zhi)004:1913: yon tan ldan zhing yon tan shes //
NK051(zhi)004:1916: de'i 'bras bu dus ji tsam na 'byung shes la /
NK051(zhi)004:1917: thugs rjes kun la khyab pa'i bdag po gzhan gyi dam tshig kyang shes la /
NK051(zhi)004:1918: rang yang de kho na las mi 'da' ba'i dam tshig dang ldan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1919: don mdzad pa'i tshe 'dul ba'i dus tshod shes shing
NK051(zhi)004:1920: sems can gyi dbang po rab 'bring tha ma dang
NK051(zhi)004:1921: / dad pa dang brtson 'grus rab 'bring tha ma'i don shes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1922: de yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mnga' bas /
NK051(zhi)004:1925: theg pa chen po dang rnam grol gsum la mkhas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1926: sku dang ye shes stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la
NK051(zhi)004:1927: sogs pa'i yon tan dang rje btsun nyid kyang ldan
NK051(zhi)004:1929: rang rgyal ba la sogs pa'i rgyud la yod pa'i yon tan rnams kyang shes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1930: de ltar gyur pa'i bkra shis pa'i dam par bstan pa'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)004:1931: chos shes bkra shis bkra shis 'byung //
NK051(zhi)004:1932: bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa //
NK051(zhi)004:1933: grags pa'i bkra shis snyan grags dge //
NK051(zhi)004:1934: dbugs 'byin chen po dga' ston che //
NK051(zhi)004:1935: dga' chen rol mo chen po ste //
NK051(zhi)004:1937: de lta chos kyi don shes pas tshe 'dir yang
NK051(zhi)004:1938: legs pa'i yon tan kun 'byung bas bkra shis la
NK051(zhi)004:1939: / phyi mar yang legs pa'i yon tan kun 'byung bas bkra shis 'byung ngo //
NK051(zhi)004:1940: 'jig rten pa'i tshe ring ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:1941: nor dang rigs rgyud 'phel ba la sogs pa bkra
NK051(zhi)004:1942: shis pa rnams kyi nang na yang bkra shis dam
NK051(zhi)004:1943: par 'gyur ro // khams gsum du grags shing legs
NK051(zhi)004:1944: pa'i yon tan 'byung bas grags pa'i bkra shis so
NK051(zhi)004:1945: par 'gyur ro // // mi dge ba las log
NK051(zhi)004:1946: nas dge ba sna tshogs la zhugs pas snyan grags
NK051(zhi)004:1948: rnams thar pa'i lam du dbugs 'byin pas kun dga'
NK051(zhi)004:1949: ba'i chos kyi ston mo chen po mdzad cing /
NK051(zhi)004:1950: zag med kyi bde ba chen po thob pas dga' chen no //
NK051(zhi)004:1951: 'dod pa'i yon tan mi spong bas rol mo chen po zhes bya'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1952: des 'gro ba skyob pa'i tshul ni /
NK051(zhi)004:1953: bkur sti rim gro phun sum tshogs //
NK051(zhi)004:1954: mchog tu dga' ba'i grags bdag dpal //
NK051(zhi)004:1955: mchog ldan mchog sbyin gtso bo ste //
NK051(zhi)004:1956: skyabs kyi dam pa skyabs su 'os //
NK051(zhi)004:1957: 'jig rten dgra ste rab kyi mchog /
NK051(zhi)004:1958: 'jigs pa ma lus sel ba po //
NK051(zhi)004:1961: rim gror bya ba'i 'os ni 'jig rten pa dang
NK051(zhi)004:1962: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs
NK051(zhi)004:1963: pa thams cad kyi gter du gyur pa /
NK051(zhi)004:1964: mchog tu 'gro ba'i don la dga' ba /
NK051(zhi)004:1965: khams gsum du grags shing tshogs gnyis rdzogs pas dpal te /
NK051(zhi)004:1966: yon tan gyi skal ba mchog dang ldan zhing /
NK051(zhi)004:1967: gzhan la yang mchog ster ba'i gtso bor gyur pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1968: des sdug bsngal ba rnams 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa las
NK051(zhi)004:1969: skyob cing de las lhag pa med pas skyabs su
NK051(zhi)004:1970: 'os pa'o // ci las skyob ce na /
NK051(zhi)004:1971: 'jig rten gyi rtog pa dgra yin te /
NK051(zhi)004:1973: de yang 'jig rten las rab tu gyur pas nyan thos so //
NK051(zhi)004:1974: de las rab tu gyur pas rang rgyal lo //
NK051(zhi)004:1975: de las rab tu gyur pas byang chub sems dapa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1976: de dag las kyang mchog tu gyur pa rje btsun no //
NK051(zhi)004:1977: des bdud dang sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1978: mu stegs kyi cha byad kyis 'dul ba la der sprul nas 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)004:1979: gtsug phud phud bu lcang lo can //
NK051(zhi)004:1980: ral pa muny+dza cod pan thogs //
NK051(zhi)004:1981: gdong lnga gtsug phud lnga dang ldan //
NK051(zhi)004:1982: zur phud lnga pa me tog thod //
NK051(zhi)004:1984: gtsug phud ni skra dang kha spu bzhar bregs nas
NK051(zhi)004:1985: spyi bor gtsug phud tsam 'dzin pas 'dul ba la
NK051(zhi)004:1986: der sprul lo // phud bu ni skra gzhan bregs nas dpral bar bcings pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1987: lcang lo can ni sra sil bu ring ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1988: ral pa ni ral pa sog kha non pa ni /
NK051(zhi)004:1989: lha chen po la dad pa rnams kyi gzugs 'dzin pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1990: muny+dza ni rkang sor slebs pa'i ral pa ske rags su bcings pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1991: cod pan ni dar la sogs pa thod du bcings pa'i tha ma cod pan du 'phur ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1992: gdong lnga ni phyogs bzhin gdong ba bzhi /
NK051(zhi)004:1993: spyi bo'i gtsug na gcig ste lnga'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1994: gdong pa bzhi nas rig byed kyi sgra bzhi 'don te /
NK051(zhi)004:1995: shar nas nges brjod kyi rig byed /
NK051(zhi)004:1996: lho nas mchod sbyin gyi rig byed /
NK051(zhi)004:1997: nub nas snyan dngags kyi rig byed /
NK051(zhi)004:1998: byang nas srid srung gi rig byed 'don pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:1999: de ltar tshangs pa gdong lnga pa lta bus 'dul ba la der sprul lo //
NK051(zhi)004:2000: yang mgo la gtsug phud lnga dang ldan pa mu
NK051(zhi)004:2001: stegs gzegs zan gyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba la der
NK051(zhi)004:2002: sprul lo // yang mgo la rin po che'i zur
NK051(zhi)004:2003: phud lnga yod pa dri za'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba
NK051(zhi)004:2005: yang mgo la me tog gi thod bcings pas gzhan
NK051(zhi)004:2006: 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba la
NK051(zhi)004:2007: der sprul lo // 'o na sangs rgyas pa'i brtul zhugs ji ltar 'dzin zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:2008: mgo zlum brtul zhugs chen po 'chang //
NK051(zhi)004:2009: tshangs par spyod pa brtul zhugs mchog /
NK051(zhi)004:2010: dka' thub mthar phyin dka' thub che //
NK051(zhi)004:2011: gtsang gnas dam pa goo ta ma //
NK051(zhi)004:2012: bram ze tshangs pa tshangs pa shes //
NK051(zhi)004:2014: sh+aakya thub pa lta bu'i rab tu byung bas 'dul
NK051(zhi)004:2015: ba la mgo zlum du sprul nas gnod pa las
NK051(zhi)004:2016: zlog pa'i brtul zhugs 'dzin par mdzad do //
NK051(zhi)004:2017: yang tshangs par spyod pa'i sdom pa la gnas shing
NK051(zhi)004:2018: brtul zhugs 'dzin pas 'dul ba la der ston to
NK051(zhi)004:2019: // sh+aakya thub pa chu bo nee rany+dza nar dka'
NK051(zhi)004:2020: thub mdzad pa lta bu la yang der ston to
NK051(zhi)004:2021: // // goo ta ma ni sh+aakya'i rigs te /
NK051(zhi)004:2022: gtsang sbra la gnas pa rgyal rigs su sprul pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2023: rang bzhin gyis dka' thub dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2024: gtsang sbra la gnas pa bram ze lta bur yang sprul pa mdzad do //
NK051(zhi)004:2025: nyid la nyes pa'i skyon gyis ma gos pas tshangs pa /
NK051(zhi)004:2026: gzhan skyon dang bral ba'i thabs shes pas tshangs pa shes zhes bya'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2027: de ltar sprul pa'i phan yon ci zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:2028: mya ngan 'das pa tshangs pa thob //
NK051(zhi)004:2029: grol ba thar pa rnam grol lus //
NK051(zhi)004:2030: rnam grol zhi ba zhi ba nyid //
NK051(zhi)004:2032: legs par mya ngan 'das dang nye //
NK051(zhi)004:2033: bde sdug sel ba mthar gyur pa //
NK051(zhi)004:2035: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dang bral bas mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2036: de nyid la zhen pa dang bral bas tshangs pa thob pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2037: de ltar 'ching ba mtha' dag las grol zhing thar nas ye shes kyi sku thob ste /
NK051(zhi)004:2038: des yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i rten byed pas lus zhes bya'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2039: de ltar nyon mongs pa las grol zhing spros pa'i mtshan ma thams cad zhi bas zhi ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2040: zhi ba de nyid las mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos kyi yon tan rnams 'byung ste /
NK051(zhi)004:2041: mya ngan las 'das pa ni nyan thos kyi lam mo //
NK051(zhi)004:2042: mya ngan las 'das pa phyi ma ni rang rgyal ba'i lam mo //
NK051(zhi)004:2043: legs par mya ngan las 'das pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
NK051(zhi)004:2044: bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2045: sdug bsngal 'khor ba'i mtha' gnyis sel te /
NK051(zhi)004:2046: mtha' gyur ba'i ye shes dang ldan pa ni sangs rgyas nyid do //
NK051(zhi)004:2047: gzhi'i gnas lugs rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid du bstan pa'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)004:2048: chags bral lus las 'das pa po //
NK051(zhi)004:2049: thub pa med pa dpe med pa //
NK051(zhi)004:2050: mi mngon mi snang gsal byed min //
NK051(zhi)004:2052: phra zhing zag med sa bon bral //
NK051(zhi)004:2053: rdul med rdul bral dri ma med //
NK051(zhi)004:2054: nyes pa spangs pa skyon med pa //
NK051(zhi)004:2056: yul rnams la chags pa'i blo dang bral ba'i ye shes su snang ba las 'das te /
NK051(zhi)004:2057: de nyid mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi stobs kyis mi bardzi bas thub pa med do //
NK051(zhi)004:2058: gang dang yang mnyam pa med pas dpe med do //
NK051(zhi)004:2059: 'di mtshan nyid dngos po cir yang mi mthong la mtshan ma gang du yang mi snang ste /
NK051(zhi)004:2060: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i bdag nyid du gnas
NK051(zhi)004:2061: pas don la gsal byed mi dgos te mar me
NK051(zhi)004:2062: lta bu'o // 'dus ma byas pas rkyen gang gis kyang mi 'gyur zhing /
NK051(zhi)004:2063: bde gshegs kyi snying po kun grol des til 'bru la mar bzhin kun la khyab bo //
NK051(zhi)004:2064: rtul pos mi shes pas phra zhing zag pa ste
NK051(zhi)004:2065: srid par skye ba'i sa bon ma rig pa bdag
NK051(zhi)004:2067: de ltar gzhi la rnam par rtog pa'i rdul dag nas med la /
NK051(zhi)004:2068: de ma rtogs pa'i blo yang de nyid /
NK051(zhi)004:2069: rtogs na rtog pa'i rdul dang bral bar 'gyur la /
NK051(zhi)004:2070: de nyid la yang ma zhen pas dri ma med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2071: de ltar sgrib gnyis spangs pas nyes pa'i skyon gang yang med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2072: don gnyis su med pa lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul ni /
NK051(zhi)004:2073: shin tu sad pa sad pa'i bdag /
NK051(zhi)004:2074: kun shes kun rig dam pa po //
NK051(zhi)004:2075: rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid 'das //
NK051(zhi)004:2076: ye shes gnyis med tshul 'chang ba //
NK051(zhi)004:2077: rnam pa rtog med lhun gyis grub //
NK051(zhi)004:2079: sgrib pa gnyis ni sad pa'am /
NK051(zhi)004:2080: yang na snang ba ye shes su sad pa'am /
NK051(zhi)004:2081: sems stong par sad pas ji snyed pa kun shes shing /
NK051(zhi)004:2083: de yang dbyer med du shes pas dam pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2084: de ltar rtog pa dang bral bas rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyi klong du 'das pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2085: 'das pa tsam ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi tshul 'chang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2086: rnam par rtog dang bral ba'i ye shes rgyu rkyen med par lhun gyis grub pa ste /
NK051(zhi)004:2088: de la yon tan thams cad lhun gyis grub pas yon tan lhun grub bo //
NK051(zhi)004:2089: rgyu rkyen gyis ji ltar ma bskyed ce na /
NK051(zhi)004:2090: dus gsum sangs rgyas las byed pa //
NK051(zhi)004:2091: sangs rgyas thog ma tha ma med //
NK051(zhi)004:2092: dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyu med pa //
NK051(zhi)004:2093: ye shes mig gcig dri ma med //
NK051(zhi)004:2094: ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs //
NK051(zhi)004:2096: dus gsum gyis sangs rgyas rnams kyis sems can 'dren pa'i las mdzad do //
NK051(zhi)004:2097: sangs rgyas la thog ma 'di nas byung bya ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2098: tha ma 'dir song bya ba med de dang po nyid nas rgyu med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2099: de la gnyis 'dzin gyi dri ma med pas ye shes mig gcig go //
NK051(zhi)004:2100: ye shes drug ro gcig pa'i lus yin pas de skad ces bya'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2101: de la gsung gi khyad par ci zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:2102: tshig gi dbang phyug smra ba che //
NK051(zhi)004:2103: smra ba'i skyes mchog smra ba'i rgyal //
NK051(zhi)004:2104: smra ba'i dam pa mchog gi gnas //
NK051(zhi)004:2105: smra ba'i seng ge tshugs pa med //
NK051(zhi)004:2107: zab cing rgya che ba'i chos gsungs pas tshig gi dbang phyug smra ba che'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2108: mu stegs kyi smra ba las mchog tu gyur cing /
NK051(zhi)004:2109: nyan thos kyi smra ba zil gyis gnon pas smra ba'i rgyal lo //
NK051(zhi)004:2110: rang rgyal ba'i smra ba las 'phags pas dam pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2111: skye med kyi sgra chos smra ba'i gong na gzhan med pas mchog gi gnas so //
NK051(zhi)004:2112: de ni seng ge dang 'dra ste bdud la sogs pa'i rgol bas mi tshugs so //
NK051(zhi)004:2113: 'o na sku'i che ba gang zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:2114: kun tu lta ba mchog tu dga' //
NK051(zhi)004:2115: gzi brjid phung po blta na sdug /
NK051(zhi)004:2119: shes rab dam pa'i don la blta zhing /
NK051(zhi)004:2120: thugs rje dam pas 'gro ba la gzigs pas kun tu lta ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2121: bde ba chen po mnga' bas mchog tu daga'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2122: gzi brjid chen po gzhan yid du 'ong zhing sdug pa'i sku mnga' la /
NK051(zhi)004:2123: nang na ye shes drug 'bar bas ma rig pa'i
NK051(zhi)004:2124: mun pa sel ba'i rtags phyi ru 'od kha dog
NK051(zhi)004:2125: drug 'bar ba'o // mtshan thun mong ma yin pa
NK051(zhi)004:2126: thugs ka na rin po che dpal be'usa brgyan pa'o
NK051(zhi)004:2127: drug 'bar ba'o // // phyag las kyang 'od zer
NK051(zhi)004:2128: 'bar te zhi bas 'dul ba rnams 'dun pa skyed
NK051(zhi)004:2129: drug 'bar ba'o // // par byed la / des mi 'dul ba rnams tshar gcod par byed do //
NK051(zhi)004:2130: des 'gro ba'i nad ji ltar sel zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:2131: sman pa che mchog gtso bo ste //
NK051(zhi)004:2132: zug rngu 'byin pa bla na med //
NK051(zhi)004:2133: sman rnams ma lus ljon pa'i shing //
NK051(zhi)004:2134: nad do cog gi dgra che ba //
NK051(zhi)004:2136: sman pa'i mchog ste bdag med kyi don bstan nas bdag 'dzin gyi zug rngu 'byin cing /
NK051(zhi)004:2137: de yang sman gyi dpe ni ljon shing dang 'dra ste /
NK051(zhi)004:2138: rtsa ba dang yal ga dang lo 'dab dang me
NK051(zhi)004:2139: tog la brten nas 'bras bu 'byung ba ltar rtsa
NK051(zhi)004:2140: ba ni byang chub sems so //
NK051(zhi)004:2141: yal ga ni rtogs par byed pa'i thabs kyi yan lag rnams so //
NK051(zhi)004:2142: lo ma ni 'dir theg pa so so'i chos kyang bkag pa med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2143: me tog ni rtogs pa'i nyams myong ngo //
NK051(zhi)004:2144: 'bras bu ni de mthar phyin pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2145: der yang ma zad de phyi nang gi sman sna tshogs su yang sprul lo //
NK051(zhi)004:2146: des dgra phyi nang gi nad sel bar byed do //
NK051(zhi)004:2147: 'o na sku'i khyad par ci zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:2148: sdug gu 'jig rten gsum gyi mchog /
NK051(zhi)004:2149: dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can //
NK051(zhi)004:2151: sems can gyi ngo bo la sdug cing mdzes par sprul nas don mdzad de /
NK051(zhi)004:2152: dper na rgyu skar rnams kyi nang na zla ba ltar /
NK051(zhi)004:2153: lha dang mi rnams zil gyis gnon pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2154: des skyob pa'i thugs rje ji lta bu zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:2155: phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthas gtugs par /
NK051(zhi)004:2156: chos kyi rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs //
NK051(zhi)004:2157: 'gro na gdugs gcig yangs pa ste //
NK051(zhi)004:2158: byams dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can //
NK051(zhi)004:2159: dpal ldan pad+ma gar gyi bdag /
NK051(zhi)004:2160: khyab bdag chen po rin chen gdugs //
NK051(zhi)004:2162: rgya ni phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam par
NK051(zhi)004:2163: dam pa'i chos sgrogs pa'i mtshan mar rgyal mtshan 'dzugs
NK051(zhi)004:2164: shing / gdugs kyis char dang nyi ma la sogs la skyob pa lta bu ni /
NK051(zhi)004:2165: byams pa dang snying rjer ldan pa'i dbang gis so //
NK051(zhi)004:2166: de yang ma gos pa pad+ma dang 'dra la /
NK051(zhi)004:2167: 'gro ba 'dren pa'i thabs sna tshogs sgyur ba ni gar dang 'dra'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2168: de yang yon tan rin po che'i gdugs lta bus skyob pa'i bdag po ni rje btsun nyid do //
NK051(zhi)004:2169: ji ltar brtan kyang nges pa'i lam gcig las med pa'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)004:2170: sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid che //
NK051(zhi)004:2171: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba //
NK051(zhi)004:2172: sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che //
NK051(zhi)004:2173: sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa gcig /
NK051(zhi)004:2175: rje btsun nyid la sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid chen po mnga' la /
NK051(zhi)004:2176: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku rnam pa gsum yang 'chang bar mdzad de /
NK051(zhi)004:2177: thams cad rje btsun gyi sprul pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK051(zhi)004:2178: sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che //
NK051(zhi)004:2179: thabs dang shes rab kyi gtso bor yang bzhugs la
NK051(zhi)004:2180: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i chos ji snyed cig gsungs
NK051(zhi)004:2181: kyang / yang dag par na gnyis su med par ston pa'i theg pa gcig las med de /
NK051(zhi)004:2183: theg pa'i sgo mo bsam yas kyang //
NK051(zhi)004:2184: nges pa'i don du gcig las med //
NK051(zhi)004:2186: nges pa'i don gcig la ye shes lnga ji ltar snang zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:2187: rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal //
NK051(zhi)004:2188: rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug ste //
NK051(zhi)004:2189: 'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag /
NK051(zhi)004:2190: rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi rje //
NK051(zhi)004:2191: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba //
NK051(zhi)004:2193: rdo rje ni tshur mi tshugs pa dang phar shes bya 'bigs pa ste /
NK051(zhi)004:2194: chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa la dbang thob pas /
NK051(zhi)004:2195: de ni me long lta bu'i ye shes mi bskyod pa'i ngo bo ste /
NK051(zhi)004:2196: des zhe sdang rang kha ma 'dul bar byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2197: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs te /
NK051(zhi)004:2198: yon tan rin po che kun la dbang sgyur ba'i
NK051(zhi)004:2199: bdag po ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rin
NK051(zhi)004:2200: chen 'byung ldan gyi ngo bo ste /
NK051(zhi)004:2201: des nga rgyal dang ser sna rang kha ma 'dul lo //
NK051(zhi)004:2202: des 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyi ngo bo
NK051(zhi)004:2203: so so ma 'dres par gsal ba la dbang sgyur
NK051(zhi)004:2204: ba'i bdag po ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes
NK051(zhi)004:2205: snang ba mtha' yas kyi ngo bo ste /
NK051(zhi)004:2206: des 'dod chags rang kha ma 'dul lo //
NK051(zhi)004:2207: rdo rje ltar phrin las thogs pa med par 'chang
NK051(zhi)004:2208: ba ni bya ba grub pa'i ye shes don yod
NK051(zhi)004:2210: des phrag dog dang le lo rang kha ma 'dul lo //
NK051(zhi)004:2211: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs chos kyi dbyings rnam par
NK051(zhi)004:2212: dag pa chen po ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye
NK051(zhi)004:2213: shes rnam par snang mdzad kyi ngo bo ste /
NK051(zhi)004:2214: des gti mug rang kha ma 'dul lo //
NK051(zhi)004:2215: de dag kyang sku gsung thugs su 'dus tshul bstan pa'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)004:2216: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas //
NK051(zhi)004:2217: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba //
NK051(zhi)004:2218: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yang yin //
NK051(zhi)004:2220: rje btsun gyi thugs ni ye shes drug ro gcig cing mnyam pa ste /
NK051(zhi)004:2221: des sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la khyab cing gnas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2222: de yang shes bya ma lus pa mkhyen cing rig pas na thugs so //
NK051(zhi)004:2223: sangs rgyas kun gyi skur sprul pa yang rje btsun
NK051(zhi)004:2224: nyid yin pas sku rnams kyi nang na che ba'o
NK051(zhi)004:2225: // de yang khyab cing rten byed pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2227: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung 'byung ba'i rgyu dang ngo bo nyid du yang rje btsun 'gyur ba ste /
NK051(zhi)004:2228: gsal ba dang go bar byed pa dang grags pa'i phyir na gsung ngo //
NK051(zhi)004:2229: des gzhan gyi don mun pa sel zhing ma gos pa ni /
NK051(zhi)004:2230: rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che //
NK051(zhi)004:2231: rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od //
NK051(zhi)004:2232: chags bral la sogs chags pa che /
NK051(zhi)004:2234: rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas //
NK051(zhi)004:2236: dpal ldan sangs rgyas pad+ma skyes //
NK051(zhi)004:2238: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyis srid pa'i rgya mtsho skems pa'i nyi ma che'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2239: ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba'i zla ba'i 'od do //
NK051(zhi)004:2240: chags pa rang kha ma dang bral zhing don dang gdul bya la chags pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2241: yang na pha rol tu phyin pas 'dul ba'i gang
NK051(zhi)004:2242: zag la chags pa dang bral ba'i tshul du chos
NK051(zhi)004:2243: bshad la / gsang sngags kyi rigs can la chags
NK051(zhi)004:2244: pa rang rgyud du spyod pa'i tshul gyis chos bshad
NK051(zhi)004:2245: bshad la / do // nang na ye shes dang thugs rje'i 'od 'bar ba'i rtags /
NK051(zhi)004:2246: phyi rol du kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'od 'bar ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2247: thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i rtags su rdo rje skyil krung du bzhugs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2248: sangs rgyas rnams 'gro ba la byams pa'i chos 'dzin
NK051(zhi)004:2249: pa ni thugs mi rtog pa'i tshul gyis rang sgrar
NK051(zhi)004:2251: nyes skyon dang bral ba ni pad+ma lta bu ste /
NK051(zhi)004:2252: de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi skye gnas su gyur pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2253: tshul ji lta bu zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:2254: kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa //
NK051(zhi)004:2256: che ba gsang sngags rig sngags 'chang //
NK051(zhi)004:2258: shes bya ji lta ba dang ji snyed pa mkhyen pas kun mkhyen ye shes kyi mdzod 'dzin pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2259: yon tan gyi bgo skal las rgyal ba dang bdud
NK051(zhi)004:2260: las rgyal zhing sgyu ma lta bu'i sprul pa mos
NK051(zhi)004:2261: pa sna tshogs 'dul ba'i thabs sna tshogs 'chang ba'o
NK051(zhi)004:2262: // che ba'i yon tan khyad par du gsang sngags kyi ngo bo thabs shes rab dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2263: rig sngags kyi ngo bo shes rab dang ye shes 'chang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2264: 'o na shes rab kyi las gang zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:2265: rdo rje rnon po ral gri che //
NK051(zhi)004:2266: yi ge mchog ste rnam par dag /
NK051(zhi)004:2267: theg pa chen po sdug bsngal gcod //
NK051(zhi)004:2268: mtshon cha chen po rdo rje chos //
NK051(zhi)004:2269: rdo rje zab mo dzi na dzika //
NK051(zhi)004:2270: rdo rje blo gros don bzhin rig /
NK051(zhi)004:2272: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes ral gri dang 'dra bas bdag tu rtog pa thams cad gcod cing /
NK051(zhi)004:2273: don mi 'gyur ba yi ge dang 'dra ste /
NK051(zhi)004:2274: rtog pas dri mas ma gos pas mchog go //
NK051(zhi)004:2275: shes rab dang snying rjes khyad par byas nas theg pa chen po ste /
NK051(zhi)004:2276: de rtogs pas sdug bsngal rtsa ba nas gcod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2277: de gcod pa'i mtshon cha ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rdo rje lta bu'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2278: de lta bu'i zab mo ni rgyal ba'i yang rgyal po yin pas dzi na dzika go //
NK051(zhi)004:2279: shes rab chen po'i blo dang ldan pas shes bya ji lta ba'i don rig pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2280: de ltar rig pas gdul bya la rgyu 'bras kyi theg pa ston pa ni /
NK051(zhi)004:2281: pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs pa //
NK051(zhi)004:2282: sa rnams kun gyi rgyan dang ldan //
NK051(zhi)004:2283: rnam par dag pa bdag med chos //
NK051(zhi)004:2284: yang dag ye shes zla 'od bzang //
NK051(zhi)004:2285: brtson chen sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba ste //
NK051(zhi)004:2286: rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po mchog /
NK051(zhi)004:2288: rje btsun nyid la pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo rnams kyang rdzogs par mnga' la /
NK051(zhi)004:2289: sa bcu'i yon tan gyis kyang brgyan te /
NK051(zhi)004:2290: ma gos pas rnam par dag pa bdag med chos so //
NK051(zhi)004:2291: yang dag pa'i ye shes zla ba'i 'od lta bus ma rig pa dang gdung ba sel zhing /
NK051(zhi)004:2292: 'gro ba'i don la brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan te /
NK051(zhi)004:2293: sgyu ma lta bu'i sprul pa sna tshogs ston cing /
NK051(zhi)004:2294: khyad par du rgyud thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes ston pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2295: rtsa ba byang chub kyi sems gnyis su med pas rgyal ba kun gyi snying por bstan pa'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)004:2296: rdo rje'i gdan ni ma lus ldan //
NK051(zhi)004:2297: ye shes sku rnams ma lus 'chang //
NK051(zhi)004:2298: kun tu bzang po blo gros bzang //
NK051(zhi)004:2300: sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po che //
NK051(zhi)004:2302: gzhi chos sku rdo rje lta bu'i rtogs pa las
NK051(zhi)004:2303: ye shes kyi sku sna tshogs 'byung zhing bzang ngan
NK051(zhi)004:2304: dang blang dor gang yang med pas kun tu bzang
NK051(zhi)004:2305: la / bdag dang gzhan la phan pa mkhyen pas blo gros bzang ngo //
NK051(zhi)004:2306: sa bzhin du sems can la phan pa'i yon tan bskyed pa'i phyir dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2307: snod kyi 'jig rten du sprul nas 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)004:2308: sangs rgyas kun gyi sprul pa 'byung ba'i snying po chen por gyur pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2309: snying po de las sprul pa tshul ji ltar 'byung ba ni /
NK051(zhi)004:2311: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog /
NK051(zhi)004:2312: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin //
NK051(zhi)004:2313: skye med chos kyi sna tshogs ston //
NK051(zhi)004:2315: rig pa byang chub sems cir yang 'char bas sgrub
NK051(zhi)004:2316: thabs kyi bye brag sna tshogs 'byung ba yin la
NK051(zhi)004:2317: / der yang ma zad sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pa sna tshogs 'byung ba'i gzhi yin la /
NK051(zhi)004:2318: snod bcud kyi dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin skye med du gnas pas kyang mchog go //
NK051(zhi)004:2319: don skye ba med pas kyang gzugs nas rnam pa
NK051(zhi)004:2320: thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar lta bur kyang ma 'gags
NK051(zhi)004:2321: par shar bas rang bzhin 'dzin to //
NK051(zhi)004:2322: mdor na zab par skye ba med kyang rgya che ba sna tshogs su ston to //
NK051(zhi)004:2323: zab pa dang rgya che ba gnyis su med pas theg pa thams cad kyi mchog ces bya'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2324: shes rab dam pa'i ngo bo ci zhe na //
NK051(zhi)004:2325: chos kun ngo bo nyid 'chang ba //
NK051(zhi)004:2326: shes rab chen pos skad cig la //
NK051(zhi)004:2327: chos kun khong du chud pa ste //
NK051(zhi)004:2328: chos kun mngon par rtogs pa ni //
NK051(zhi)004:2333: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la sogs pa kun
NK051(zhi)004:2334: gyi ngo bo nyid ni mnyam pa chen po yin
NK051(zhi)004:2335: la / de gang gis rtogs na shes rab chen pos skad cig la //
NK051(zhi)004:2336: shes bya'i chos thams cad khong du chud de mngon sum du gsal bar rtogs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2337: shes rab de'i stobs ji lta bu zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:2338: thub pa blo mchog 'byung po sel //
NK051(zhi)004:2339: mi g.yo rab tu dang ba'i bdag /
NK051(zhi)004:2340: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub 'chang //
NK051(zhi)004:2341: sangs rgyas kun gyi mngon sum pa //
NK051(zhi)004:2342: ye shes me lce 'od rab gsal //
NK051(zhi)004:2344: lus ngag yid gsum mi dge ba'i las las thub cing /
NK051(zhi)004:2345: chos nyid rtogs pa'i blo'i mchog yod pas rnam rtog gi gnod pa 'byung po lta bu sel te /
NK051(zhi)004:2346: mtshan ma gang gis kyang mi g.yo bar chu dwangs
NK051(zhi)004:2347: ba lta bu'i bdag nyid gsal la rtogs pa med
NK051(zhi)004:2348: pa ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ste
NK051(zhi)004:2349: / de yang lam la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas ni mchog mkhyen la /
NK051(zhi)004:2350: sangs rgyas kyi mngon sum mkhyen te /
NK051(zhi)004:2351: ye shes de'i dpe ni me lce 'bar ba dang 'dra la /
NK051(zhi)004:2352: ma rig pa sel ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2353: nyon mongs pa sel ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2354: srin bu me khyer la sogs pa'i 'od zil gyis gnon pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2355: zhing khams grangs med du snang bar byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2356: da ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi sgo
NK051(zhi)004:2357: nas 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i mtshan bstan pa'i
NK051(zhi)004:2358: phyir / 'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste //
NK051(zhi)004:2359: ngan song thams cad rnam sbyong ba //
NK051(zhi)004:2360: mgon po sems can kun gyi mchog /
NK051(zhi)004:2361: sems can thams cad rab grol byed //
NK051(zhi)004:2362: nyon mongs g.yul du gcig dpa' ba //
NK051(zhi)004:2363: mi shes dgra yi dregs pa 'joms //
NK051(zhi)004:2364: zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
NK051(zhi)004:2365: mtho ris dang thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyi don
NK051(zhi)004:2366: du sbyin pa la sogs pa'i sgo nas sgrub par
NK051(zhi)004:2367: byed do // dman pa ngan song gsum las kyang
NK051(zhi)004:2368: thar pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos rnams bstan
NK051(zhi)004:2369: nas rgyu dang 'bras bu sbyong zhing /
NK051(zhi)004:2370: sems can kun gyi don byed pas mchog go //
NK051(zhi)004:2371: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa mkhyen pas blo'i
NK051(zhi)004:2372: rim pa dang sbyar nas nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba
NK051(zhi)004:2374: chos ji snyed cig bshad kyang nyon mongs pa 'dul ba'i gnyen por gcig go //
NK051(zhi)004:2375: des mu stegs la sogs pa zil gyis gnon pas dregs pa 'joms pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2376: gzhan gyi nyon mongs pa de ltar 'joms na /
NK051(zhi)004:2377: 'o na gzhan 'dul ba'i gzugs su ji ltar ston zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:2378: dpal ldan blo dang sgeg par ldan //
NK051(zhi)004:2379: brtan po mi sdug gzugs 'chang ba //
NK051(zhi)004:2381: bdag dang gzhan gyi dpal du gyur pas shes rab chen po'i blo dang ldan pa /
NK051(zhi)004:2382: blta na mdzes par mdzad pas na sgeg pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2384: zhi bas mi 'dul ba la bdud la sogs pa zlog pa'i 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs 'chang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2385: de yang gar la mos pa la gar du ston pa'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)004:2386: lag pa brgya po kun bskyod cing //
NK051(zhi)004:2387: gom pa'i stabs kyi gar byed pa //
NK051(zhi)004:2388: dpal ldan lag pa brgyas gang la //
NK051(zhi)004:2389: nam mkha' khyab par gar byed pa //
NK051(zhi)004:2391: tshangs pa 'dul ba'i gar lag pa brgya sprul te bsgyur ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2392: tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i mthus lag pa brgyar sprul te /
NK051(zhi)004:2393: nam mkha' khyab tshad du 'gro ba'i don byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2394: lus kyi rdzu 'phrul gzhan yang ston pa'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)004:2395: sa yi dkyil 'khor gzhi yi khyon //
NK051(zhi)004:2396: rkang pa ya gcig mthil gyis gnon //
NK051(zhi)004:2397: rkang mtheb sen mo'i khyon gyis kyang //
NK051(zhi)004:2398: tshangs pa'i yul sa rtse nas gnon //
NK051(zhi)004:2400: gling bzhi khyab 'jug gis 'dul ba de'i gnyen por
NK051(zhi)004:2401: gling bzhi ri rab dang bcas pa rkang pa ya
NK051(zhi)004:2402: gcig gi mthil gyis mnan pa ste /
NK051(zhi)004:2403: gling bzhi chung du ma song la zhabs che ru ma song ngo //
NK051(zhi)004:2404: gyen la ni zhabs kyi mthe bong gis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dus gcig tu gnon to //
NK051(zhi)004:2405: snga ma ltar che chung du ma song ba'i rdzu 'phrul stan to //
NK051(zhi)004:2406: 'khor ba 'di ma spangs par ji ltar grol bar 'gyur zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:2407: don gcig gnyis med chos kyi don //
NK051(zhi)004:2408: dam pa'i don de 'jigs pa med //
NK051(zhi)004:2409: rnam rig sna tshogs gzugs don can //
NK051(zhi)004:2410: rnam shes sna tshogs rgyud dang ldan //
NK051(zhi)004:2411: dngos don ma lus rnams la dga' //
NK051(zhi)004:2412: stong pa nyid dga' 'dod chags blo //
NK051(zhi)004:2413: srid pa'i 'dod chags spangs pa ste /
NK051(zhi)004:2414: srid gsum dga' ba chen po pa //
NK051(zhi)004:2416: gnyis su med pa ni don dam pa chos kyi sku ste /
NK051(zhi)004:2417: gzhan gyis mi thub pas 'jigs pa med de /
NK051(zhi)004:2418: thugs rje dang smon lam gyi shugs kyis rnam rig sna tshogs kyi gzugs su sprul lo //
NK051(zhi)004:2419: kun gzhi'i rnam shes nyid rnam rtog sna tshogs dang 'brel bas rgyud do //
NK051(zhi)004:2420: de ltar dngos po 'khor ba'i don ma lus par mdzad pa la dgyes shing /
NK051(zhi)004:2421: don dam par stong pa nyid la dga' zhing chags
NK051(zhi)004:2422: pa'i blos khams gsum gyi 'dod chags rang kha ma
NK051(zhi)004:2424: shes rab chen pos srid pa las grol kyang thugs rjes der sprul nas don mdzad pa la daga'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2425: don mdzad pa'i tshe sku'i gzi mdangs ci 'dra zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:2426: sprin dkar dag pa bzhin du dkar //
NK051(zhi)004:2428: nyi ma 'char ka'i dkyil ltar mdzes //
NK051(zhi)004:2429: sen mo'i 'od ni shas cher dmar //
NK051(zhi)004:2431: don la ma gos pa'i mtshan ma 'od kha dog sprin ltar dkar zhing /
NK051(zhi)004:2432: ye shes kyi 'od zer 'phro ba'i dpe ston ka'i
NK051(zhi)004:2433: zla ba'i 'od lta bus ma rig pa'i mun pa
NK051(zhi)004:2434: sel zhing gdung ba tshim par byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2435: de las kyang ye shes drug ro gcig pa'i rtags
NK051(zhi)004:2436: su 'od kha dog drug dang ldan pa'i sku mnga'
NK051(zhi)004:2437: ste / 'gro ba la thugs rjes chags pa'i rtags su phyag gi sen mo dmar ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2438: rgyan gyi khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:2439: cod pan bzang po mthon ka'i rtse //
NK051(zhi)004:2440: skra mchog mthon ka chen po pa //
NK051(zhi)004:2441: nor bu chen po 'od chags dpal //
NK051(zhi)004:2442: sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan dang ldan //
NK051(zhi)004:2444: mtha' gnyis las rgyal ba'i rtags su dbu la rin
NK051(zhi)004:2445: po che'i cod pan bzang zhing mdzes pas brgyan pa'o
NK051(zhi)004:2446: // skra yang gzhan pas mchog tu gyur pas rin
NK051(zhi)004:2447: po che mthon ka ltar sngo zhing mdzes pa'i skra
NK051(zhi)004:2448: // mnga' ba'o // 'gro ba'i don rdzogs par mdzad
NK051(zhi)004:2449: pa'i rtags su thugs ka na yid bzhin gyi nor
NK051(zhi)004:2450: bu rin po ches brgyan cing /
NK051(zhi)004:2451: sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa dpag tu med pa mnga'
NK051(zhi)004:2452: ba'i rtags su ba spu re re la ye shes
NK051(zhi)004:2453: sems dpa' re re gsal zhing mdzes pas brgyan pa'o
NK051(zhi)004:2454: // de lta bu de la lam gyi khyad par ji lta bu mnga' zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:2455: 'jig rten khams brgya kun bskyod pa //
NK051(zhi)004:2456: rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i stobs chen ldan //
NK051(zhi)004:2457: de nyid dran pa chen po 'chang //
NK051(zhi)004:2459: 'jig rten khams brgya ni mtshon pa tsam ste /
NK051(zhi)004:2460: mtha' yas par bskyod par mdzad do //
NK051(zhi)004:2461: bskyod nas ci mdzad na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
NK051(zhi)004:2462: bzhi la sogs pa'i sgo nas 'gro don mdzad de
NK051(zhi)004:2463: / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni 'dun pa'i
NK051(zhi)004:2464: ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
NK051(zhi)004:2465: / pa dang / sems kyi ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2466: brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2467: dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2468: de yang don mi bsnyel ba'i dran pa chen po 'chang ste /
NK051(zhi)004:2469: gzhan yang byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:2470: dran pa bzhi po ting 'dzin rgyal //
NK051(zhi)004:2471: byang chub yan lag me tog spos //
NK051(zhi)004:2472: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mtsho //
NK051(zhi)004:2473: lam gyi yan lag brgyad tshul rig /
NK051(zhi)004:2474: yang dag sangs rgyas lam rig pa //
NK051(zhi)004:2477: lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2480: de rnams ni tshogs lam gyi gnas skabs so //
NK051(zhi)004:2481: dran pa bzhi po de la yang ma zhen pas ting nge 'dzin rgyal lo //
NK051(zhi)004:2482: de la mthong lam gyi gnas skabs na byang chub kyi yan lag bdun te /
NK051(zhi)004:2483: dran pa yang dag par byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2484: chos rnam par dbye ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2490: de lta bu'i sgo nas 'gro ba'i don byed pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2491: 'phags pa mnyes par byed pas me tog spos so //
NK051(zhi)004:2492: der yang ma zad de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sogs te /
NK051(zhi)004:2493: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho tsam gyi gzhir rje btsun nyid 'gyur ro //
NK051(zhi)004:2494: gzhan yang sgom lam gyi gnas skabs na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ste /
NK051(zhi)004:2495: yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2503: de lta bu'i tshul rig nas 'gro ba 'dren par mdzad do //
NK051(zhi)004:2504: de ltar rigs ni yang dag par sangs rgyas pa'i lam rig pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2505: don mdzad pa la sngon du thugs rje skye dgos pa'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)004:2506: sems can kun la shas cher chags //
NK051(zhi)004:2507: nam mkha' lta bur chags pa med //
NK051(zhi)004:2508: sems can kun gyi yid la 'jug /
NK051(zhi)004:2509: sems can kun gyi yid ltar mgyogs //
NK051(zhi)004:2511: sems can kun la bu gcig pa'i ma ltar thugs rjes chags shing /
NK051(zhi)004:2512: 'o na mtshan mar mi 'gyur ram zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:2513: don nam mkha' ltar mkhyen pas chags pa rang kha ma sel lo //
NK051(zhi)004:2514: de yang sems can kun gyi yid la khyab par 'jug cing /
NK051(zhi)004:2515: 'gro ba'i don la brtson 'grus yid ltar mgyogs par mdzad pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2516: de yang don bya ba'i yul mkhyen pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)004:2517: sems can kun gyi dbang don shes //
NK051(zhi)004:2518: sems can kun gyi yid 'phrog pa //
NK051(zhi)004:2519: phung po lnga don de nyid shes //
NK051(zhi)004:2520: rnam dag phung po lnga 'chang ba //
NK051(zhi)004:2522: sems can kun gyi dbang po rab 'bring tha ma
NK051(zhi)004:2523: shes shing don gang la mos pa rnams shes pas
NK051(zhi)004:2524: so // sku blta bas chog mi shes pa ston pas kyang sems can kun gyi yid 'phrog la /
NK051(zhi)004:2525: yid rtog bcas rtog med du bzlog pas kyang yid 'phrog pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2526: de yang phung po lnga'i don kun rdzob sgyu ma lta bur shes la /
NK051(zhi)004:2527: don dam du skye ba med par shes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2528: de yang rnam par dag pa'i phung po lnga dang ldan te /
NK051(zhi)004:2529: tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2530: ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2531: shes rab kyi phung po dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2532: rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2533: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2534: 'o na don byed pa'i thabs ji ltar mkhyen ce na /
NK051(zhi)004:2535: nges 'byung kun gyi mtha' la gnas //
NK051(zhi)004:2536: nges par 'byung ba kun la mkhas //
NK051(zhi)004:2537: nges 'byung kun gyi lam la gnas //
NK051(zhi)004:2538: nges par 'byung ba kun ston pa //
NK051(zhi)004:2540: khams gsum pa las nges par 'byung ba'i chos kun
NK051(zhi)004:2541: gyi mthar thug pa ni gnyis su med pa'i ye
NK051(zhi)004:2542: shes te / de la rje btsun nyid ngang gis gnas shing /
NK051(zhi)004:2543: nges par 'byung ba'i chos kun ston pa la yang mkhas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2544: nyid kyang lam de la gnas pa'i tshul ston te /
NK051(zhi)004:2546: gdul bya rnams la ji ltar 'tshams par 'byung ba'i chos ston par mdzad do //
NK051(zhi)004:2547: des gzhan don ji ltar mdzad ce na /
NK051(zhi)004:2548: yan lag bcu gnyis srid rtsa bton //
NK051(zhi)004:2549: dag pa rnam pa bcu gnyis 'chang //
NK051(zhi)004:2550: bden bzhi'i tshul gyi rnam pa can //
NK051(zhi)004:2551: shes pa brgyad po rtogs pa 'chang //
NK051(zhi)004:2552: bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis ldan //
NK051(zhi)004:2553: de nyid rnam pa bcu drug rig /
NK051(zhi)004:2554: rnam pa nyi shus byang chub pa //
NK051(zhi)004:2555: rnam par sangs rgyas kun rig mchog /
NK051(zhi)004:2556: sangs rgyas kun gyi sprul pa'i sku //
NK051(zhi)004:2557: bye ba dpag med 'gyed pa po //
NK051(zhi)004:2559: rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis kyis ni srid pa yin te /
NK051(zhi)004:2560: ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed 'byung /
NK051(zhi)004:2561: 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa /
NK051(zhi)004:2562: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs /
NK051(zhi)004:2563: ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug /
NK051(zhi)004:2564: skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa /
NK051(zhi)004:2565: reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba /
NK051(zhi)004:2566: tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa /
NK051(zhi)004:2567: sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa /
NK051(zhi)004:2568: len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa /
NK051(zhi)004:2569: srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba /
NK051(zhi)004:2570: skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2571: de rnams kyi rtsa ba ni ma rig pa yin te /
NK051(zhi)004:2572: ma rig pa 'gags na de rnams 'gag pa'i phyir ro //
NK051(zhi)004:2573: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes chen pos ma rig pa rtsa ba nas bton pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2574: yang skye mched bcu gnyis dag pa'i tshul ni /
NK051(zhi)004:2587: yang bden pa rnam pa bzhis kyang sems can khrid par mdzad de /
NK051(zhi)004:2588: sdug bsngal gyi bden pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2592: de dag ni thun mong gi lam mo //
NK051(zhi)004:2593: khyad par gyi lam ni rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad kyi rang bzhin rtogs pa ste /
NK051(zhi)004:2594: de yang tshogs bdun ni kun gzhi'i byin gyi rlabs
NK051(zhi)004:2595: kyis 'byung ba yin la kun gzhi skye med du
NK051(zhi)004:2596: shes pas / des 'gres pas brgyad car skye med du shes par 'gyur ro //
NK051(zhi)004:2598: brgyad po skye med shes pa yis //
NK051(zhi)004:2599: dgongs pa rgyal ba kun dang mnyam //
NK051(zhi)004:2601: yang dag pa'i bden pa'i don sangs rgyas pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis dang yang ldan te /
NK051(zhi)004:2602: rigs lnga ye shes lnga shes rab dang snying rje khyad par can no //
NK051(zhi)004:2603: de nyid rnam pa bcu drug ni stong pa nyid bcu drug ste /
NK051(zhi)004:2606: phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2607: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2608: chen po stong pa nyid dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2609: don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2611: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2612: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2613: thog ma tha ma med pa'i stong pa nyid dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2614: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2615: rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2616: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2617: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2618: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2619: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //
NK051(zhi)004:2620: de ma rtogs pa sems can gyi dus na /
NK051(zhi)004:2621: sa la sogs pa 'byung ba lnga /
NK051(zhi)004:2622: gzugs la sogs pa phung po lnga /
NK051(zhi)004:2623: 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa lnga /
NK051(zhi)004:2624: mig la sogs pa dbang po lnga ste /
NK051(zhi)004:2625: rnam pa nyi shur snang ba ste /
NK051(zhi)004:2626: don rtogs pa'i dus na de dag kyang rigs lnga ye shes lngar shar te /
NK051(zhi)004:2627: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang de dag tu 'dus te /
NK051(zhi)004:2628: rnam pa de dag las grol nas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yin pas mchog go //
NK051(zhi)004:2630: 'byung ba lnga dang nyon mongs phung po lnga //
NK051(zhi)004:2631: dbang po rnam lnga'i zhen pa dang bral nas //
NK051(zhi)004:2632: rigs lnga ye shes lngar snang la //
NK051(zhi)004:2633: rdzogs sangs rgyas pa'i byang chub yin //
NK051(zhi)004:2635: de lta bu'i sangs rgyas la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mnga' bas kun rig pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2636: rig nas sprul pa bye ba dpag tu med pa bkye nas sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2637: de yang gdul bya'i blo dang 'tshams pa'i theg pa ston pa'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)004:2638: skad cig thams cad mngon par rtogs //
NK051(zhi)004:2639: sems kyi skad cig don kun rig /
NK051(zhi)004:2640: theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis //
NK051(zhi)004:2641: 'gro ba'i don la rtogs pa po //
NK051(zhi)004:2642: theg pa gsum gyi nges 'byung la //
NK051(zhi)004:2643: theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas //
NK051(zhi)004:2645: skad cig gis gdul bya'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal thams cad rig nas don mdzad do //
NK051(zhi)004:2646: 'o na rtog bcas su thal lo zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:2647: rtog byed de rang yang skye med du rig pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2648: rig nas theg pa sna tshogs kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2650: ji srid sems rnams 'jug gi bar //
NK051(zhi)004:2651: theg pa'i mtha' la thug pa med //
NK051(zhi)004:2653: de yang gdul bya theg pa gsum gyis 'dul ba la nyan thos dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2655: theg pa chen po bstan to //
NK051(zhi)004:2656: yang dag par theg pa gcig ste 'bras bu rdo rje'i theg pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2657: de yang 'bras bu sangs rgyas na ji ltar gnas
NK051(zhi)004:2658: pa de da lta nyid nas lam du khyer bas
NK051(zhi)004:2660: de yang skye dgu theg pa dgu bstan pa yang 'gro ba'i don bstan pa ma gtogs pa /
NK051(zhi)004:2661: theg pa 'di kun yang dag pa'i theg pa dag las gzhan ma yin zhes pa lta bu /
NK051(zhi)004:2662: de yang gsum po ni rgyu'i theg pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2665: rgyu la spyod pa rgyu yi chos //
NK051(zhi)004:2666: 'khor lo shin tu bskor byas nas //
NK051(zhi)004:2667: 'bras bu'i theg pa nye lam zhig /
NK051(zhi)004:2670: de la'ang spangs pa'i khyad par bstan pa'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)004:2671: nyon mongs khams rnams dag pa'i bdag /
NK051(zhi)004:2672: las kyi khams rnams zad byed pa //
NK051(zhi)004:2673: chu bo rgya mtsho kun las brgal //
NK051(zhi)004:2674: sbyor ba'i dgon pa las byung ba //
NK051(zhi)004:2675: nyon mongs nye ba kun nyon mongs //
NK051(zhi)004:2676: bag chags bcas pa gtan spangs pa //
NK051(zhi)004:2678: gnyis med rtogs pas nyon mongs pa dag cing /
NK051(zhi)004:2679: las ngan slong bar byed pa'i sems med pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2681: 'khor ba'i spyod yul ji snyed pa rnams ni chu bo dang 'dra ste /
NK051(zhi)004:2683: rgyun phyogs su khyed bar byed pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2685: mang ba'i phyir de las brgal zhing don la sbyor ba'i ye shes ni /
NK051(zhi)004:2686: rtog pa las dben pa'i dgon pa zhes bya'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2687: nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba drug dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2688: de yang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa nyi shu dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2689: kun nas nyon mongs pa sdug bsngal rnams dang bag
NK051(zhi)004:2690: chags sa bon dang bcas pa gtan nas spangs pa'o
NK051(zhi)004:2691: // de nyid thabs dang shes rab dam pa dang ji ltar ldan zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:2692: snying rje chen po shes rab thabs //
NK051(zhi)004:2693: don yod 'gro ba'i don byed pa //
NK051(zhi)004:2694: 'du shes kun gyi don spangs shing //
NK051(zhi)004:2695: rnam shes don ni 'gag par byed //
NK051(zhi)004:2697: snying rje chen po dang ldan pas zhi ba'i mtha' la mi gnas shing /
NK051(zhi)004:2698: shes rab chen po dang ldan pas srid pa'am 'khor ba la mi gnas te /
NK051(zhi)004:2699: thabs de lta bus 'gro ba'i don byed do //
NK051(zhi)004:2700: 'o na mtshan mar 'dzin pa can du mi 'gyur ram zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:2701: 'du shes ni yul la mtshan mar 'dzin pa ste /
NK051(zhi)004:2702: de spangs shing rnam shes zag pa dang bcas pa
NK051(zhi)004:2703: skye med du rtogs pas de'i skyon med du rtogs
NK051(zhi)004:2705: de ltar rang rtogs pa ma nor bas gzhan ma nor ba'i lam la 'god pa'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)004:2706: sems can kun gyi yid dang ldan //
NK051(zhi)004:2707: sangs rgyas kun gyi yid rig pa //
NK051(zhi)004:2708: sems can kun gyi yid la gnas //
NK051(zhi)004:2709: de dag sems dang mthun par 'jug /
NK051(zhi)004:2710: sems can kun yid tshim par byed //
NK051(zhi)004:2711: sems can kun gyi yid dga' ba //
NK051(zhi)004:2712: grub pa mthar phyin 'khrul pa med //
NK051(zhi)004:2713: nor ba thams cad rnam par spangs //
NK051(zhi)004:2714: don gsum the tshom med pa'i blo //
NK051(zhi)004:2715: kun don yon tan gsum gyi bdag /
NK051(zhi)004:2717: sems can gyi yid dang mthun par don mdzad pa
NK051(zhi)004:2718: de yang sangs rgyas kyi thugs mi rtog par rig
NK051(zhi)004:2720: des sems can kun gyi yid la khyab par gnas te /
NK051(zhi)004:2721: de dag gi sems dang mthun par 'gro ba'i don la 'jug la /
NK051(zhi)004:2722: zhugs nas sems can ji ltar 'dod pa ltar tshim zhing dga' bar byed de /
NK051(zhi)004:2723: sems can gyi don sgrub pa mtha' phyin par byed do //
NK051(zhi)004:2724: de yang 'khrul pa'am nor ba thams cad spangs te /
NK051(zhi)004:2727: theg pa sna tshogs kyi don dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2728: gsum la the tshom med pa ste /
NK051(zhi)004:2729: grub pa'i mtha' rnams nges par shes pa'i phyir ro //
NK051(zhi)004:2730: sems can kun gyi don du gyur pa'i yon tan
NK051(zhi)004:2731: sku dang gsung dang thugs gsum gyi bdag por gyur
NK051(zhi)004:2733: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas //
NK051(zhi)004:2734: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba //
NK051(zhi)004:2735: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yang yin //
NK051(zhi)004:2737: de yang rgyu rtogs pas 'bras bu mchog tu grub pa'i phyir //
NK051(zhi)004:2738: phung po lnga don dus gsum du //
NK051(zhi)004:2739: skad cig thams cad bye brag phyed //
NK051(zhi)004:2740: skad cig gcig gis rdzogs sangs rgyas //
NK051(zhi)004:2741: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'chang //
NK051(zhi)004:2742: lus med lus te lus kyi mchog /
NK051(zhi)004:2743: lus kyi mtha' ni rtogs pa po //
NK051(zhi)004:2744: gzugs rnams sna tshogs snang ba'i dpal //
NK051(zhi)004:2745: nor bu chen po rin chen tog /
NK051(zhi)004:2747: rgyu'i dus na phung po lnga la dus gsum gyi skad cig mas gzhig na bye brag phyed de /
NK051(zhi)004:2748: mu stegs kyi bdag po la sogs par byed de /
NK051(zhi)004:2749: 'bras bu'i dus su de kho na nyid thugs su
NK051(zhi)004:2750: chud pa la rim pa yod pa la ma yin
NK051(zhi)004:2751: pas skad cig mas kyang sangs rgyas te /
NK051(zhi)004:2752: 'di ni las 'phro dang dbang po'i mchog tu gyur pa la byed rtsol gyi spros pa bcad de /
NK051(zhi)004:2753: de bzhin nyid bsgoms pas lam nye bar ston to //
NK051(zhi)004:2754: de yang byed rtsol gyi spros pa bcad pa ni 'di skad du /
NK051(zhi)004:2755: shes rab dam pas ma zin pa'i //
NK051(zhi)004:2756: lam gyi dge ba stegs bcas kyang //
NK051(zhi)004:2757: mtho ris lha dang mi ru skye //
NK051(zhi)004:2758: skye shi med pa'i sa mi thob //
NK051(zhi)004:2761: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin mnyam //
NK051(zhi)004:2762: thugs rjes 'gro don mdzad par mnyam //
NK051(zhi)004:2764: sku bong dang tshe tshad dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2765: tshul dang rigs mi mnyam pa ltar snang ngo //
NK051(zhi)004:2766: de yang rang bzhin skye med 'chang bar mdzad do //
NK051(zhi)004:2767: chos kyi sku la zag bcas kyi lus med la /
NK051(zhi)004:2768: de'i byin gyi rlabs las longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku lus kyi mchog tu gyur pa 'byung ngo //
NK051(zhi)004:2769: lus thams cad kyi mtha' skye med du rtogs pa
NK051(zhi)004:2770: las sprul sku sna tshogs pa 'gro ba'i dpal du
NK051(zhi)004:2771: 'byung ba ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra
NK051(zhi)004:2772: bar 'dod pa skong bas rab ces bya'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2775: de yang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni nges pa rnam pa lnga dang ldan te /
NK051(zhi)004:2781: sprul sku ni rnam pa ma nges /
NK051(zhi)004:2786: da ni bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi sgo
NK051(zhi)004:2787: nas 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i mtshan bstan par
NK051(zhi)004:2788: bya ste / de yang phrin las kyi rgyu gang zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:2789: sangs rgyas kun gyis rtogs bya ba //
NK051(zhi)004:2790: sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med //
NK051(zhi)004:2791: ces pa la sogs pa smos te /
NK051(zhi)004:2792: chos kyi sku gnyis med ni sangs rgyas kun gyi
NK051(zhi)004:2793: rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i chos chen po yin
NK051(zhi)004:2794: la / de rtogs nas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bla na med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2795: gsang sngags las byung ye shes med //
NK051(zhi)004:2796: gsang sngags chen po rigs gsum pa //
NK051(zhi)004:2797: gsang sngags don kun skyed pa po //
NK051(zhi)004:2798: thig le chen po yi ge med //
NK051(zhi)004:2799: stong pa chen po yi ge lnga //
NK051(zhi)004:2800: thig le stong pa yi ge brgya //
NK051(zhi)004:2801: zhes pa thabs dang shes rab las byung ba'i chos
NK051(zhi)004:2802: kyi ngo bo nyid brjod du med pas yi ge
NK051(zhi)004:2803: med pa'o // rgyu che ba thabs dang shes rab
NK051(zhi)004:2804: las 'bras bu che ba sku gsung thugs kyi rigs
NK051(zhi)004:2806: des gsang sngags kyi don bskyed rim dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2807: rdzogs rim gzhan gyi rgyud la skyed par byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2808: don dam par thig chos nyid mi 'gyur ba la /
NK051(zhi)004:2809: le khyab cing gdal ba ste /
NK051(zhi)004:2810: ngo bo tshig gis brjod du med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2811: stong pa chen po chos kyi sku de nyid las
NK051(zhi)004:2812: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i sa bon yi ge ma
NK051(zhi)004:2816: thig le skye ba med pa de las yi ge brgya ste /
NK051(zhi)004:2817: de la brten nas sgrub thabs sna tshogs 'byung ba ste /
NK051(zhi)004:2818: don du na chos kyi sku la phyogs ris med cing 'gag pa med pa'i mathu'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2819: 'o na thugs kyi sprul pa gang zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:2820: rnam pa kun ldan rnam pa med //
NK051(zhi)004:2821: bcu drug phyed phyed thig le can //
NK051(zhi)004:2822: yan lag med pa'i rtsis las 'das //
NK051(zhi)004:2823: bsam gtan bzhi yi rtse mo can //
NK051(zhi)004:2824: bsam gtan yan lag kun shes shing //
NK051(zhi)004:2825: ting 'dzin rigs dang rgyud rig pa //
NK051(zhi)004:2827: kun rdzob tu mtshan dang dpe byad la sogs te snod bcud kyi rnam pa kun dang ldan la /
NK051(zhi)004:2828: don dam par snang ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
NK051(zhi)004:2829: dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug gi phyed yi ge brgyad yin la /
NK051(zhi)004:2830: brgyad kyi phyed bzhi yin te /
NK051(zhi)004:2832: de bzhi ni mtshon byed du byung ba yin te /
NK051(zhi)004:2834: rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi mtshon te /
NK051(zhi)004:2835: stong pa nyid kyi rnam par thar pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2836: mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2837: smon pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2838: thabs la mkhas pa'i rnam par thar pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2839: de yang stong pa nyid kyis ni dngos po las 'byin par byed do //
NK051(zhi)004:2840: mtshan ma med pas ni mtshan ma phra mo'i zhen pa las kyang 'byin par byed do //
NK051(zhi)004:2841: smon pa med pas ni 'bras bu re smon gyi mtha' la dmigs pa las 'byin par byed do //
NK051(zhi)004:2842: thabs la mkhas pas ni thabs dman zhing mi mkhas pa rnams las 'byin par byed do //
NK051(zhi)004:2843: de bzhi yang spros pa phyogs re bcad pa'i yon tan gyi cha nas bzhir bshad kyis /
NK051(zhi)004:2844: don du na thig le chen po yi ge med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2845: yang spyi bo bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo na
NK051(zhi)004:2846: byang chub kyi sems thig le cha bcu drug tu
NK051(zhi)004:2847: gnas te / de las kyi phyag rgya'i thabs kyi bye brag rnams la brten te /
NK051(zhi)004:2848: spyi bo bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i thig le
NK051(zhi)004:2849: bcu drug po bzhu ba'i phyed brgyad snying ga chos
NK051(zhi)004:2851: de bzhu ba'i phyed lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lor phab /
NK051(zhi)004:2852: de'i phyed gsang ba bde skyong gi 'khor lor phab ste /
NK051(zhi)004:2853: gnyis shor gnyis mnyam gyi dus su ngos gzung ngo //
NK051(zhi)004:2854: de yang dang yang du goms par byas pas mthar de'i zhen pa bag tsam dang yang bral te /
NK051(zhi)004:2855: thig le chen po yi ge med pa rtogs par 'gyur ro //
NK051(zhi)004:2857: zab mo rnam par thar pa bzhis //
NK051(zhi)004:2858: rnon po'i don du bshad pa yin //
NK051(zhi)004:2859: 'khor lo bzhin du bskor byed pa //
NK051(zhi)004:2860: rtul po'i don du shes par bya //
NK051(zhi)004:2862: de ltar bsgoms pas rnam rtog gi yan lag med pa /
NK051(zhi)004:2864: ting nge 'dzin bzang ba ni bsam gtan bzhi la lha'i ting nge 'dzin lta bu'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2865: rang nyid kyang de dang ldan zhing gzhan gyi ting
NK051(zhi)004:2866: nge 'dzin bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnams kyang shes
NK051(zhi)004:2867: te / de yang 'dod pa'i khams na lhag mthong shas che ba'i bsam gtan kyang shes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2868: gzugs med pa'i khams na zhi gnas shas che ba'i bsam gtan kyang shes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2869: gzugs kyi khams na zhi gnas lhag mthong zung du 'brel ba'i bsam gtan kyang shes te /
NK051(zhi)004:2870: de la bsam gtan bzhi la yan lag bco brgyad de /
NK051(zhi)004:2871: bsam gtan dang po la yang yan lag lnga ste /
NK051(zhi)004:2876: sems rtse gcig pa nyid do //
NK051(zhi)004:2877: bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang yan lag bzhi ste /
NK051(zhi)004:2880: nang rab tu dwangs pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2881: sems rtse gcig pa nyid do //
NK051(zhi)004:2882: bsam gtan gsum pa la yan lag lnga ste /
NK051(zhi)004:2887: sems rtse gcig pa nyid do //
NK051(zhi)004:2888: bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang yan lag bzhi ste /
NK051(zhi)004:2889: btang snyoms yongs su dag pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2890: dran pa yongs su dag pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2891: bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba yongs su dag pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2892: sems rtse gcig pa nyid do //
NK051(zhi)004:2893: de rnams rje btsun nyid kyis shes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2894: gzhan dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2895: rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2896: seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2897: zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge
