NK051(zhi)004:2898: 'dzin la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin brgya rtsa gcig
NK051(zhi)004:2899: kyang mkhyen cing / gang zag gi bsam pa dang
NK051(zhi)004:2900: bag la nyal dang skye gnas kyi rgyud kyi bsdus
NK051(zhi)004:2901: pa rnams kyang rig cing mkhyen no //
NK051(zhi)004:2902: 'o na longs sku'i mtshon pa ci zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:2903: ting 'dzin lus can lus kyi mchog /
NK051(zhi)004:2904: longs spyod rdzogs sku kun gyi rgyal //
NK051(zhi)004:2906: ting nge 'dzin lus can ni chos kyi sku ste /
NK051(zhi)004:2907: sku de nyid kyi rten byed cing mchog tu gyur pa de ni gazhi'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2908: de las theg pa chen po'i chos la longs spyod pa sku rnam par snang mdzad du snang ste /
NK051(zhi)004:2909: de yang nges pa lnga dang ldan zhing 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lta bur bzhugs pa ste /
NK051(zhi)004:2911: theg chen nye bar longs spyod phyir //
NK051(zhi)004:2912: thub pa'i longs spyod rdzogs skur 'dod //
NK051(zhi)004:2914: de yang sku'i mdzad spyod rnam par dag pa'i sgo
NK051(zhi)004:2915: nas 'khor sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
NK051(zhi)004:2916: gtso bor gyur pa rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo
NK051(zhi)004:2918: de la sprul pa'i sku'i mdzad spyod ci zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:2919: sprul pa'i sku ste sku yi mchog /
NK051(zhi)004:2920: sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyud 'chang ba //
NK051(zhi)004:2921: phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed //
NK051(zhi)004:2922: ji bzhin 'gro ba'i don byed pa //
NK051(zhi)004:2924: de yang rgyal ba sprul pa'i sku ni /
NK051(zhi)004:2925: 'khor rigs drug gi sems can dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2927: rang rgyal ba rnams la gsung gi mdzad spyod rnam
NK051(zhi)004:2928: par dag pa'i sgo nas chos kyi 'khor lo skor
NK051(zhi)004:2929: bar mdzad do // sprul sku ma dag pa las mchog tu gyur pa sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs /
NK051(zhi)004:2930: gtsug tor can la sogs pa sangs rgyas stong rtsa gnyis kyi rgyud du sprul pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2931: sprul nas gang du 'gyed na phyogs bcur 'gyed do //
NK051(zhi)004:2932: bkye nas ci byed na ji ltar 'tshams pa ltar 'gro ba'i don byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2933: 'o na ma dag pa'i sprul sku gang zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:2934: lha yi dbang po lha yi lha //
NK051(zhi)004:2935: lha yi bdag po lha min bdag /
NK051(zhi)004:2936: 'chi med dbang po lha yi bla //
NK051(zhi)004:2939: lha'i dbang po ste khyab 'jug gis 'dul ba la khyab 'jug tu sprul lo //
NK051(zhi)004:2941: lha'i bdag po ni brgya byin no //
NK051(zhi)004:2942: lha min bdag po ni thag bzang ris so //
NK051(zhi)004:2943: 'chi med dbang po ni 'thab bral la sogs pa'i lha'i rgyal po rnams so //
NK051(zhi)004:2944: lha'i bla ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed la sogs pa'i lha'i rgyal po'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2945: 'joms byed ni drag po 'jigs byed do //
NK051(zhi)004:2946: 'joms byed dbang phyug ni ma h+aa de ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2947: de rnams kyis 'dul ba la de rnams su sprul nas don mdzad do //
NK051(zhi)004:2948: chos kyi sbyin pa'i tshul ni /
NK051(zhi)004:2949: srid pa'i dgon pa las brgal ba //
NK051(zhi)004:2950: ston pa gcig pu 'gro ba'i bla //
NK051(zhi)004:2951: 'jig rten phyogs bcur rab grags pa //
NK051(zhi)004:2952: chos kyi sbyin bdag che ba po //
NK051(zhi)004:2953: byams pa'i go cha chas pa ste //
NK051(zhi)004:2954: snying rje yi ni ya lad bgos //
NK051(zhi)004:2955: shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs //
NK051(zhi)004:2956: nyon mongs mi shes g.yul ngo sel //
NK051(zhi)004:2957: dpa' bo bdud dgra bdud 'dul ba //
NK051(zhi)004:2958: bdud bzhi'i 'jig pa sel bar byed //
NK051(zhi)004:2959: bdud kyi dpung rnams pham byed pa //
NK051(zhi)004:2961: srid pa ni nges pa'i 'byung gnas yin te /
NK051(zhi)004:2962: dgon pa ni de las dben pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2963: de las brgal te don gnyis med rtogs pas ston pa gcig pu'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2964: yang na bstan pa gcig la ston pa gnyis mi 'byung bas so //
NK051(zhi)004:2965: 'gro ba thams cad kyi ston par gyur pas na bla ma'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2966: de yis 'jig rten phyogs bcur grags te /
NK051(zhi)004:2967: rgyu cis grags na chos kyi sbyin pas grags so //
NK051(zhi)004:2968: de yang rlom pa lta bu ma yin te /
NK051(zhi)004:2969: byams pa'i go cha gon zhing /
NK051(zhi)004:2971: de'i mtshon cha ni nyon mongs gcod pa'i shes rab kyi ral gri dang /
NK051(zhi)004:2972: thabs shes rab kyi mda' gzhus nyon mongs pa dang ma rig pa'i g.yul ngo sel lo //
NK051(zhi)004:2973: gang las dpa' na bdud 'dul bas dapa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:2974: gzhan bdud bzhi'i 'jigs pa las kyang skyob cing sel bar byed do //
NK051(zhi)004:2975: phyogs gcig sel ba tsam ma yin te /
NK051(zhi)004:2976: bdud kyi dpung sde dang bcas pa pham par byed pa ste /
NK051(zhi)004:2977: de yang sems skye ba med pa rtogs pas nyon mongs pa'i bdud bcom //
NK051(zhi)004:2978: sems nyid la rgas rgud med pas phung po'i bdud bcom /
NK051(zhi)004:2979: sems nyid la skye shi med pas 'chi bdag gi bdud bcom /
NK051(zhi)004:2980: sems nyid rtogs pas the tshom dang bral te lha'i bu'i bdud bcom /
NK051(zhi)004:2982: gal te bdud kyi tshogs ni bye ba dag /
NK051(zhi)004:2983: sangs rgyas skur bsgyur bar chad smra byas kyang //
NK051(zhi)004:2984: chos la mkhas pas chos nyid rab thob ste //
NK051(zhi)004:2985: de dag byang chub las ni bzlog mi nus //
NK051(zhi)004:2987: de lta bu de mchod pa'i 'os su bstan pa'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)004:2990: rtag tu ri mor bya ba'i 'os //
NK051(zhi)004:2991: bkur 'os rjed par bya ba'i mchog /
NK051(zhi)004:2992: phyag byar 'os pa bla ma'i rab //
NK051(zhi)004:2994: sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid rje btsun gyis 'jig rten pa rnam par thar pa'i gnas su 'dren pas /
NK051(zhi)004:2998: sku gzugs bris la mchod pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:3000: phu dud du bkur ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:3002: lus ngag yid gsum gus pas phyag bya bar 'os te //
NK051(zhi)004:3003: bla ma'i rab tu gyur pa'i phyir ro //
NK051(zhi)004:3004: de'i mkhyen pa'i bye brag ci zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:3005: 'jig rten gsum po gom gcig bgrod //
NK051(zhi)004:3006: mkha' ltar mtha' med rnam par gnon //
NK051(zhi)004:3007: gsum rig gtsang ma dag pa ste //
NK051(zhi)004:3008: mngon shes drug ldan rjes dran drug /
NK051(zhi)004:3010: 'jig rten gsum po de shes rab kyi gom pa gcig gi bar du bgrod la /
NK051(zhi)004:3011: rtags rdzu 'phrul gyi gom pas bgrod do //
NK051(zhi)004:3012: nam mkha' ltar chos kyi sku mtha' med par rtogs pas nyon mongs pa gnon par byed do //
NK051(zhi)004:3013: de yang phyi sde snod gsum rig la /
NK051(zhi)004:3014: nang du sku gsung thugs rig ste /
NK051(zhi)004:3015: bdag gzhan gyi dri ma dang bral bas gtsang ma dag pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:3016: gzhan yang mngon par shes pa drug ste /
NK051(zhi)004:3017: lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:3018: lha'i rna ba'i mngon par shes pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:3019: pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:3020: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:3021: rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba shes pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:3022: zag pa zad pa'i mngon par shes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:3023: rjes su dran pa drug ni /
NK051(zhi)004:3024: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:3025: chos rjes su dran pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:3026: dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:3027: dam tshig rjes su dran pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:3028: thugs rje rjes su dran pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:3029: mdzad pa rjes su dran pa dang drug go //
NK051(zhi)004:3030: shes rab dam pa ji lta bu zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:3031: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
NK051(zhi)004:3033: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mtha' //
NK051(zhi)004:3034: shes rab kyis ni de nyid thob //
NK051(zhi)004:3036: byang chub sems dpa' ni rang don no //
NK051(zhi)004:3037: sems dpa' chen po ni gzhan don no //
NK051(zhi)004:3038: de yang byang chub ni nam mkha' lta bu'i chos kyi sku la /
NK051(zhi)004:3039: sems dpa' ni de rtogs par 'dod pa'i 'dun pa yod pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:3040: gzhan gyi don la dpa' ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:3042: byang chub nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
NK051(zhi)004:3043: kun tu rtog pa thams cad spangs //
NK051(zhi)004:3044: gang zhig de rtogs 'dod pa de //
NK051(zhi)004:3045: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
NK051(zhi)004:3047: de yang rdzu 'phrul chen po brnyes te 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:3048: pha rol tu phyin pa'i mthar thug pa de kho na nyid ni /
NK051(zhi)004:3049: shes rab kyis thob par byed do //
NK051(zhi)004:3050: de nyid dpe las 'das par bstan pa'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)004:3051: bdag rig gzhan rig thams cad pa //
NK051(zhi)004:3052: kun la phan pa'i gang zag mchog /
NK051(zhi)004:3053: dper bya kun las 'das pa ste //
NK051(zhi)004:3054: shes dang shes bya'i bdag po mchog /
NK051(zhi)004:3056: ji lta ba bdag gi don dang /
NK051(zhi)004:3057: ji snyed pa gzhan gyi don thams cad rig pa'i sgo nas kun la phan par byed pa ste /
NK051(zhi)004:3058: gang zag ltar sprul kyang dngos ma yin pas mchog go //
NK051(zhi)004:3059: cung zad du yang mnyam pa med pas na dpe las 'das pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:3060: shes par byed pa dang shes par bya ba'i don gnyis ka'i bdag po'i mchog tu gyur pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:3061: gang gi sgo nas shes par byed ce na /
NK051(zhi)004:3062: gtso bo chos kyi sbyin bdag ste //
NK051(zhi)004:3063: phyag rgya bzhi yi don ston pa //
NK051(zhi)004:3064: 'gro ba'i bsnyen bkur gnas kyi mchog /
NK051(zhi)004:3065: nges 'byung gsum po bgrod rnams kyi //
NK051(zhi)004:3066: don gyi dam pa rnam dag dpal //
NK051(zhi)004:3067: 'jig rten gsum na skal bzang che //
NK051(zhi)004:3069: rje btsun nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gtso bor
NK051(zhi)004:3070: gyur bas kyang chos kyi sbyin pa ni sbyin pa
NK051(zhi)004:3071: rnams kyi gtso bor gyur pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:3072: de'i bdag po ni rje btsun no //
NK051(zhi)004:3073: de phyag rgya bzhi'i chos ston te /
NK051(zhi)004:3074: de la yang bka' rtags kyi phyag rgya bzhi la /
NK051(zhi)004:3075: theg pa chung ngu'i bka' rtags kyi phyag rgya bzhi ni /
NK051(zhi)004:3081: mi rtag sdug bsngal stong dang bdag med pa //
NK051(zhi)004:3082: de ni rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i chos //
NK051(zhi)004:3085: bden bzhi tshul gyi rnam pa can //
NK051(zhi)004:3087: theg pa chen po'i dbang du byas na /
NK051(zhi)004:3093: bka' don rig pa gtan tshigs dang //
NK051(zhi)004:3096: de la lha'i sku phyag rgya chen po bzhi ni /
NK051(zhi)004:3099: thugs dam tshig gi phyag rgya /
NK051(zhi)004:3101: gdul bya lam gyi phyag rgya bzhi ni las kyi phyag rgya dang /
NK051(zhi)004:3105: de ltar ston pa ni 'gro ba rnams kyi bsnyen bkur ba'i chos kyi mchog go //
NK051(zhi)004:3106: nges 'byung gsum ni theg pa gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)004:3108: don dam pa sgrib pa gnyis dag pas bdag dang gzhan gyi dpal du 'gyur te /
NK051(zhi)004:3109: 'jig rten gsum na skal pa mchog tu gyur pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:3110: de lta bu'i ston pa de gang zhe na /
NK051(zhi)004:3111: tshogs gnyis rdzogs shing bdag dag gzhan gyi dpal du
NK051(zhi)004:3112: gyur pa 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa ster bar
NK051(zhi)004:3113: byed pa rje btsun nyid yin pas /
NK051(zhi)004:3114: dpal ldan 'byor pa kun byed pa //
NK051(zhi)004:3115: 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pas mchog /
NK051(zhi)004:3117: da ni 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la bstod pa'i le'u bstan pa'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)004:3118: mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud //
NK051(zhi)004:3119: yang dag mthar gyur khyod la 'dud //
NK051(zhi)004:3120: stong nyid las byung khyod la 'dud //
NK051(zhi)004:3121: sangs rgyas byang chub khyod la 'dud //
NK051(zhi)004:3122: ces pa la sogs pa smos te /
NK051(zhi)004:3123: de yang 'dis ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi sgo nas bstod pa ste /
NK051(zhi)004:3124: mchog tu gyur pa'i chos kyi dbyings gzhan la sbyin
NK051(zhi)004:3125: par byed pa po ni sku gsung thugs rdo rje
NK051(zhi)004:3126: ltar dbyer mi phyed pa'i mchog rje btsun 'jam dpal
NK051(zhi)004:3127: khyod yin pas khyod la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal zhes
NK051(zhi)004:3128: pa'o // khyod ces pa ni 'bod pa'i sgra kun la sbyar ro //
NK051(zhi)004:3129: yang dag pa'i mthar gyur pa ni skye ba med pa khyod la 'dud pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:3130: stong pa nyid kyi don rtogs pa las byung ba khyod la 'dud do //
NK051(zhi)004:3131: sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub dam pa yin pas khyod la gus pas 'dud ces pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:3132: me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi sgo nas bstod pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)004:3133: sangs rgyas chags pa khyod la 'dud //
NK051(zhi)004:3138: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes me long lta bus chos
NK051(zhi)004:3139: kyi dbyings la gnas shing chags pa khyod la 'dud
NK051(zhi)004:3140: do // sangs rgyas rnams thugs rjes 'gro ba 'dren par 'dod pa khyod la 'dud do //
NK051(zhi)004:3141: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes me long lta bus chos
NK051(zhi)004:3142: kyi dbyings rtogs par dgyes pas khyod la 'dud do
NK051(zhi)004:3143: // sangs rgyas kyi dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su
NK051(zhi)004:3144: med pa la rol pas khyod la phyag 'tshal zhing
NK051(zhi)004:3145: // 'dud do // da ni so sor rtog pa'i
NK051(zhi)004:3146: ye shes kyi sgo nas bstod pa bstan pa'i phyir
NK051(zhi)004:3147: // 'dud do // / sangs rgyas 'dzum pa khyod la 'dud //
NK051(zhi)004:3149: sangs rgyas gsung nyid khyod la 'dud //
NK051(zhi)004:3152: sangs rgyas de kho na nyid khong du chud pas
NK051(zhi)004:3153: mnyes nas zhal 'dzum mdzad pa khyod la 'dud do
NK051(zhi)004:3154: // sangs rgyas kyi 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa la
NK051(zhi)004:3155: dgyes nas bzhad pa ni chos gsung ba'i snga ltas
NK051(zhi)004:3156: ston pa khyod la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dud do //
NK051(zhi)004:3157: sangs rgyas gsung gi sgo nas gdul bya la sna tshogs su chos ston pa khyod la 'dud do //
NK051(zhi)004:3158: sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i chos ston pas mdzad kyang thugs
NK051(zhi)004:3159: mnyam pa nyid las ma g.yos pa khyod la phyag
NK051(zhi)004:3161: da ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi sgo nas bstod pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)004:3162: med pa las byung khyod la 'dud //
NK051(zhi)004:3164: nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud //
NK051(zhi)004:3165: ye shes las byung khyod la 'dud //
NK051(zhi)004:3167: chos thams cad dngos po med par rtogs pa las 'byung bas khyod la 'dud do //
NK051(zhi)004:3168: sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i don la 'jig rten du 'byung bas khyod la 'dud do //
NK051(zhi)004:3169: chos nyid nam mkha' lta bu rtogs pa las che
NK051(zhi)004:3170: ba'i yon tan thams cad 'byung bas khyod la 'dud
NK051(zhi)004:3171: do // mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes las byung ba'i 'jam dpal khyod la 'dud do //
NK051(zhi)004:3172: da ni bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi sgo nas bstod pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)004:3174: sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la 'dud //
NK051(zhi)004:3175: thams cad thams cad khyod la 'dud //
NK051(zhi)004:3176: ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud //
NK051(zhi)004:3178: sgyu ma lta bu'i sprul pa thams cad thabs dang
NK051(zhi)004:3179: shes rab d+r+wa ba lta bur 'brel bas med pa
NK051(zhi)004:3180: sprul zhing yod pa bsgyur ba khyod la 'dud do
NK051(zhi)004:3181: // 'gro ba'i don du sangs rgyas kyi sku gsung
NK051(zhi)004:3182: thugs kyi rol pa sna tshogs ston pa khyod la
NK051(zhi)004:3183: // 'dud do // yon tan thams cad dang ldan
NK051(zhi)004:3184: zhing yon tan thams cad kyis gzhan don grub par
NK051(zhi)004:3186: ye shes drug ro gcig pa las grub pa'i sku
NK051(zhi)004:3187: nyid 'jam dpal khyod yin pas phyag 'tshal 'dud do
NK051(zhi)004:3188: zhes bstod pa'o // da ni 'bod pa don yod par bya ba'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)004:3189: nyams su blangs pa'i phan yon bstan pa ni /
NK051(zhi)004:3190: lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang //
NK051(zhi)004:3191: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
NK051(zhi)004:3192: de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang bskur ba'i ming ngo //
NK051(zhi)004:3195: yid kyi gsang ba zhes pa ni /
NK051(zhi)004:3198: rig stong du rtogs dka' bas gsang ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:3200: chos thams cad kyi lung ngo zhes pa ni mtshan
NK051(zhi)004:3201: yang dag pa 'di khyab che bas na lung ngo
NK051(zhi)004:3203: bzung sla bas na lung ngo //
NK051(zhi)004:3204: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi ni tshad med pa bzhi'o //
NK051(zhi)004:3205: kun tu sbyor ba thams cad dang bral ba ni rjes su chags pa'i kun tu sbyor ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:3206: khong khro ba'i kun tu sbyor ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:3207: nga rgyal ba'i kun tu sbyor ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:3208: ma rig pa'i kun tu sbyor ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:3209: lta ba'i kun tu sbyor ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:3210: mchog tu kun tu sbyor ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:3211: the tshom gyi kun tu sbyor ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:3212: ser sna'i kun tu sbyor ba rnams so //
NK051(zhi)004:3213: rdzas thams cad las thar ba ni /
NK051(zhi)004:3214: nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i phung po dang bral ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:3215: mi khom pa brgyad po ni /
NK051(zhi)004:3216: sems can dmyal bar skye ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:3219: dbang po ma tshang ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:3220: lta ba log par 'dzin pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:3221: yul mtha' 'khob tu skyes pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:3222: sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa'i zhing du skyes pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:3223: 'du shes med pa'i srid par skyes pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:3227: glang po che smyon pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:3232: sha za'i 'jigs pa dang brgyad do //
NK051(zhi)004:3233: dbang phyug phun sum tshogs pa ni /
NK051(zhi)004:3234: yon tan gyi dbang phyug brgyad la bya ste /
NK051(zhi)004:3235: de yang pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzhung gis //
NK051(zhi)004:3243: dga' mgur spyod pa dang brgyad do //
NK051(zhi)004:3244: gsang sngags kyi gzhung gis sku'i dbang phyug dang /
NK051(zhi)004:3248: phyogs thams cad du song ba'i dbang phyug dang /
NK051(zhi)004:3250: ci 'dod sbyin pa'i dbang phyug dang //
NK051(zhi)004:3251: gnas kyi dbang phyug dang brgyad do //
NK051(zhi)004:3253: yang zhing phra ba mchod pa'i 'os //
NK051(zhi)004:3254: bdag gyur longs spyod gar yang phyin //
NK051(zhi)004:3255: 'dod dgur ldan zhing dga' mgur spyod //
NK051(zhi)004:3256: de dag rgyal po'i dbang phyug brgyad //
NK051(zhi)004:3258: sku gsung thugs dang rdzu 'phrul che //
NK051(zhi)004:3259: kun song 'dod spyod gzhan la sbyin //
NK051(zhi)004:3260: gnas kyi dbang phyug rnam pa brgyad //
NK051(zhi)004:3263: spyan lnga ni gong du bshad zin to //
NK051(zhi)004:3264: grong ni khang khyim gcig yod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:3265: grong khyer ni khyim mang po tshan gcig tu spungs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:3266: grong brdal ni grong tshom bu mang po yod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:3267: ljongs ni yul lung pa gcig gis bsdus pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:3268: yul 'khor ni yul gru mang po zhig phyogs gcig tu byas pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:3269: ma mo bdun po ni khyo med ma bzhi /
NK051(zhi)004:3270: khyo can ma gsum ste bdun las /
NK051(zhi)004:3274: gzhon nu ma dang bzhi khyo med ma'o //
NK051(zhi)004:3277: rgan byed mo dang gsum ma h+aa de ba'i chung ma'o //
NK051(zhi)004:3280: nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma dang /
NK051(zhi)004:3283: dus kyi snyigs ma dang lnga'o //
NK051(zhi)004:3284: lhag ma rnams ni go sla bas ma bshad do //
NK051(zhi)004:3285: da ni shin tu bsdus pa las mtshan thams cad bsdus pa'i sngags bstan pa'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)004:3286: sarba d+har+m+aa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
NK051(zhi)004:3287: ni bkra shis pa'i tshig kyang yin /
NK051(zhi)004:3288: ye sha sa lnga yang yin /
NK051(zhi)004:3289: phyag 'tshal zhing byin gyis rlob par byed pa yang yin no //
NK051(zhi)004:3292: a b+h+aa ba ni dngos po med pa /
NK051(zhi)004:3293: swa b+h+aa ba ni rang bzhin /
NK051(zhi)004:3294: bi shud+d+ha ni rnam par dag pa /
NK051(zhi)004:3297: rnam par thar pa bzhi yi mtshon pa ste /
NK051(zhi)004:3301: thabs mkhas pa dang bzhi ste /
NK051(zhi)004:3302: 'di bzhi yang don skye ba med par 'du ste /
NK051(zhi)004:3304: chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin gyis
NK051(zhi)004:3305: rnam par dag pa'i mig gis skye ba med pa
NK051(zhi)004:3306: shes so zhes bshad pa yin no //
NK051(zhi)004:3307: de dag gis ni rtsa ba'i sngags bstan to //
NK051(zhi)004:3308: pra kri ti ni zab pa dang rgya che ba gnyis su med pa /
NK051(zhi)004:3309: pa ri shud+d+ha ni yongs su dag pa /
NK051(zhi)004:3310: sarba d+harma ni chos thams cad /
NK051(zhi)004:3311: ya du ta ni bskyed pa /
NK051(zhi)004:3312: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad /
NK051(zhi)004:3313: dz+ny+aa na k+aa ya ni ye shes kyi sku /
NK051(zhi)004:3315: pa ri shud+d+h+aa t+aa ni yongs su dag pa /
NK051(zhi)004:3316: mu p+aa d+aa ya ti zhes pa byin gyis rlob par byed pa zhes kyang ston to //
NK051(zhi)004:3318: gzung bar bya'o zhes kyang ston to //
NK051(zhi)004:3319: mtha' sdud pas zab pa dang rgya che ba gnyis
NK051(zhi)004:3320: su med pa yongs su dag pa las chos thams
NK051(zhi)004:3322: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku 'jam dpal
NK051(zhi)004:3323: yongs su dag par khas blang gzung bar bya zhes
NK051(zhi)004:3324: pa'o // am ahni skye 'gag med pa /
NK051(zhi)004:3325: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad /
NK051(zhi)004:3326: hri da ya ni snying po ste thugs so //
NK051(zhi)004:3327: ha ra ha ra 'phrog par byed pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:3328: h+aum h+r+aihni sku gsung thugs byin gyis rlob pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:3329: b+ha ga w+aan ni bcom ldan 'das so //
NK051(zhi)004:3330: dz+ny+aa na m+aurti ni ye shes kyi sku'o //
NK051(zhi)004:3331: w+aa g+ai shwa ra ni ngag gi dbang phyug go //
NK051(zhi)004:3332: ma h+aa pa tsa ni gsung ba chen po'o //
NK051(zhi)004:3333: sarba d+harma ni chos thams cad /
NK051(zhi)004:3334: ga g+aa na ni nam mkha' lta bu'o //
NK051(zhi)004:3335: a ma la ni dri ma med pa /
NK051(zhi)004:3336: su pa ri shud+d+ha ni yongs su dag pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:3337: d+harma d+h+aa tu ni chos kyi dbyings so //
NK051(zhi)004:3338: dz+ny+aa na gar+b+ha a ni ye shes kyi snying po'o //
NK051(zhi)004:3339: mtha' bsdus pas skye 'gag med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs 'phrog pas byed pa /
NK051(zhi)004:3340: sku gsung thugs byin gyis rlob par byed pa /
NK051(zhi)004:3341: bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes kyi sku dang /
NK051(zhi)004:3342: gsung gi dbang phyug gsang ba chen po /
NK051(zhi)004:3343: chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar dri ma med cing yongs su dag pa /
NK051(zhi)004:3344: chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po zhes bya ste /
NK051(zhi)004:3345: des ni las sngags bstan te bsdus pa'i don to //
NK051(zhi)004:3346: de ltar ston pa sh+aakya thub pas lam 'bras bu
NK051(zhi)004:3347: dang bcas pa'i chos thun mong ma yin pa'i mtshan
NK051(zhi)004:3348: gsungs pas 'khor rjes su yi rang ba bstan pa
NK051(zhi)004:3349: ni / de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
NK051(zhi)004:3350: dga' zhing mgu nas thal mo sbyar //
NK051(zhi)004:3351: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
NK051(zhi)004:3352: de yang 'dis ni tshul ji ltar yi rang ba bstan te /
NK051(zhi)004:3353: mtshan gyi gzhung rdzogs pa'i rjes de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang /
NK051(zhi)004:3354: rang dang gzhan gyi don yongs su rdzogs pas dga' zhing /
NK051(zhi)004:3355: de bshad pa'i ston pa la mgu nas lus tsog pur 'dug /
NK051(zhi)004:3356: lag pa thal mo sbyar nas yi rang ngo //
NK051(zhi)004:3357: yul gang la yi rang na /
NK051(zhi)004:3358: mgon po bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs //
NK051(zhi)004:3359: rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas //
NK051(zhi)004:3361: 'gro ba rnams kyi don mdzad pas kyang sh+aakya thub pa /
NK051(zhi)004:3363: legs pa'i yon tan drug dang ldan pas /
NK051(zhi)004:3364: zab pa de bzhin nyid du gshegs pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:3365: rgya che ba 'gro ba'i don la gshegs pa /
NK051(zhi)004:3367: spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /
NK051(zhi)004:3368: ye shes phun sum tshogs pa de la /
NK051(zhi)004:3369: lus ngag yid gsum gus pa dang bcas nas /
NK051(zhi)004:3370: gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje 'khor mang po dang bcas te phyag 'tshal ba'o //
NK051(zhi)004:3371: 'khor gang dang bcas te yi rang na /
NK051(zhi)004:3372: de ni mgon po gsang ba'i bdag /
NK051(zhi)004:3373: lag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal //
NK051(zhi)004:3374: sna tshogs gzhan dang lhan cig tu //
NK051(zhi)004:3377: gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la sangs
NK051(zhi)004:3378: rgyas thams cad kyis las kyi khro bor dbang bskur
NK051(zhi)004:3379: / dbang rtags su lag tu rdo rje gtad /
NK051(zhi)004:3380: gsang mtshan du lag na rdo rje zhes btags pas na /
NK051(zhi)004:3382: yon tan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i 'khor lnga brgya po gzhan dang lhan cig tu yi rang ngo //
NK051(zhi)004:3383: tshig gang gi sgo nas yi rang na /
NK051(zhi)004:3384: gsang bstod nas ni tshig 'di gsol //
NK051(zhi)004:3385: mgon po bdag cag yi rang ngo //
NK051(zhi)004:3386: legs so legs so legs par gsungs //
NK051(zhi)004:3388: gsang bstod nas ni zhum pa med par dbu 'phang bstod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:3389: bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa yi rang ste /
NK051(zhi)004:3390: zab pa rang gi don 'byung ba legs so //
NK051(zhi)004:3391: rgya che ba gzhan gyi don 'byung ba legs so //
NK051(zhi)004:3392: zab pa dang rgya che ba gnyis su med par gsungs pas legs par gsungs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)004:3393: dgos pa gang gi phyir yi rang na /
NK051(zhi)004:3395: 'gro ba mgon med rnams dang ni //
NK051(zhi)004:3396: bdag cag yang dag rdzogs pa yi //
NK051(zhi)004:3397: byang chub thob pa'i don chen mdzad //
NK051(zhi)004:3399: nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba las grol ba'i 'bras bu 'dod pa'i 'gro ba mgon med pa rnams dang /
NK051(zhi)004:3400: bdag cag gis rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa'i don du mdzad pas so //
NK051(zhi)004:3401: chos gang la yi rang na /
NK051(zhi)004:3402: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i tshul bstan pa //
NK051(zhi)004:3403: 'di ni rnam dag legs pa'i lam //
NK051(zhi)004:3404: zab cing yangs la rgya che ste //
NK051(zhi)004:3405: don chen 'gro ba'i don byed pa //
NK051(zhi)004:3407: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i chos su bstan pa 'di ni shin tu legs pa'i lam ste /
NK051(zhi)004:3408: zab pa dang yangs shing rgya che ba dang /
NK051(zhi)004:3410: yid ches pa'i rgyu mtshan ci yod pa'i phyir rjes su yi rang na /
NK051(zhi)004:3411: sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul 'di ni //
NK051(zhi)004:3412: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad //
NK051(zhi)004:3414: sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul gyi chos 'di ni gang zag gis ma gsungs te /
NK051(zhi)004:3415: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pas /
NK051(zhi)004:3417: nor ba mi 'byung bas yid ches pa'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)004:3418: rjes su yi rang zhes pa bshad pa yin no //
NK051(zhi)004:3420: lung ni yid ches tshig yin te //
NK051(zhi)004:3421: nyes pa zad pa brdzun gyi tshig /
NK051(zhi)004:3422: smra bar mi byed rgyu med phyir //
NK051(zhi)004:3423: nyes zad lung du shes par bya //
NK051(zhi)004:3425: sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'jam dpal mtshan //
NK051(zhi)004:3426: zab cing rgya che shin tu dpag dka' yang //
NK051(zhi)004:3427: bshad pa'i rgyud dang gdams ngag la brten nas //
NK051(zhi)004:3428: slob mas gsol btab phyir na bdag gis brtsams //
NK051(zhi)004:3429: nongs par gyur pa 'phags dang mkhas la bshags //
NK051(zhi)004:3430: 'di brtsams dge ba ma nor mchis pa yis //
NK051(zhi)004:3431: kun gyis 'jam dpal go 'phang thob par shog /
NK051(zhi)004:3432: chos skad byings la ma brten bod kyi mis //
NK051(zhi)004:3433: go bar bde phyir rang so'i skad kyis bkrol //
NK051(zhi)004:3434: de phyir mkhas pas tshig skyon brtag mi rigs //
NK051(zhi)004:3435: 'on kyang rgyal ba'i lung la'ang skur 'debs na //
NK051(zhi)004:3436: bdag 'dra'i gzhung la ci phyir smod mi rigs //
NK051(zhi)004:3437: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel ba mtshan don
NK051(zhi)004:3438: gsal bar byed pa'i sgron me zhes bya ba rdzogs
NK051(zhi)004:3439: so // slob dpon bi ma la mi tras mdzad
NK051(zhi)004:3440: nas thugs kyi sras nyang ting 'dzin gyis zhus shing
NK051(zhi)004:3443: // mkhan slob chos gsum ring lugs che //
NK051(zhi)004:3445: 'gro rgyud mchog gsum snang ba dang //
